79b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' yas pa rgyun mi gcod pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'jog pa/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/ dus gsum
79b6(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid char phyin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la the tsom med pa'i mkhyen pa mnga' ba/ spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba/ 
79b7(mdo sde): chos mkhyen pa la nem nur mi mnga' ba/ rnam par ma brtags pa'i sku mnga' ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes yang dag par blangs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa gnyis su med
79b8(mdo sde): pa dam pa'i pha rol byon pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres pa rnam par thar par mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa/ 'tha' dang dpung med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa mnyam pa nyid thugs su
80a1(mdo sde): chud pa/ chos kyi dbyings dam pa can/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par bskal pa bgrangs pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rgyun mi
80a2(mdo sde): gcod pa'i sku mnga' ba/ pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu
80a3(mdo sde): chen po dang / 'od srung chen po dang / ma 'gags pa dang / rab 'byor dang / ka t+ya'i bu dang / ka pi na chen po dang / nag pa dang / dga' bo dang / chu klung 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung dang / lteng rgyas
80a4(mdo sde): 'od srung dang / byams ma'i bu gang po dang / ba yang bdag da dang / lam phran bstan dang / gyad bu nor dang / seng ldeng na rags pa dang / skul byed dang / gsus po che chen po dang / sgra
80a5(mdo sde): can zin dang / kun dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa dag/ slong 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad/ kyang / chos gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba/ 'phags
80a6(mdo sde): pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshul la bzhugs pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang gzhi med pa nam mkha'i spyod yul pa sha stag go// thams
80a7(mdo sde): cad kyang mi rten par gnas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba sha stag go/ thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul
80a8(mdo sde): dang spyod pa la zhugs pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la zhugs pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
80b1(mdo sde): kyi dbyings snang ba'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang chos kyi tshul gcig la yang dag par gzhol pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon tu phyogs pa
80b2(mdo sde): sdug go// thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam rgyun ma bcad pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir ma log pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang shes rab dang / 
80b3(mdo sde): ye shes mngon par grub pa'i yid dang ldan pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang lhag mthong dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang thabs kyi
80b4(mdo sde): yul dang spyod yul nges par 'byung ba sha stag go// dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo dang / dge slong ma grags la dzin la sogs pa/ dge slong ma 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis
80b5(mdo sde): dang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang dkar po'i chos ni na tu yongs su bsdus pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa sha stag go// 
80b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang chos thams cad dngos po med par rab tu rtogs pa sha stag go// chos thams cad la mtshan
80b7(mdo sde): nyid med pa zhugs pa chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mthar rig pa/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / gnyen po med par mos pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par
80b8(mdo sde): thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang 'dul ba'i sems can ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par gzugs dang / lus dang kha
81a1(mdo sde): dog dang / spyod lam shin tu ston pa sha stag go/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra
81a2(mdo sde): rab kyi rdul rnyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / kun nas 'dren dang / 
81a3(mdo sde): kun tu sprul dang / kun tu shes rab dang / kun tu mig dang / kun tu 'od dang / kun tu snang ba dang / kun tu 'od zer dang / kun tu tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun
81a4(mdo sde): tu blo dang / shugs chen dang / shugs chen 'dzin dang / rnam dpar 'phrul pa chen po dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyal po dang / brtson 'grus chen pos rnam par gnon// 
81a5(mdo sde): dang / rtsal chen dpa' ba dang / cher bsgyings dang / bsgyings pa chen po'i stobs dang / tshogs kyi dbang po chen po dang / spos kyi bal glang glang po che chen po dang / byang chub
81a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba chen po dang / zla ba bzang dang / yon tan zla ba dang / rin chen zla ba dang / kun tu snang ba'i zla ba dang / chos dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang / rnam
81a7(mdo sde): par snang byed zla ba dang / rnam par sgrags pa'i zla ba dang / 'od zer rab tu gtong ba'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla gang dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / 
81a8(mdo sde): tshangs po'i dbang pos bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / sa'i sgra dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jom pa'i dbyangs dang / 
81b1(mdo sde): chos kyi rje chen sgra dbyangs dang / kun tu go bar byed pa'i dbyangs dang / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog dbyangs dang / sa steng sgra dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs kyi yan
81b2(mdo sde): lag thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i dbyangs dang / kun nas snying po dang / kun tu dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / yon tan snying po dang / rnam pa ra snang mdzad snying po dang / rin chen snying po dang / 
81b3(mdo sde): zla ba'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / snang byed snying po dang / pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo gros chen po dang / khyad par blo gros dang / rnam grags
81b4(mdo sde): blo gros dang / rgyal chen blo gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / daphel ba'i blo gros dang / mtha' yas blo gros dang / yangs dpa'i blo gros dang / sangs rgyas blo gros dang / blo gros mi
81b5(mdo sde): zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gro sa rgya mtsho dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / sangs rgyas mngon sum blo gros dang / ri rab mar me
81b6(mdo sde): dang / mar me chen po dang / chos kyi sgron ma'i mar me dang / phyogs thams cad du khyab pa'i mar me dang / kun tu mar me dang / mun pa thams cad sel ba'i mar me dang / 'gro ba thams cad la snang
81b7(mdo sde): ba'i mar me dang / gcig tu snang ba'i mar me dang / zla ba'i mar me dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i mar me dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lag na rin chen
81b8(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lag na phyag rgya rin chen gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rin chen 'od zer gzhon nur gyur pa dang / nam mkha' mdzod gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi/ 
82a1(mdo sde): 'khor lo bskor ba gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rnam par sel ba gzhon nur pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong pa gzhon nur pa dang / 
82a2(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po gzhon nur gyur pa dang / seng ge gzhon nur gyur pa dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang / zla ba'i 'od zer gzhon nur gyur pa dang / mchog gi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rgyan bkod
82a3(mdo sde): pa gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lag na pad+ma dang / lag na rdo rje dang / gnyi 'od dang / nor bu dang / klog dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i 'od dang / 
82a4(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul thams cad las nges par
82a5(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i blo gros dang / rdul med rnam par gnon dang / rnam da ga rnam par gnon dang / phung po rnam par gnon dang / skye mched rnam par gnon dang / khams rnam par gnon dang / 
82a6(mdo sde): stong pa nyid rnam par gnon dang / mtshan ma med pa rnam par gnon dang / smon pa med pa rnam par gnon dang / skye ba med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'gag pa med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'gro ba
82a7(mdo sde): med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'ong ba med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'chi 'pho med pa rnam par gnon dang / mi skyo ba rnam par gnon dang / rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam par gnon dang / 'jig rten
82a8(mdo sde): gsum rnam par gnon dang / mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par gnon dang / chos thams cad rnam par gnon dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge
82b1(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad rnam par gnon dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa rnam par gnon dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par gnon dang / 
82b2(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par gnon dang / de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnon dang / mnyam pa nyid rnam par gnon dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dbyings
82b3(mdo sde): rnam par gnon dang / bdud yul mi gos dang / bdud las rgyal dang / bdud las rgyal chen po dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / 'od zer stong gi 'od 'phro dang / mngon par 'byung dka'
82b4(mdo sde): dang / rab tu thub dka' dang / rtogs dka' dang / bsnyen/ par dka' ba'i blo dang / ngan 'gro skems dang / pa/ zang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon
82b5(mdo sde): bzang po dang / mis byin dang / chu lha'i lha dang / zla ba'i lha dang nga / dri ma med kyi byin dang / dri ma med par grags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang // 
82b6(mdo sde): de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjed du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis
82b7(mdo sde): thogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang / gzhan dag nas 'dus pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la dpyod pa dang / thab dang tshul dang / 
82b8(mdo sde): 'dul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos la 'god pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad la dpyod pa'i tshul shes pa/ rab 'byam la
83a1(mdo sde): zhugs pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa'i spyod yul shes pa la dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang spros pa/ 
83a2(mdo sde): thams cad shin tu chad cing / spyod pa len pa rnam par chad de/ sems can gyi khams thod sdud pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang mtha' dang dpung med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa la
83a3(mdo sde): shin tu gnas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa chud mi za ba mi dmigs par spyod cing so sor rtogs pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams
83a4(mdo sde): cad kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsams pa da dang / bag la nyal dang / dbang po dang / rtsom pa dang / sbyor ba la shin tu spyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha
83a5(mdo sde): stag go/ thams cad kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang // da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i don dang / tshig dang / yi ge gzung ba dang / 
83a6(mdo sde): blang ba shes pa yang dag par 'dzin cing rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / mtha' dang dpung med pa'i chos kyi tshul la
83a7(mdo sde): 'jug par zhugs pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / dus dang / rim pa'i tshul la so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang 'das pa dang / 
83a8(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor skad cig gcig gis de ma thag tu thob par gnas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang sems kyi
83b1(mdo sde): skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' bar spyod pa sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / 
83b2(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang sems can thams cad
83b3(mdo sde): kyi phyir sems skyed cing byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang ma dral ba sha stag go// thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi sems kyi dmigs pa la 'jug pas sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi
83b4(mdo sde): sems kyi dmigs pa la mkhas pa dang ldan pa sha stag/ go/ thams cad kyang rang 'byung gi ye shes kyi sa las/ dam bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ldan pa sha stag/ 
83b5(mdo sde): go/ thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis thob par spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang nga byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i stobs rgyun
83b6(mdo sde): mi gcod cing mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes pa'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi bya ba la bskal pa mtha' yas par spyod pa kun tu 'dzin par byin gyis rlob
83b7(mdo sde): pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang phyad par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byin gyis rlob cing gdul bya'i khams 'gro ba thams cad 'dzud pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang
83b8(mdo sde): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gnas la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa'i stobs kyi khyad par dang smon lam phun sum
84a1(mdo sde): tshogs pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas
84a2(mdo sde): 'byung ba thams cad kyi thad du 'gro zhing skal ba la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu 'dzin pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ 
84a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par byed pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba kun tu ston par
84a4(mdo sde): byed pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang kun nas nyon mongs dpa can gyis 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyong ba dar byed pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang byang chub sems
84a5(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod par byed pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa la zhugs pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang nam
84a6(mdo sde): mkha'i khams ltar tshad med pa'i chos dang ldan pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos
84a7(mdo sde): kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang las kyis kun nas bslang ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par smin pa la mos pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang rgyus kun nas
84a8(mdo sde): bslang ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu la mos pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang rgya'i 'bur kun tu 'byung ba lta bur chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go// thams
84b1(mdo sde): cad kyang mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan ltar ston pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par rig pa brag cha dang mtshungs par
84b2(mdo sde): ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtsen pa
84b3(mdo sde): sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa'i mdogs yongs su 'grub pa'i gzugs la gnas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams
84b4(mdo sde): thams cad kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thamasacad kyang phyogs bcu dag tu skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba
84b5(mdo sde): dang / dka' bar spyod par sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po/ ra 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon par/ byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang
84b6(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang skyil mo krung gcig gos phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
84b7(mdo sde): nam mkha' rgyas par 'gangs par shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang zhing thams cad kyi rgyan zhing gcig tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang zhing gcig
84b8(mdo sde): gi rgyan bkod pa zhing thams cad du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams
85a1(mdo sde): cad kyi 'khor gang dag yin pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor du gton pa la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gang yin pa de
85a2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang chos thams cad mtha' dang dpung
85a3(mdo sde): med par ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus rang gi lus su kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku
85a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gcig gi skur zhugs par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas gcig/ gi sku sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur zhugs par kun tu ston pa
85a5(mdo sde): la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rang gi lus su chud par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang sems
85a6(mdo sde): can gcig gi lus la dus gsum gyi sems can rnams kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang 'das pa'i dus la ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dang / ma 'ongs
85a7(mdo sde): pa'i dus la 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang lus gcig gis/ 
85a8(mdo sde): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la/ lus dpag tu med grangs med pa las ldang ba la mkhas pa lus dpag tu med cing grangs med pa dag gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la/ lus
85b1(mdo sde): gcig las ldang bar kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus snyed kyi mngon par byang chub pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ 
85b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus la sems can gcig gi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa/ sems can gcig gi lus la sems can thams cad kyi lus kun tu ston
85b3(mdo sde): pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus las sangs rgyas kyi sku kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku
85b4(mdo sde): las sems can gyi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can gyi lus chos kyi skur kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag gi
85b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyang zhing thams cad kyi rgyan bkod pa de dag zhing gcig tu kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa zhing gcigagi rgyan bkod pa de dag zhing thams cad du kun tu ston pa
85b6(mdo sde): la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang chos kyi sku sems can gyi lus su kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang spu'i khung bu gcig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig
85b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad 'jug par byed pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i smon lam gyi
85b8(mdo sde): stobs kyis gnas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams
86a1(mdo sde): cad na gdul bya'i sems can yongs su smin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu ston pa la mangs pa sha stag go/ 
86a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyang bskal pa bgrang ba thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// 
86a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyang sems bskyed pa gcig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re na sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa
86a4(mdo sde): dang / drod gshar las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa da dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma yin pa da dang / 'du shes can dang / 'du shes can ma yin pa dang / 
86a5(mdo sde): rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / rkang mangs dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / 
86a6(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong pa dang / mi dang / mi mo yin pa sems can gdul bya yongs su smin pa thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du lhun gyis
86a7(mdo sde): grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la 'jig
86a8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag 'jug par byed kyang / sems
86b1(mdo sde): can la gnod pa med pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa'i yang
86b2(mdo sde): brjod du med pa dag yud tsam gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa yud tsam gcig bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ 
86b3(mdo sde): gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag tu byin gyis rlob pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang spyod lam ji lta bus sems can rnams yongs su smin par
86b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par gzugs kyi lus kyi kha dog dang / spyod la/ ma kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag ste/ byang chub
86b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / gzhan dag thams cad kyang yon tan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag dang ldan pa sha
86b6(mdo sde): stag go/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya
86b7(mdo sde): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sha stag dang thabs
86b8(mdo sde): gcig go/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya re re yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir dang / 
87a1(mdo sde): phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos bstan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// brgya byin bye ba drag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal
87a2(mdo sde): po rab 'thab bral bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bye ba
87a3(mdo sde): phrag brgya la/ lha'i rgyal po re re yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i
87a4(mdo sde): phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la der lhags so// ded dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi das kyi lha bye ba phrag mang po dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das
87a5(mdo sde): la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnya na pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// 
87a6(mdo sde): srin po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag bco brgyad dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po 'bum phag brgyad cu dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'bum
87a7(mdo sde): phrag drug cu rtsa lnga dang / drang srong 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu tham cad kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa sha stag/ rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam par 'thor rlung dang / rnam par 'thor rlung
87a8(mdo sde): chen po g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag dang / tshangs pa bye ba phrag brgyad dang / tshangs pa chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'od chung bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshad med 'od bye ba phrag brgya dang // 
87b1(mdo sde): 'od gsal bye ba phrag brgya dang / dge chung bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshad med dge bye ba phrag brgya dang / dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang / sprin med bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'bras bu che bye ba phrag
87b2(mdo sde): brgya dang / bsod nams skyes bye ba phrag brgya dang / gya nom snang bya ba phrag brgya dang / shin tu mthong bya ba phrag brgya dang / mi che bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi gdung bye ba phrag brgya dang / 
87b3(mdo sde): 'og min gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dag la tshangs pa chen po re re yid g.yog mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / 
87b4(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bco ma ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// lha'i bu dbang ngaphyug chen po la sogs pa// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
87b5(mdo sde): lha bye ba phrag brgya dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das la blta/ kha'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos
87b6(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// klu'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / dri za'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / 
87b7(mdo sde): lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi 'am tsa'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya re re
87b8(mdo sde): yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyam
88a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// mi dang mi ma yin pa dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag
88a2(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma bye ba khrag khrig
88a3(mdo sde): 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
88a4(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der lhags so// rtsa dang shing gal ba dang smon dang nags tshal gyi lha gang dag yin pa dag dang lhun po dang / lhun po chen po dang / btang zung dang / gtang zung
88a5(mdo sde): chen po dang / gangs ri dang / khor yug dang / khor yu/ ga chen po la sogs pa ri rnams kyi lha gang dag yin/ pa de dag thams cad gnas dang bcas te/ bcom ldan
88a6(mdo sde): 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// rgya mtsho
88a7(mdo sde): dang rna rgya mtsho chen po dang / chu klung dang / chu bran dang / mtsho bran dang / mtshe'u dang / chu mig dang / 'bab chu rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnas dag dang bcas te/ 
88a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// / 
88b1(mdo sde): grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / 'or rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rang gi gnas dang lhan cig
88b2(mdo sde): tu/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
88b3(mdo sde): ljags so// klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yon dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rang rang
88b4(mdo sde): gi gnas su zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta da ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan
88b5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus sems can 'ga' la ya nga gnod pa med cing sgrib pa med do// zla ba bye ba phrag brgya
88b6(mdo sde): dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho bye ba phrag brgya re re yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod
88b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa yang 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom
88b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// / 
89a1(mdo sde): dus 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya
89a2(mdo sde): ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar lhags so// dud 'gro'i sku gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mos pa/ thag
89a3(mdo sde): pa chen po la gzhol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'dod pa sha stag go/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kha dog dang / gzugs dang / gzi brjid dang / 'od kyis 'khor
89a4(mdo sde): thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge da'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi mas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa phyung ste/ srin bu me khyer
89a5(mdo sde): thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang de'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong
89a6(mdo sde): ba thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ lam ma/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste// dper na zla ba yar gyis tshes bco lnga la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin gyi dra ba las grol ba ni skar ma'i
89a7(mdo sde): tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ lam me/ lhan ne/ lhung nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad smra bkod
89a8(mdo sde): ste/ zil gyis gnan nas/ lam me/ lhan na/ lhang nge ste/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar dpal gyis rab tu 'bar te/ sku mi g.yo mi 'gyur mi 'gul bar lam mo/ lhan na/ lhang nge'o// 
89b1(mdo sde): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces smraso// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du de bzhin
89b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'di ni sku mi g.yo mi 'gyur mi 'gul bar bzhugs so// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas
89b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni rab tu 'byung bar mngon tu phyogs shing
89b4(mdo sde): khyim nas mngon par 'byung bar shes so// kha gcig gis ni rab tu byung zhing dka' ba spyod pa la gnas par sha sa so// 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni byang
89b5(mdo sde): chub kyi snying por gshegs par shes so// kha cig gis ni/ byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par shes so// 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni bdud 'khor
89b6(mdo sde): grangs med/ dpag tu med pas bskor pa bcom par shes so// kha gcig gis ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
89b7(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong pa dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag gis dad dpon chen po rgyal lo// rgyal lo zhes spro bar byed par shes
89b8(mdo sde): so// kha cig gis ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ brgya byin rnams gsol ba 'debs par shes so// kha cig gis ni tshangs pa rnams gsol ba 'debs par shes
90a1(mdo sde): so// 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni 'jig rten slong ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs par shes so// kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das
90a2(mdo sde): bdag cag la sbyin pa'i gtam ston par shes so// 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das bdag cag tshul khrims kyi gtam ston par shes so// kha cig gis ni
90a3(mdo sde): bzod pa'i gtam/ kha cig gis ni brtson 'grus kyi gtam/ kha cig gis ni bsam gtan gyi gtam/ kha cig gis ni shes rab kyi gtam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par
90a4(mdo sde): shes so// kha cig gis ni thabs la mkhas pa'i gtam/ kha cig gis ni rdzu 'phrul gyi gtam/ kha cig gis ni smon lam gyi gtam/ kha cig gis ni ye shes kyi
90a5(mdo sde): gtam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shas so// kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam/ kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam/ 
90a6(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni theg pa chen po'i gtam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so// kha cig gis ni sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag
90a7(mdo sde): cag la ston par shes so// kha cig gis ni dud 'gror skye ba'i chos rnams/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so// kha cig gos ni yi dgas su skye ba'i chos rnams/ 
90a8(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i chos rnams/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so// kha cig gis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye ba'i chos
90b1(mdo sde): rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so// kha cig gis ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis mtha' bral gyi gnas su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom
90b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so// kha cig gis ni dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni 'phrul dga'i gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni gzhan 'phrul
90b3(mdo sde): dbang byed kyi gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni bdud kyi gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni tshangs pa'i gnas su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par
90b4(mdo sde): shes so// de bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / 
90b5(mdo sde): dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / mi che dang / mi gdung dang / gya nom snad dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min dang / nam
90b6(mdo sde): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan/ 
90b7(mdo sde): 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so// 'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni mir skye ba'i chos rnams/ kha cig gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i
90b8(mdo sde): chos rnams/ kha cig gis ni gling gnyis dang gsum dang / bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
91a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gad ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par sheso// 'jam dpal 'khor
91a2(mdo sde): 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis na de bzhin gshags pa'i sku 'dom do tsam du 'phags par shaso// kha cig gis ni rgyang grags tsam du 'phags/ kha cig gis ni rgyang grags gnyis tsam du 'phags/ kha cig gis na de bzhin ga
91a3(mdo sde): pa'i skra dpag tshad tsam du 'phags par sheso// kha cig gis na de bzhin gshags pil skra dpag tshad gnyis tsam du 'phags par shaso// kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skra dpag tshad bcu tsam du
91a4(mdo sde): shes so// 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de ba bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad stong du shes so// kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad stong
91a5(mdo sde): phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu par shes so// kha cig gis ni dpag tshad 'bu/ ma dang / kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
91a6(mdo sde): dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu par shes so// kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong
91a7(mdo sde): par shes so// 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag bgrang ba las 'das par shes so// 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig/ 
91a8(mdo sde): gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che chen po an da rnyil gyi kha dog tu/ 
91b1(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che mthon chen po'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che skar 'od kyi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che pad+ma ral gri kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor
91b2(mdo sde): bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni
91b3(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog tukha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che chu bdang gi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che shel gyi kha dog tu shes
91b4(mdo sde): so// kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu
91b5(mdo sde): rin po che rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu/ kha ci ga gis ni nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i khe dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che
91b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu shes/ 'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa
91b7(mdo sde): yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i kha dog tu shes so// 'jam dpal kha dog dang spyod lam dang / dbyibs gang dang gang kho nas sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba 'jam dpal
91b8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog dang / spyod lam dang / dbyibs de dang de kho nar sems can rnams kyi mthong ngo // 'jam dpal chos bstan pa gang dang gang gis sems can
92a1(mdo sde): rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i chos de dang / de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa ston par sems can rnams kyis shes so// 'jam dpal spyod pa gang dang gang
92a2(mdo sde): gis sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'dzud cing 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang / de la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par sems can rnams kyis
92a3(mdo sde): shes so// 'jam dpal gal te shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du mad/ tshad med brjod du med pa'i yang
92a4(mdo sde): brjod du med pa dag/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang // dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / 
92a5(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur la/ shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / de bzhin du nub
92a6(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin du byang dang / de bzhin du shar lho dang / de bzhin du lho nub dang / de bzhin du nub byang dang / de bzhin du byang shar dang / de bzhin du steng dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs
92a7(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag lha dang / klu dang / 
92a8(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma
92b1(mdo sde): yin pa dag gis dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ til gyis zhing bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag/ 'jam dpal gal te de bzhin gshegs
92b2(mdo sde): pa mthong bas 'dul ba yin na/ sems can de dang de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan snga na 'dom gang tsam na 'khor bar shes so// 'jam dpal kha dog dang / spyod lam dang
92b3(mdo sde): gnas gang dang gang gis sems can de dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang / de kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par sems can de dag gi mthong ngo // 'jam dpal chos
92b4(mdo sde): bstan pa gang dag gang gis sems can rnams yod das su smin par 'gyur ba de dang de nyid kyi chos ston pa dar thos so// 'jam dpal spyod pa gang gi sems can de dag/ 
92b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur kha'i spyod pa de dang de la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thams cad lhun
92b6(mdo sde): gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i dkyil 'khor nam phyed kyi dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyis so// 
92b7(mdo sde): so'i mdun na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dug par shes kyang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni sems can de dag gis bdag ci'i phyir/ zla ba'i dkyi sngo du shes par 'gyur bar bdag sems can de dag
92b8(mdo sde): gi mdun na 'dug par bya'o// snyam du mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pas lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi
93a1(mdo sde): rtog par de lta bu'i bya ba 'di 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'khor dpag tu med/ grangs
93a2(mdo sde): med/ bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i dbus na bzhugs na/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
93a3(mdo sde): mdun na bzhugs par mthong med kyi/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par shes par 'gyur ba rang sems can de dag gi
93a4(mdo sde): mdun du 'dug par bya'o snyam du mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog/  ste 'on kyang sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul ba de ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par
93a5(mdo sde): shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal dper na/ sems ca na rnams kyi las kyi tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyi rnam
93a6(mdo sde): par smin pa'i dbang gis/ sems can rnams kyi 'du byed tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams 'byung bar 'du byed rnams ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang 'du byed de dag lhun
93a7(mdo sde): gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams kyi bya ba dag la 'jug go/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
93a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab k+Shi dbang gi de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab sems can rnams kyis mthong
93b1(mdo sde): yang / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de lhun gyis grub pa 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dper na/ 
93b2(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya rigs ma ni ras tha dad pa nyid kyi dbang gis/ kha dog tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gal te nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya ras ser po'i steng du bzhag na ni/ 
93b3(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya kha dog ser por 'gyur/ gal te ras dmar po'i steng du gzhag na ni/ nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya kha dog dmar por 'gyur/ gal te ras sngon po'i steng du bzhag na ni
93b4(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya kha dog sngon por 'gyur te/ de ltar ras kha dog ci dang ci 'dra ba'i steng du bzhag pa de dang de nyi da kyi kha dog kho nar 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal nor bu rin
93b5(mdo sde): po che bai DUr+ya ni mi rtag rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun/ gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog pa de'i bya ba de lta bu de la byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
93b6(mdo sde): pa yang sems can tha dad pa nyid kyi dbang gis kha dog tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gal te sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong bas gdul
93b7(mdo sde): bar bya ba yin na ni// de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yinan
93b8(mdo sde): ni de dag gis kyang debazhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya'i kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal te sems can rnams mu tig gi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de
94a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mu tig gis kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che an da rnyil gyi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis
94a2(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che an da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo // 'jam dpal gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba
94a3(mdo sde): yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha
94a4(mdo sde): dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che'o/ dad thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal te sems
94a5(mdo sde): can rnams nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin no ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i
94a6(mdo sde): kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ 
94a7(mdo sde): de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skra nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod kun nas 'od zer spang ba'i kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal te sems can rnams
94a8(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa
94b1(mdo sde): can gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs
94b2(mdo sde): pa'i sku nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong ngo // 'jam dpal gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che klog gi sgron ma'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya
94b3(mdo sde): ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che klog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog lta bus
94b4(mdo sde): gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bani na gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi dadog tu mthong ngo // de bzhin du sems can rnams de bzhin
94b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog tu mthong ba sa gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin
94b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog mthong ngo // de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / 
94b7(mdo sde): yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i bar gyi kha dog gis gdul bar bya ba yin na no// de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sems can dmyal ba dang / dang
94b8(mdo sde): 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i bar gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo // gzugs med par skyes pa'i bar gyi gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam
95a1(mdo sde): gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam de dang / de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo // 
95a2(mdo sde): de bzhin du sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal las skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes can
95a3(mdo sde): dang / 'du shes can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes mod 'du shes med min gyi sems can rnams gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam gang dang / gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur
95a4(mdo sde): ba'i gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod la/ dam de dang / dar de bzhin gshegs pa mthong yang / dade bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'di dag gis
95a5(mdo sde): gsar gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che ba rlu'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya'i kha dog tu
95a6(mdo sde): mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che an da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che an da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ 
95a7(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che mthong ka chen po'i kha dog tu mtho bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che 'od
95a8(mdo sde): thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che
95b1(mdo sde): dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas
95b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin
95b3(mdo sde): po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag
95b4(mdo sde): gis ni nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can dgyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che sa dang ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni
95b5(mdo sde): ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong par gyur la/ nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i
95b6(mdo sde): kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar
95b7(mdo sde): ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ 
95b8(mdo sde): sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can
96a1(mdo sde): 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che nyi zla sdang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che klog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis/ 
96a2(mdo sde): ni nor bu rin po che klog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig ces mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ de bzhin/ 
96a3(mdo sde): du sbyar te/ 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang lhun gyis
96a4(mdo sde): grub cing / rnam par mi rtog pa de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo // // bam po gnyis pa da// 'jam dpal dper na/ nor bu rin po che dbang gis
96a5(mdo sde): rgyal po gang du 'byung ba der lcags dang / lcags las/ byas pa'i yo byad rnams mi 'byung mod kyi/ 'jam dang la 'on kyang nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po ni/ mi rtog
96a6(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'di snyam du bdag gang du byung ba der lcag dang / lcags las byas pa'i yo byad rnams 'byung bar ma gyur cig snyam du sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam
96a7(mdo sde): par mi rtog par do'i bya ba de lta bu 'byung // 'jam dpal de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba der mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu ba dang / gcer bu pa
96a8(mdo sde): la sogs pa mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad mi 'byung / der lta bar gyur pa thams cad ni/ 'byung / der 'khrug pa thams cad mi 'byung // der mtshams med pa lnga po dag mi 'byung / 
96b1(mdo sde): der mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams mi 'byung / der rgyal po'i bka' lung dang / chos gces pa 'dor ba mi 'byung // der nyi zla'i 'od dag mi 'byung // der brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 
96b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba dag dang / lha thams cad kyi 'od dag mi 'byung / der nor bu rin po che'i 'od rnams dang / me'i 'od rnams dang / glog gi 'od rnams ma 'byung / der yud tsam dang / yud
96b3(mdo sde): tsam phyed dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / lor bgrang ba rnams mi 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal gzhan du na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlab/ 
96b4(mdo sde): ni ma gtogs so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can da gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog
96b5(mdo sde): par de'i mdzad pa de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dper na/ nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha
96b6(mdo sde): dog tu 'gyur yang / nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhan gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang
96b7(mdo sde): dag de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa'i yid la byed pa'i 'od kyis reg pa de dag thaMng thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtogs rnam par mi rtog
96b8(mdo sde): ste/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po bai DUr+ya
97a1(mdo sde): byi dor legs par byas la/ mgo'i rgyan nam/ mgul ba'i rgyun nam/ lag pa'i rgyan nam/ rkang pa'i rgyun yang rung ste/ gang dang gang gi logs ni rgyan du 'dug pa de dang der
97a2(mdo sde): rgyan du shin tu lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// nor bu rin po che chen po bai DUr+ya de nyid kyi mthus rgyan de dag kyang shin tu lam me/ lhan ne/ lcang dang 'dug la nor bu rin po che chen po'i lhu ni mi rtog
97a3(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
97a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyang spyod lam gyi gnas gang dang gang gis nyan thos kyi spyod pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod dpa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'am/ de bzhin
97a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i spyod pa 'am/ spyod pa pa dang / kun tu/ rgyu dang / gcer buM pa'i spyod pa 'am/ dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / sha za dang / 
97a6(mdo sde): grul bum dang srin po'i spyod pa 'am/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i spyod pa 'am/ spyod pa gang dang gang la gnas pa'i spyod pa de dang de nyid shin tu lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang
97a7(mdo sde): de'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi mthus spyod pa de shin tu lam me/ lhan no// lhang nger rnam par spyod kyang / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 
97a8(mdo sde): 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dper na/ sa la gnas/ sa la bsten nas/ sa bon thams cad dang / rtsa dang
97b1(mdo sde): shing gal ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnams skye zhing 'phel la/ shin tu rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur yang / Shajam dang las ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog
97b2(mdo sde): par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la brten nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skye
97b3(mdo sde): zhing 'phel te/ shin tu rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur yang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de mdzad pa de lta bu de
97b4(mdo sde): 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dper na sprin chen pos 'ja/ ma bu'i gling thams cad khebs par byas nas/ rtsad/ dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang nags tshal rnams tha
97b5(mdo sde): dad pa rnams su char pa chen po rab tu phab ste/ ro gci ga pa'i chu'i rgyun des rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnam pa tha dad pa rnams skye bar
97b6(mdo sde): byed cing / gnas rnam pa tha dad pa rnams su chu de ro tha dad pa dang / kha dog tha dad par yang gnas la/ 'jam dpal sprin ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam
97b7(mdo sde): par mi rtog par bya ba tha dad pa rnams 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
97b8(mdo sde): khams rab 'byam thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprin gyis khyab par mdzad de/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pa smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa
98a1(mdo sde): tha dad cing / mos pa tha dad pa la gnas pa thams cad la chos kyi char chen po mngon par phab ste/ 'jam dpal chos kyi char de yang ro gcig pa yin mod kyi
98a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pa/ smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa tha dad cing / mos pa tha dad pa la gnas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
98a3(mdo sde): dang / smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa tha dad pa la zhugs pa rnam pa tha dad pa nyid kyi chos tha dad pa kho na'i char pas nus pa ji lta ba dang / mthu ji lta ba bzhin du
98a4(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed kyang / 'jam dpal de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'di lta ste/ sems can 'di dag la ni nyan thos kyi ye shes su 'gyur
98a5(mdo sde): ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bo dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// sems can 'di dag la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'a gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskrad par bya'o// 
98a6(mdo sde): sems can 'di dag la ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// sems can 'di dag la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa'i gnas su skye ba'i dag
98a7(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// sems can 'di dag la ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar
98a8(mdo sde): te/ 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / de bzhin du tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs chen rnams
98b1(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyus
98b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skas rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams/ 
98b3(mdo sde): dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris rnams dang / 'og min rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par
98b4(mdo sde): bya'o snyam du/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ sems can 'di dag la/ na rgyal pos skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs rnam par
98b5(mdo sde): bskyed par bya'o// sems can 'di dag la ni mir skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyed pa ra bya'o// sems can 'di dag la ni dbang phyug tu 'gyur/ 
98b6(mdo sde): bi'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// snyam du 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni
98b7(mdo sde): lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par sems can smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du mdzad pa/ 
98b8(mdo sde): de lta bu de 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du btang snyoms su bzhugs shing btang snyoms la rnam par mi rtog go// 'jam dpal dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil
99a1(mdo sde): 'khor shar ma thag tu 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa btang nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mun pa mun nags thams cad med par 'gyur yang / 
99a2(mdo sde): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog rnam par rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
99a3(mdo sde): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tu ye shes kyi 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa btang bas/ sems can rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa'i mun pa thams cad med par gyur
99a4(mdo sde): te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de ba bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams su lta bar gyur pa 'byung ba ni ma gtogs
99a5(mdo sde): so/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni ngos sems can rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa bsal lo snyam 'am/ gsal bar bya'o snyam du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 
99a6(mdo sde): 'on kyang 'jam dpal lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du rnam par mi rtog
99a7(mdo sde): cing mnyam ste/ btang snyoms pa'o// 'jam dpal dper na sgyu ma sprul pa ni/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi dbang gis bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / lus tha dad pa sna tshogs ston kyang / 'jam
99a8(mdo sde): dpal sgyu ma sprul pa de ni brjod du med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ yul med pa/ dngos po med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshan nyid med
99b1(mdo sde): pa/ gnyis su med pa/ kun tu spyod pa med pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam zhing gnyen po med pa yin yang ka 'jam dpal sgyu ma sprul pa ni sgyu ma mkhan gyi dbang gis lhun gyis
99b2(mdo sde): grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par bya ba sna tshogs ston to// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can gyi
99b3(mdo sde): dbang gis/ 'khor gyi nang na gzugs kyi sku dang / kha dog dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas sna tshogs 'byung mod kyi/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshags
99b4(mdo sde): pa de ni brjod du med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/  yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ yul med pa/ dngos po dmed pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshan nyid med pa/ gnyis
99b5(mdo sde): su med pa/ kun tu spyod pa med pa/ chos kyi dbyings da nga mtshungs shing gnyen po med pa/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das pa ste/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal
99b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ni lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par sems can gyi dbang gis mdzad pa sna tshogs dag ston to// 'jam dpal dper na/ nyi ma ni kha cig kho na yin na
99b7(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi dbang gis gling bzhi rnams su sems can rnams kyis rnam pa mang por mthong ste/ kha cig gis ni de 'char bar mthong / kha cig gis ni shar zin par mthong / 
99b8(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni bag dros pa tsam du mthong / kha cig gis ni dros chen tsam du shes/ kha cig gis ni nam phyed/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma phyed/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma mel tse thun cig
100a1(mdo sde): tsam du shar bar shes/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma phyed yol tsam du shes/ kha cig gis ni ma nub tsam du shes/ kha cig gis ni tho rangs tsam du shes te/ nyi ma'i
100a2(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor cig yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang gling bzhi dag tu sems can rnams kyis gzhan dang / gzhan du mthong yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ lhun gyis
100a3(mdo sde): grub cing rnam par mi rtog bzhin du/ ri rab kyi dbang gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bya ba sna tshogs ston to// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
100a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can na gyi dbang gis 'khor cig kho na'i nang nas kyang / sem/ sa can kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs/ 
100a5(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar shes/ kha cig gis ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'ad sa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par shes so// 
100a6(mdo sde): 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs/ 
100a7(mdo sde): rgyas nas lo bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa snying
100a8(mdo sde): por gyur par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa nub par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan nas/ lo bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu
100b1(mdo sde): dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon
100b2(mdo sde): par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ lo brgya dang / lo stong lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan
100b3(mdo sde): las 'das nas lo brgya dang / lo stong lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ lo stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / 
100b4(mdo sde): bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu ldon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas da lo stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu
100b5(mdo sde): dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom lda na 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu dang / nyi
100b6(mdo sde): shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu dang
100b7(mdo sde): nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes so// 'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nA lha dang / mi kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs
100b8(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas nas/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa lon par shes/ 'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas lha dang / mi kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das
101a1(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa lon par shes kyang / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni
101a2(mdo sde): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog bzhin du sems can gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dper
101a3(mdo sde): na/ 'dzam bu gling du glung gi dkyil 'khor chen po langs pas rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo ma thams cad g.yo/ rab tu g.yo// kun tu rab
101a4(mdo sde): tu g.yo// mgul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gu la/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur/ 'ur/ 'khrug rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug
101a5(mdo sde): shing lo ma kha cig ni/ shar phyogs su dma' la/ nub phyogs su mtho/ kha cig ni nub phyogs su dma' la shar phyogs su mtho/ lo ma kha cig ni mtha dma'/ 
101a6(mdo sde): la/ dbus su mtho/ kha cig ni byang phyogs su dma' la/ lho phyogs su mtho yang / rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo ma rnams mi rtog rnam par mi
101a7(mdo sde): rtog ste/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang gis bya ba sna tshogs ston s+ho// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
101a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can gyi dbang gis rtag du skad cig skad cig la gzugs kyi sku dang / kha dog dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam dang
101b1(mdo sde): bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas grangs med pa dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal sems can rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la
101b2(mdo sde): dmigs pa yid la byed pa ji snyed 'byung ba de snyed kyi bskal par sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i rgyun chad cing ldog ste/ 'ja
101b3(mdo sde): dpal de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la dmigs pa'i yon
101b4(mdo sde): tan gyi mtha' yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis dmi khyab pa la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bskal pa bye
101b5(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa dag gis rgya/  rtogs par mi nus so// 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha rnams
101b6(mdo sde): dang / mi rnams ni ches nyung gi/ phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa dag la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang
101b7(mdo sde): lo'i tshad tsam gyi phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo // 'jam dpal phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa dag la 'dod
101b8(mdo sde): chags dang bral ba rnams kyis lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches nyung gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos
102a1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pas lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi phyogs gcig na/ sems can/ 
102a2(mdo sde): dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pas/ lha'i mig gis stong
102a3(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed mthong ba des ni/ 'jam dpal rang sangs rgyas kyis lha'i mig gis/ shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyis
102a4(mdo sde): phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo // // 'jam dpal rang sangs rgyas kyis lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
102a5(mdo sde): ni/ sems can ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pas/ 
102a6(mdo sde): lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyis phyogs gtsigs na/ sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo // 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge
102a7(mdo sde): 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pas/ lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni/ 'jam dpal de
102a8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas lha'i spyan gyis shing rta'i phang lo tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na/ sems can dag gzigs pa ni ches grangs med do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i
102b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad/ shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can re re'i sems dang / sems las byung ba'i chos byung
102b2(mdo sde): ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag gzigs pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas
102b3(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis kyang / bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang bgrang ba 'am/ bsdam pa 'am/ grangs su bya bar zla ba ma yin te/ 'jam dpal sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
102b4(mdo sde): dang / da ltar byung ba de dag gi sems dang / sems las byung ba de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis lhun gyis
102b5(mdo sde): grub par skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la rab tu ma khyen to// 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams
102b6(mdo sde): cad kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba rnams rgyu gang dang / dmigs pa gang dang / rkyen gang gis ji ltar byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can de dag gi spyod
102b7(mdo sde): pa dang / spyod lam dang / bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas gang dag byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par
102b8(mdo sde): mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'jam dpal sems can de dag ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
103a1(mdo sde): chub tu 'dul ba yang lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cing thang cig yud tsam gcig la rab tu mkhyen to// 'jam dpal sems can re re'i
103a2(mdo sde): ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bas mang ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig
103a3(mdo sde): tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to// 'jam dpal rgyu gang dang / dmigs pa gang dang / rkyen gang gis nyon mongs pa de dag ji ltar 'byung ba dang / thabs kyi shes pa gang gis sems can de dag
103a4(mdo sde): gi nyon mongs pa ji ltar zhi bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang lhun dgyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par smra dad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to// 'jam
103a5(mdo sde): dpal de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ye she sa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldano// 'jam dpal dper na/ 
103a6(mdo sde): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gzugs dang / kha dog dang / bzi brjid dang / 'od rab 'bring tha mar snang yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni 'bri ba 'am/ 'phel
103a7(mdo sde): ba yang med de/ 'on kyang son rnam kyi las kyi na par smin pas nyi ma bgrang ba dang / yud tsam dang / yud tsam phyed kyi grangs brtsi bar bya ba de lta bu de yang 'byung la/ 'jam dpal zla ba'i dkyil
103a8(mdo sde): 'khor ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
103b1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du bsam pa rab 'bring thams sems can rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa
103b2(mdo sde): gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / 'od rab 'bring tha mar mthong yang / 'jam dpal sems can gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa dang / smon lam gyi stobs
103b3(mdo sde): dang byin gyis rlabs ci 'dra ba yin pa de 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'bring tha ma med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal de
103b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs dpa'i sangs rgyas ni chos kyi sku ste/ shin tu ma smra nges pa/ ma byung ba/ ma 'gags pa yin na/ 'jam dpal
103b5(mdo sde): 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rab 'bring tha ma sa de bzhin gshegs pa rab 'bring tha mar mthong gi/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam
103b6(mdo sde): par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ lha dang / 
103b7(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / 
103b8(mdo sde): mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la bshos gsol ba dang / gang dag bshos mi gsol
104a1(mdo sde): ba dang / gang dag mi mthong ba dang / gang dag sdod pa dang / grang dag mi sdod pa dang / gang dag gshes pa dang / gang dag mig shes pa dang / gang dag reg pa dang / 
104a2(mdo sde): gang dag mi reg pa de dag thams cad kyi bya ba de lta bu rnams kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dper na/ gang dag gis nor
104a3(mdo sde): bu rin po che mthon ka chen po mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / spyod yul du gnas pa de dag thams cad ni nor bu rin po che mthon kra chen po'i kha dog du 'gyur yang / nor bu rin po che mthon
104a4(mdo sde): ka chen po ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ 'jam dpal ngo// bzhin du sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gsha/ gus pa tha na ri mer bris pa dang / gzugs su byas pa
104a5(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / de'i spyod yul yang shes pa de dag thams cad ni gzugs dang / kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su grub pa thob par 'gyur yang / 
104a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rna par mi rtog ste/ 'dza dpal dper na/ rtsi'i rgyal po legs par mthong zhes bya ba sems can gnod sems dang / ldan pa 'am/ ngang pa'i sems ldan pa yang rung // 
104a7(mdo sde): gang dag gis mthong ba de dag gis mig rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung // gang dag gis rna bas de rlung gis bstod
104a8(mdo sde): pa'i sgra thos pa de dag gi rna ba rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / gang dag gis dri tshor ba de dag gi sna rnam
104b1(mdo sde): par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / gang dag gis lces de'i ro myong ba de dag gi lce'i dbang po rnam par dag par 'gyu
104b2(mdo sde): gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / gang dag gis lus kyis reg pa de dag gis lus rnam par dag par 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal rtsal
104b3(mdo sde): rgyal po legs par mthong na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du gnod sems kyi sems
104b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tha na ri mor bris pa dang / gzugs su byas pa mthong ba de dag gis dge
104b5(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba des mig rnam par dag par 'gyur/ tha na dud 'a/ gro'i skye gnas su song ba yang rung ste/ gnod sem/ sa kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang
104b6(mdo sde): ldan pa yang rung / gang dag gis de la sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po zhes bya ba 'am/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya
104b7(mdo sde): ba'i sgra thos pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des rna ba'i dbang po rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / 
104b8(mdo sde): gang dag gis de'i yon tan gyi dri tshor ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des sna rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / 
105a1(mdo sde): gang dag gis de'i chos kyi re myong ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des lce rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung // 
105a2(mdo sde): gang dag gis lus kyi reg pa de dag dag pa'i rtsa ba des lus rnam par dag par 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan
105a3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung // 'jam dngapa la dper na/ rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba zhes bya bas bskus pa'i rnga sgra sems can
105a4(mdo sde): zug rngus zug pa dang bcas/ dug dang bcas pa/ gang dag gis thos pa de dag gi zug rngu thams cad 'byung zhing / dug kyang mi gdug par 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal
105a5(mdo sde): rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang dang / rgyu rkyen tshogs pas lhun gyis grub cing
105a6(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog par rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de ba zhig gshegs pa'i mtshan thos ma thag tu/ sems can rnams kyi lta bar gyur
105a7(mdo sde): pa'i zug rngu dag 'byung zhing / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dug kyang mi gdug par 'gyur yang // 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste// 
105a8(mdo sde): 'on kyang 'jam dpal lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 
105b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni ches nyung gi/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
105b2(mdo sde): pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rar yang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re ra la bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis/ samr-i
105b3(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni ches
105b4(mdo sde): nyung gi/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rgyun mi gcod pa ra lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag
