105b5(mdo sde): du rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la sems can bla na med pa yang / dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin pa/ ra mdzad zin pa dang / yongs su smin par mdzad pa
105b6(mdo sde): dang / yongs su smin par mdzad par 'gyur ba dag ni ches mang ste/ 'jam dpal de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sems can yongs
105b7(mdo sde): su smin par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no// 'jam dpal dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dbang gis 'bri ba dang / skye ba dang mi snang bar 'gyur bar yang snang la/ 
105b8(mdo sde): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'bri ba dang mi snang ba dang / skye ba med de/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ nyi ma'i grangs dang / yud tsam dang / 
106a1(mdo sde): yud tsam phyed dang / zla ba phyed dang / zla ba dang / lo bgrangs pa'i grangs bzhag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bya ba de lta bu de dag 'byung yang
106a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'bri ba dang / 'phel ba 'am/ mi snang bar 'gyur ba med de/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyis rnam par smin pa dang / nyi
106a3(mdo sde): ma'i dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
106a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags dpa'i sems can rnams kyis nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang // dregs pa yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir dang / sngon gyi
106a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la bzud pa'iphyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos
106a6(mdo sde): 'grib pa dang / nub par kun tu ston te/ 'jam dpal sems can gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos nub pa dang / 'grib pa dang / 'phel bar 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jam
106a7(mdo sde): dpal sems can gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dper na/ nam mkha' la gnas/ nam mkha'
106a8(mdo sde): la brtan nas sems can thams cad kyi bya ba sna tshogs dag 'byung yang / nam mkha' ni ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ 'dus ma byas pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ brjod du med pa/ 
106b1(mdo sde): brjod par bya ba ma yin pa/ gnyis su med pa/ gnyen po med pa ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba sna tshogs dag 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshes/ 
106b2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la brten nas/ sems can thams cad kyi bya ba
106b3(mdo sde): thams cad 'byung yang / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi skye mi 'gag ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ brjod du med pa/ brjod
106b4(mdo sde): par bya ba ma yin pa/ gnyis su med pa/ gnyen po med pa ste/ de 'on kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / spyod pa dang / smon la dam gyi stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis lhun gyis grub cing
106b5(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog par sems can rnams la de'i chos kyi mdzad/ ba sna tshogs dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal thag/ pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs
106b6(mdo sde): rgyas la dmigs pa'i yid la bya ba gcig gis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag tu rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs
106b7(mdo sde): med pa dag ni bla na med pa'i/ ya shas rtog par 'gyur bar byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar byed/ sems can dpag
106b8(mdo sde): tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni tshangs pa thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu
107a1(mdo sde): med/ grangs med pa dag ni 'phrul dga'i lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba
107a2(mdo sde): thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni 'jab bral gyi lha'i gnas su skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lho'o
107a3(mdo sde): gnas su skye ba thob par byed/ seMn dngag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni rgyal chen gzhi'i lci gnas skye ba theb par byed// seMn dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni lha'i rgyal po thob par byed/ seMn dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag
107a4(mdo sde): ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob par byed/ sems ca/ na dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu
107a5(mdo sde): med/ grangs med pa dag ni klu'i dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni gnod sprin gyi dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ 
107a6(mdo sde): grangs med pa dag ni dri za'i dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni mi
107a7(mdo sde): 'am ci'i dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni mi'i rgyal po thob par
107a8(mdo sde): byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni mir skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni/ rigs chen por skye ba thob par byed na/ thal mo sbyar
107b1(mdo sde): blta ci smos/ gdugs pa phul ba lta ci smos/ de bzhin du mar me phul ba lta ci smos/ spos phul ba lta ci smos/ me tog phul ba lta ci smos/ mchod pa rnam pa mang po gzhan phul ba lta ci
107b2(mdo sde): smos na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang nyan pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa lta ci smos/ dam pa'i chos rnams mang po yongs su 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/ de bas ches grangs med pa'i
107b3(mdo sde): sangs rgya kyi mdzad pas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med par sems can
107b4(mdo sde): dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje/ 'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob pa ni bla'i/ byang chub sem/ sems dpa' sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byas chos dang dag
107b5(mdo sde): 'dun mnyes par ma byas pa ni de lta ma yin no// 'jam de pal de la sangs rgyas la mi mnyes par byed pa dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mi mnyes par byed pa ni tha na bdag gi
107b6(mdo sde): chung ma la mi tshangs par spyod pa las byung ba'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par zhe sdang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa dang / 
107b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la khyad du gsod pa dang / chos spong ba dang / chos 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la gus par mi byed pa dang / dge ba'i bshas gnyen la bsnyen bkur mi
107b8(mdo sde): byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'dor ba dang / bla ma dang / sbyin pa'i gnas dang / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze yang dag par song ba dang / 
108a1(mdo sde): yang dag par zhugs pa la gus par mi byed pa dang / chos smra ba/ chos khyad par can rtogs pa/ chos rgya chen po ston pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa/ 
108a2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi bya ba shes pa/ gzugs dang / mdo sde'i rgyal po thob pa rnams la mi 'dud cing / rjid byed pa dang / khengs pa yin/ chos dang / chos smra ba la mi gus pa
108a3(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / sri zhu dang / rim gro mi byed pa dang / chos rgya mtsho chen po bsgrags pa byung na/ la la zhig dad par gyur na/ mi rung ngo snyam nas/ chos smra ba'i gang zag la legs so zhes bya bar
108a4(mdo sde): sbyin par mi byed pa dang / bdag shes pa la mi 'jug pa dang // chos la nges par sems pa mi skyed pa dang / mngonadapa'i nga rgyal skyed de bsngags par 'os pa'i gang zag
108a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi bsngag pa bcabs shing mi snyan pa brjod pa dang / pha rol gyi yon tan dang / bsngags pa la mi dga' ba yin/ gang zag la zhe sdang bas/ chos la zhe sdang bar byed
108a6(mdo sde): cing chos spong ba dang / gzhan dag kyang rtsod du 'jug pa dang / stan mthon po 'dod cing thabs tshol ba dang / gzhan las rim gror bya ba bdag gir byed cing mngon par dga' ba dang / gnas
108a7(mdo sde): gtan rgan zhing yun ring du tshangs par sprad pa rnams la rim gro mi byed cing / btsu bar mi byed la bzhin khro gnyer can yin/ rtag tu sems rtsub cing klan ka tshol ba dang / klag lta ba dang / 
108a8(mdo sde): nga rgyal bskyed nas mkhas pa'i gan du mi 'gro mi sten/ bsnyen por mi byed/ bkur bsti mi byed cing / dge ba ni gang / mi dge ba ni gang / bya ba gang / bya ba ma yin pa ni gang / ci zhig
108b1(mdo sde): byas na/ yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur zhes mi 'dri ba dang / nges par 'byung bar mi lta zhing / rtsod pa mang ba yin te/ 'jam dpal de ltar na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 
108b2(mdo sde): dge 'dun mi mnyes par byed pa yin no// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshas gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ rgya mtsho
108b3(mdo sde): dam pa'i snying po dri ma med par snang ba 'od gsal ba'i gzung thob par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa bya ba khrag
108b4(mdo sde): khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag tu sam das can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rnam tsha/ 
108b5(mdo sde): 'di la rna par smin par 'gyur te/ glad pa tshabs so/ rims tsha bas so// rtsib lo gra na bas sam/ rgyal srid 'khrugs pas sam/ kla klo 'khrugs pas sam/ mu ge'i 'khrug pas sam/ lus
108b6(mdo sde): la gnod pa dang / yid la gnod pa gang yang rung bas brgyad bkag pas kyang tshe gcig la byang bar 'gyur te/ tha na rmi lam tsam gyis kyang byung bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes
108b7(mdo sde): gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bru phrag dpag tu med pa dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sbyin pa las byung ba dang / mchod pa las byung
108b8(mdo sde): ba dang / de dag gi zad nas bslab pa bzung ba las byung ba rnams snga dro gcig gis zil gyis gnon te/ de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bya ba ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab
109a1(mdo sde): / bo/ 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gter bcu rnyed par 'gyur te/ cu ga she na/ dus kyi rlomod la bgrang bar sbyor ba'i gter dang / sangs kyi rlotha~M
109a2(mdo sde): la nges par sems dpa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzungs snang ba'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu ston pa'i gter dang / 
109a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brjod du med pa'i tshul la mkhas pa rtogs par byed pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba'i
109a4(mdo sde): gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du da sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i gtar dang / sangs rgyas tham/ das cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'i gter dang / sgra
109a5(mdo sde): mar gyur pa'i bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'gru/ ba par 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i gter dang / sangs rgya sa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dge'
109a6(mdo sde): ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dang ba chen po 'thob pa'i gtar ro// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang bcu thob par 'gyur te/ 
109a7(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe'i tshang bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag tu byin gyis rlob pa'i phyir/ che la dbang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med/ grangs med pa
109a8(mdo sde): ngag la nges par sems pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i phyir/ sems la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bkod pa dang / rgyan du mas brgyan pa'i byin gyis rlabs kun
109b1(mdo sde): tu ston pa'i phyir yo byad la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba kun tu ston pa'i phyir/ skye ba la dbang ba dang dus ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob pa/ 
109b2(mdo sde): pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir/ las la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gang bar byin gyis rlob pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir/ mos pa la dbang ba dang / dus gang dang gang
109b3(mdo sde): gi tshe/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'dod pa'i dus de dang der byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang / gang du 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
109b4(mdo sde): dang der byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir/ smon lam la dbang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir/ 
109b5(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / mtha' dang dpung med pa'i chos kyi/ sgo snang ba kun tu ston pa'i phyir/ chos la dbang ba da/ nga / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / ma
109b6(mdo sde): 'jigs pa dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po rnams dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu ston pa'i phyir ye shes la dbang po 'o// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yod
109b7(mdo sde): su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni skra'i khyon tsam gcig la phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i mthas klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'jug par byed kyang / sems can gang la
109b8(mdo sde): yang gnod pa dang sgrib pa med de/ sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin no// bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med pa rnams yud tsam gcig tu byin
110a1(mdo sde): gyis rlob cing yud tsam gcig ni bskal pa dpag tu med zang med/ bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis rlob te/ bskal pa re re la yang mes 'jig pa dang / chus 'jig pa dang / 
110a2(mdo sde): rlung gis 'jig pa byin gyis rlob kyang sems can gang la yang yo byad cis kyang phongs par mi 'gyur zhing / lus la gnod pa 'am/ sems la mi bde ba yang mi 'byung la/ sems can gang / 
110a3(mdo sde): ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba des bya ba de lta bu yang shes so// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na phyog bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs
110a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa'i bar gyi khams rnams suka 'jig rten gyi khams re rer rdul phra rab kyi rdul re ra la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa'i lus rnams kyis/ 
110a5(mdo sde): lus re res kyang dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dga' ba spyod par sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / 
110a6(mdo sde): bdud 'dul ba ston pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang ston s+ho// 'jam dpal
110a7(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re rer rdu za rab kyi rdul re re la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthas klas
110a8(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'jug par byed cing / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yin pa de dag zhing gcig tu ston par byed/ 
110b1(mdo sde): shing gcig gi d+han gyi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yin pa de dag cing thams cad du ston par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang na yang sa
110b2(mdo sde): la gnas nas kyang mi g.yo'o// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sem
110b3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi lus sems can gcig gis lus su ston to// sems can gcig gi lus sems can thams cad kyi lus su ston kyang lus 'dres par yang mi byed de/ sems can gang / 
110b4(mdo sde): la la yang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / bya ba de lta bu de ya dang ston to// lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sedams can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do// 'jig
110b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi sangs rgyas gci ga tu byin gyis rlob cing de bzhin gshegs pa ga/ cig kyang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis mthas klas pa'i de
110b6(mdo sde): bzhin ga bshags pa thams cad du byin gyis rlob la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dres par yang mi 'gyur te lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba de lta bu thams cad kyang
110b7(mdo sde): ston to// lus gcig gis mnyam par 'jog la lus dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag gis ldang zhing lus dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis mnyam par bzhag la/ lus gcig
110b8(mdo sde): gis ldang ngo // / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi dbyings
111a1(mdo sde): la spyod yul pa yang yin la/ sems can gyi khams la spyod yul par yang snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la mngon par dga' ba yang yin la/ bdud kyi spyod
111a2(mdo sde): yul bar yang snang ngo // mya ngan las 'das pa'i spyod yul pa yang yin la/ 'khor ba spyod yul par yang snang ngo // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes spyod yul ba yang yin la/ byang
111a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyod yul bar snang ngo // zhi ba'i spyod yul pa yang yin la/ ma zhi ba dang / rab tu ma zhi ba dang / nye bar ma zhi ba'i spyod yul bar yang snang ste/ sems can rnams kyang
111a4(mdo sde): 'dul lo// blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / ma spros pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /  / dngos po med pa dang / shes par bya ba med pa dang
111a5(mdo sde): bar snang dang mtshungs pa spyod yul pa yang yin la/ spros/ pa dang / mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa spyod yul ba'i/ sems can thams cad kyi nang na yang snang ngo // stobs
111a6(mdo sde): bkod pa spyod yul pa yang yin la/ gzugs bzang po'i spyod yul par yang snang ngo // chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pas gnyen po spyod yul pa yang yin la/ sama?/ 
111a7(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod yul bar yang snang ngo // ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i spyod yul pa yang
111a8(mdo sde): yin la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / 
111b1(mdo sde): 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / 
111b2(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa dang / sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / drod ga shar las skyes pa dang / rdzus
111b3(mdo sde): te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes can dang / 'du shes can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes mod 'du shes med min nas/ gzugs med pa'i bar
111b4(mdo sde): gyi sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par yang sna dang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa dang / mngon da par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bkod
111b5(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyi spyod yul thob pa yang yin la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho ga dang / spyod yul yang kun tu ston to// 'jam dpal dge pa'i
111b6(mdo sde): bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi sgra sems can gcig gi slar 'jug par byed la/ sems can gcig gi sgra sems can
111b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sgrar 'jug par byed cing / sgra rnams 'dres par yang mi 'gyur la/ sems can gang gi sgra la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su
111b8(mdo sde): zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad rang gi lus sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i
112a1(mdo sde): khams dang / rlung gi khams su byin gyi rlob bo// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi lus la zhing gi lus/ 
112a2(mdo sde): kun tu ston kyang / sems can gyi lus dang 'dres par yang mi byed/ zhing gi lus la sems can gyi lus kun tu ston kyang zhing gi lus dang 'dres par mi byed do// sangs rgyas kyi sku la nyan thos
112a3(mdo sde): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus su kun tu ston kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sku dman par yang mi byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus la sangs rgyas kyi sku kun tu ston kyang / nyan thos
112a4(mdo sde): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rgya chen por yang mi byed do// da spyod pa'i lus la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku kun tu ston kyang / spyod pa'i rgyun chad par yang mi byed do// / 
112a5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgra la spyod pa'i lus kun tu ston kyang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku nyams par yang mi byed do// mya ngan las 'das pa 'khor
112a6(mdo sde): ba'i rgyun tu ston kyang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par zhen pa yang mi skyed do// 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das par kun tu ston kyang / gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya/ 
112a7(mdo sde): ngan lda rU par yang mi byed do// mnyam par yang bzhag la bya ba thams cad kyang ston te/ 'di lta ste/ 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / nyal bar byed do// spyod lam thams cad kyang / 
112a8(mdo sde): na tu ston la ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'khrugs par yang mi byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi zhabs drung na chos nyan par yang snang la/ grogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ra/ 
112b1(mdo sde): 'byam thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag na gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog yongs su 'grub pa gzhan dang / gzhan dag
112b2(mdo sde): gos kyang rno kyang nyan la ting nge 'dzin tha dad par yang mi byed cing / chos kyang len la 'dzin te 'don cing kun chub par yang byed la/ sangs rgyas de dag las chos nyan pa'i rgyun chad par yang mi byed// 
112b3(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog yongs su 'grub pa tha dad pas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par yang byed la/ 
112b4(mdo sde): lus tha dad par yang mi byed cing gnas nas kyang mi g.yo'o// da phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du bya ba thams cad kun tu sten kyang / ting nge 'dzin
112b5(mdo sde): dad par yang mi byed do// sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la ting nge 'a dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ gra ngas med pa dag kyang mngon par sgrub la/ ting nge 'dzin tha
112b6(mdo sde): dad par yang mi byed de/ 'jam dpal rnam grangs des na/ rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mthas
112b7(mdo sde): klas pa'i bskal par ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgrub pa mngon par sgrub kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgrub pa rnams kyi mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal byang chub
112b8(mdo sde): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs po de thams cad ni/ dge ba'i bshas gnyen las nges par 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo brjod du med pa mngon par
113a1(mdo sde): sgrub pa mtha' yas dpag tu med/ grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med pa dag dang / gzungs thob pa phun sum tshogs pa
113a2(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang dge pa'i bshas gnyen las nges par byung ngo // stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi
113a3(mdo sde): khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'jam dpal mdor bsdu na de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas
113a4(mdo sde): kyi chos bsgrub pa mtha' yas pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni dge ba'i dbashes gnyen las nges par byung ba yin no// 'jam dpal/ 
113a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i sgo la 'jug pa sems can la kun tu ston pa'i yul dang / 
113a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs su mngon par bsgrub pa 'gro ba thams cad shes par byed pa'i yul dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sprul pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i
113a7(mdo sde): yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa'i lusu mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / 
113a8(mdo sde): nam mkha'i khams 'jig rten gyi khams su mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i khams su mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das
113b1(mdo sde): par mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa 'khor bar mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / sems can gyi skad brjod pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa'i yul
113b2(mdo sde): dang / gdong dang / lus mtha' yas pa kun tu bstan pa/ lus gcig tu byin gyis rlob cing / lus kyi rim pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / lus gcig gis chos kyi
113b3(mdo sde): dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'i yul dang / sems can gcig gi sems bskyed pa rnams la sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig ra re la yang sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i byang
113b4(mdo sde): chub rnam par mi rtog pa'i yul dang / 'jam dpal da la sogs pa yul bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu dmed/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag byang
113b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la yang dag par 'grub bo// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams
113b6(mdo sde): cad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu mos shing 'jug go// 'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mos shing 'jug go// 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad pad+ma'i
113b7(mdo sde): gdan gcig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig gis yongs su khyab par mos shing 'jug go// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du kun tu ston par mos
113b8(mdo sde): shing 'jug go// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rgyan du mos shing / 'jug go// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis yongs su khyab
114a1(mdo sde): par mos shing 'jug go// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'jog par mos shing 'jug go// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig
114a2(mdo sde): tu 'jug pa dang ldan par mos shing 'jug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa cig gi byang chub kyi shing dang / byang chub kyi snying po yongs su khyab par mos shing 'jug
114a3(mdo sde): go/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sgra skad gcig gi go bar byed cing / sems can gyi khams sna tshogs kyi sgra la 'jug pas tshim par byed par mos shing 'jug go// sems can thams
114a4(mdo sde): cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / lus su mos shing 'jug go/ sam das can gyi khams thams cad sems can gcig gi lus nga la 'jug pa dang ldan par mos shing 'jug go// sems
114a5(mdo sde): can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i khong du so// nga bar mos shing 'jug go/ sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i khong du zhugs par
114a6(mdo sde): mos shing 'jug go/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sems can gcig gi lus la rten par mos shing 'jug go/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sangs
114a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du mos shing 'jug go/ sems can gyi khams thams cad brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba gang 'dod pa dang / mos pa'i gzugs dang / lus
114a8(mdo sde): dang / kha dog dang / rtags la mngon du phyogs pa ston par mos shing 'jug go// sems can gyi khams thams cad nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / lus dang / 
114b1(mdo sde): kha dog dang / rtags dang / tshul du ston par mos shing 'jug go// sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyis legs par brgyan pa'i byin gyis rlabs kun tu
114b2(mdo sde): ston par mos shing 'jug go/ sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog sna
114b3(mdo sde): tshogs dang / spyod lam dang / spyod pa kun tu ston pa gzhan shes par byed par mos shing 'jug go/ 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems
114b4(mdo sde): dpa' ni 'dod pa'i khams nas kyang mi g.yo la/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa nu spyod pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
114b5(mdo sde): 'jug pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag/ gis dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// nyan thos kyi lam mngon du shes pa la zhugs pa yang yin la/ snying rje
114b6(mdo sde): chen po'i stobs kyang rgyun mi gcod do// rang sangs rgyas kyi le ma mngon tu shes shing mthong ba la mkhas pa yang yin le snying rje chen po'i stobs kyang rgyun mi gcod do// g.yog
114b7(mdo sde): 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor ba yang yin la/ lha dang mi'i g.yog 'khor mang po rnam par dag pa dang yang ldan no// lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag dag glu dbyangs rjes su sgrog shing / 
114b8(mdo sde): sil snyan 'bum dag sil khrol 'byin pa dang yang ldan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang
115a1(mdo sde): mi 'dor ro// 'gro ba'i dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / gzhad gang dang / 'jo sgregs thams cad dang / sems can rkam chags pa'i 'du 'dzi thams cad kyi nang na gnas pa
115a2(mdo sde): yang yin la/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la yang byang chub kyi sems kyi mnyam pa nyid kyang mi 'dor ro// 'jig rten las 'das pa yang yin te/ 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres la/ pha rol
115a3(mdo sde): tu 'gro ba'i lam la slob par yang snang zhing las dang nyon mongs par bying pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par yang byed do// lam la gnas shing lam ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa mthong
115a4(mdo sde): pa la zhugs pa yang yin la/ lam ngan par ltung ba'i sam/ sa can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ lam nga/ na pa na yang snang zhing / lam de la snying por 'du shes
115a5(mdo sde): pa yang ma yin la/ des dag par 'dod pa yang ma yin no// lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa yang yin te/ rtag tu tshul khrims legs
115a6(mdo sde): par bsrungs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la yang gzhol la/ sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ byis pa so so'i skye
115a7(mdo sde): bo phal pa'i spyod yul pa la yang kun tu snang ngo // bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsags shing / byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba la yang gzhol la/ ngan 'gror skyes pa'i sems
115a8(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom pa dang / dbul po'i khyim du 'gro ba'i skye ba yang kun
115b1(mdo sde): tu ston la/ 'gro ba der yang dag par gzhol ba yang ma yin no// ye shes dang spongs pa thogs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pas gzhan gyi dring la mi 'dzeg pa'i ye shes la
115b2(mdo sde): mkhas pa yang yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/ byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang / lus gzugs gcig tu gyur pa dang / 
115b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i tshul dang / dgongs pa snang ba rtogs pa dang / theg pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad/ 
115b4(mdo sde): kyi spyod yul la mngon tu phyogs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cadakyis bsngags par 'os pa dang / sems can gyi/ dmas thams cad kyis gdong du blta ba dang / 'gro ba thams
115b5(mdo sde): cad kyi slob dpon du gyur pa dang / zab cing brtan pa'i rgyumatsho'i chu'i dus rlabs lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam khar rtse ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / kha dog mtha' yas
115b6(mdo sde): pa yongs su 'grub pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa yang yin la/ chos yongs su tshol ba'i rgyun yang mi gcod do// lha dang / me dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi slob
115b7(mdo sde): dpon dam pa yang yin la/ cog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas/ mkhan po dang / slob dpon las chos len par yang kun tu ston cing / gus par bya ba thams cad kyis nye bar gnas
115b8(mdo sde): par yang snang ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gnas nas thabs gang dang gang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin pa 'am/ 'dul bar 'gyur ba thabs de dang de nyid sems can rnams
116a1(mdo sde): // da d+hag sa d+ma r+b+ha gas pa dang / rgyu chub sems dang 'i spyod pa mas kyim sbyi dang / banis mas pag
116a2(mdo sde): kyis dang bskur ngas dang bsrung ba dang / tshod kyi dbang phyug gi bdag po ngas pa'i mchog thob pa dang / chos kyi cod pan thogs pa rnyed cing / dri ma med pa brtsis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
116a3(mdo sde): khas thams cad du thogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra kun tu ston pa dang / thogs pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i byin gyis rlangs dang / ldan pa dang / lus gzugs
116a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams sems cad du zhugs pa dang ldan pa de / chos thams cad ni dbang phyug dam pa mchog thob pa dadong ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang rnams
116a5(mdo sde): nga so pa dang / 'gro ba ni sems cad du smra pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa 'aM/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / dmyur byung ba'i de bzhinag shag
116a6(mdo sde): ba thams cad dang / yul gcig tu gyur pa yang yin la/ byang chub sem pa'i sto ni rgyun yang mi gcod/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du bya ba'i stobs las kyang yongs su ma
116a7(mdo sde): nyams/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i byin gyis rlabs las kyang thag ring du mi 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyang mi 'dor/ byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi mtha' las
116a8(mdo sde): kyang mi mda'/ byang chub sems dpa'i lom las kyang phyir mi ldog/ byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la zhum par yang mi byed do// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshas gnyen gyis yongs
116b1(mdo sde): su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad la blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / 'deg pa med pa dang / 'jog pa med pa dang / sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / mig
116b2(mdo sde): yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / chu zla dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / brjod du med pa dang / slar med pa dang / 
116b3(mdo sde): bsnyad du med pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang / mtsha nyid dang / lder med pa dang / gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba de ni de'i dmigs pa yin te/ chos
116b4(mdo sde): thams cad ni gnyen po med pa'i phyir ro// chos thams ca dra ces bya ba de ni de'i dmigs pa ste/ 'du shes 'dzi na pa'i phyir dmigs pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems
116b5(mdo sde): med pa las sems dmigs pa ni 'du shes phyin ci log yi na pa'i phyir te/ sems phyin ci log tu gyur na/ sems myos par 'gyur ro// sems
116b6(mdo sde): myos na sems bslad par 'gyur ro// sems bslad pa las soms skrag par 'gyur ro// sems skrag pa las byang chub kyi sems nyams par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de lta bas na/ 
116b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rjes su blta bar bya'o// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang bcu thob par 'gyur te/ 
116b8(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang
117a1(mdo sde): dbang pa dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba'o// rnam par 'phrul pa bcu yang 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems
117a2(mdo sde): can rnam par sprul pa dang / zhing rnam par sprul pa dang / chos rnam par sprul pa dang / lus rnam par sprul pa dang / smon lam rnam par sprul pa dang / spyod yul rnam par sprul pa
117a3(mdo sde): dang / ye shes rnam par sprul pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par sprul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa dang / stobs rnam par sprul pa'o// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen
117a4(mdo sde): gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems/ can gyi khams thams cad kyi mos pa la 'jug pa da dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nyid la 'jug pa dang / phyog
117a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dri ba rnam par 'byed pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams steng g.yogs med cing gzhi bya/ ba'i rgyud thams cad la 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad
117a6(mdo sde): gcig pa dang / tha dad pa nyid rab 'byam rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa la 'jug pa dang / las thams cad bsgyur bar gzhug pa la 'jug pa dang / 'du shes phyin ci log gis phyin ci/ 
117a7(mdo sde): log tu gyur pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes can tha dad pa nyid la 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad bsgyur ba la 'jug pa'i mtha' nges par 'byung ba gcig la 'jug pa
117a8(mdo sde): dang / chos kyi'i sa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul par byin gyis rlob pa la 'jug pa dang / 'gro 'i bas dus gsus la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas thams ca/ 
117b1(mdo sde): kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub bo// 'jam dpal dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
117b2(mdo sde): 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sbyin pa las byung ba dang / mchod pa las byung ba dang / de dag gi zad nas bslab pa gzung ba las byung ba rnams
117b3(mdo sde): snga dro gcig gis zil gyis gnon te/ 'jam dpal de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su
117b4(mdo sde): zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
117b5(mdo sde): mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams re re/ na rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re lA dus gsum la 'jug cing bskal pa'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par bskal par byin gyis
117b6(mdo sde): brlabs te/ dus gsum la 'jug pa'i chos ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rtag pa/ 
117b7(mdo sde): brtan pa/ ther zug pa yin pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshAs gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro// 
117b8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'du shes phyin ci log gis sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no// zhes
118a1(mdo sde): mngon par zhen nas chos spong bar byed do// mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs kyang byed do// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa med de/ 'jam
118a2(mdo sde): dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ gnyis su med pa/ gnyen po med pa/ sgra las yang dag par 'das pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
118a3(mdo sde): gnyen po med pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnyis ni mtha' ste/ 'jam dpal mtha' gang yin pa/ 
118a4(mdo sde): de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin te/ 'jam dpal sangs rgya/ nas kyi chos ni mtha' med pa'i ngo bo nyid do// 'jam dang / la mtha' med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni ma skye/ mi 'gag go// 
118a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal mi skye mi 'gag pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' dang mtha' med pa yongs su spangs pa ste/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ sgra las yang dag par 'das pa gdags
118a6(mdo sde): par bya ba ma yin po/ gnyis su med pa/ gnyen po med pa'o// 'jam dpal gang gnyen po med pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag go/ gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin no// 
118a7(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku ste/ shin tu ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba ma 'gog pa'o// de la ni tshig med mod kyi/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / spyod pa
118a8(mdo sde): dang / smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ sems can dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo // 'jam dpal dper na/ nor bu rin po che chu 'dang bar byed pa/ chu'i
118b1(mdo sde): nang du bcug ma thag tu/ 'dam rdzab dang / rnyog ma thams cad 'dang bar byed kyang / 'jam dpal nor bu rin po che chu 'dang bar byed pa ni/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub
118b2(mdo sde): cing / rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byung ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi sems
118b3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab dang / rnyog pa thams cad dang bar byed kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog sa
118b4(mdo sde): 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par ma rtog par de'i bya da ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dper na/ rdza ma khan gyi 'khor lo shin tu myur zhing / stobs kyi shugs
118b5(mdo sde): kyis 'phangs pa ni/ rdza mkhan gyi dbang gi snod spyad sna tshog sa mngon par 'du byed kyang 'jam dpal rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun
118b6(mdo sde): gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sngon gyi dge bar
118b7(mdo sde): rtsa ba dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi shugs kyis sems can gyi dbang gis sems can rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs mngon par 'du mdzad kyang / de bzhin
118b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal
119a1(mdo sde): sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la bshos gsol pa dang / gang dag bshos mi gsol ba dang / gang dag gi mthong ba dang / gang dag gis ma mthong ba dang / 
119a2(mdo sde): gang dag stod pa dang / gang dag mi stong pa dang / gang gshad pa dang / gang dag mi bsha pa dang / gang dag zhu ba byed pa dang / gang dag zhu ba mi byed pa de dag thams cad kyi bye ba rnams kyang / sangs// 
119a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa thams cad kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs
119a4(mdo sde): su zin pa las 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa dngas rgyas kyi sku dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su
119a5(mdo sde): 'grub pa'i bsgrubs pa'i gzungs 'thob ste/ gzungs de thob pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams/ thams cad sangs rgyas kyi skus khyab par byed do// 'jig
119a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams re rer yang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku ston to// lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba grangs med pa dang / chos tha dad pa nyid grangs
119a7(mdo sde): med pa ston te gnas nas kyang mi g.yo'o// 'jam dpal de ltar na dag pa'i bshas gnyen ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal de lta bas na/ byang chub
119a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la bya ba bzhin du dge ba'i bshas gnyen rnams la bstan par bya'o// bsnyen par bya'o// bsnyen bkur bya'o// 'jam dpal mi dge ba'i gshes
119b1(mdo sde): gnyen rnams ni brag gi bya skyibs rab tu 'bar ba bzhin du yongs su spang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang / 'du
119b2(mdo sde): shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro// sems phyin ci log tu gyur na/ kun tu 'khrul par 'gyur ro// sems kun tu 'khrul par gyur na/ rnam par rmongs par 'gyur ro// sems rnam par rmongs
119b3(mdo sde): na skrag par 'gyur ro// sems skrag par gyur na/ byang chub kyi sems 'dor bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems bor na lha yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro// lha yongs su gtong na/ lha rnams
119b4(mdo sde): kyang de la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ro// klu rna dmas dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / da mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / mi
119b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi ma yin pa rnams nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ba ra dag kyang de la bsdogs pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur/ ro// 'jam dpal de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'
119b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams bsten par bya'o// bsnyen par bya'o// bsnyen bkur bya'o// 'jam dpal dper na/ skyabs shes bya ba'i sman ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i
119b7(mdo sde): senAs dang ldan pas mthong yang rung ste/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba de dag gi nad thams cad med par 'gyur yang / skyabs shes bya ba'i sman ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ ma 'dres
119b8(mdo sde): pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dngapal de bzhin du gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems
120a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur mor bris pa dang / gzugs su byas pa mthong na/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba yang rung ste/ de dag gis
120a2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad med par 'gyur yang de bzhin ga sh+ya ba ni mi rtog rno bar mi rtog ste/ ma 'dres par chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba de lta bu da
120a3(mdo sde): 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par 'phags te/ nam mkha'i spyod yul la gnas nas/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs
120a4(mdo sde): med pa btang bas/ grong dang / khrong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i phra bra/ dang 'khor thams cad du mthong ba sbyin par byed cing / 
120a5(mdo sde): mun pa sel bar byed/ 'dam rdzab dang / rnyog pa thams cad skems par byed/ pad+ma rnams kyang kha 'bye bar byed/ rtswa dang / shing gal pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal
120a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang skye bar byed/ sman thams cad kyang yongs su smin par byed/ lnga kyi gan thad ni gan+da par byed la/ chu klung dang / mtshe'u dang / mtsho bran thod la yang dus gcig tu snang ba thob par 'gyur yang gan
120a7(mdo sde): las kyang mi ga yo zhing / 'jam dpal nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog
120a8(mdo sde): par de'i bya ba de lta bu de rtag tu 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang srid pa'i rgya mtsho las mngon par
120b1(mdo sde): 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha'i spyod yul la gnas nas/ ye shes kyi 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa btang bas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad/ 
120b2(mdo sde): du snang ba sbyin par mdzad cing / sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang / rab rib dang / ling rtog rnams rnam par sel bar mdzad/ nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab dang rnyog pa
120b3(mdo sde): thams cad skams par mdzad/ yun ring po nas gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can gyi khams ni sad par mdzad/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ni skye bar mdzad/ 
120b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad ni yongs su smin par mdzad/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo tham mas cad na rab tu 'jog par mdzad de/ dus gcig tu
120b5(mdo sde): de'i mdzad pa thams cad 'byung yang gnas nas kyang mig yo zhing / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi/ rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos
120b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog pa'i
120b7(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i gnas rnams kyang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa las 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yongs su
120b8(mdo sde): zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' na chos rab tu rnam par 'byed cing / dpyod pa la mkhas par 'gyur te/ de chos rnams la 'di ltar dpyod do// mig ni gzugs kyi dmigs pa'i
121a1(mdo sde): rgyu ma yin/ gzugs kyang mig gi dmigs pa'i rgyu ma yin la/ dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen nyid kyis kyang rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ rnam par shes pa de yang mig las
121a2(mdo sde): kyang ma byung / gzugs las kyang ma byung zhing / rnam par shes pa de ni byung nas zhig la/ zhu zhing ma gnas pa'o// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyang de bzhin no// yid kyang chos
121a3(mdo sde): kyi rkyen ma yin zhing chos kyang yid kyi rkyen ma yin la dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis kyang rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ rnam par shes pa de ni yid laklung ma byung / chos rnam lnga kyang ma byung
121a4(mdo sde): zhing / yid kyi rnam par shes pa de ni byung nas zhig la zhu rang zhing mi gnas pa'o// de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba yang / byang chub kyi rkyen ma yin/ byang chub kyang dag pa'i rtsa ba'i
121a5(mdo sde): rkyen ma yin mod kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang byang chub kyi/ rkyen lnga dmig pa las/ sam skye ba rnams kyis skye ste/ de dag kyang skyes nas zhig cing zhu la mi gnas pa'o// 
121a6(mdo sde): de la sems gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / sems gang gis byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de gnyis ni phan tshun mi sbyor ro// dper na me ni gang nas kyang mi
121a7(mdo sde): 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro ste/ 'on kyang rgyu dang rkyen gyis 'bar ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi me 'bar ba yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro
121a8(mdo sde): ste/ 'on kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi me 'bar te/ shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
121b1(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// dza pal de ltar na dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa yin no// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gi
121b2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas/ nyan thos dang bcas pa rnams la rtag par nyin cig bzhin du
121b3(mdo sde): zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i na bza' dag phul la/ de ltar 'bul ba bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu phul zhing de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das
121b4(mdo sde): nas de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i phyir yang / phyogs bcu nga'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thad du 'jig rten gyi kham+ba re re yang mchod rten 'ang bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ nor bu rin po che
121b5(mdo sde): klog gi sgron mas spras pa/ nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stegs bus yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i 'phreng bas mdzes par
121b6(mdo sde): byas pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bskrang ba/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i byug pas byugs pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra ba
121b7(mdo sde): khebs par byas pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag byas te/ mchod rten de dge la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad tsam gyi lha'i na bza' dag dang / gdugs kyi/ 
121b8(mdo sde): sprin dag dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dag dang / ba dan gyi sprin dag dang / me tog gi sprin dag dang / spos kyi sprin dag dang / nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i sprin dag dang / yid bzhin
122a1(mdo sde): gyi nor bu rin po che'i sprin dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor la nyin gcig bzhin de ltar mchod cing bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mchod la/ sems can
122a2(mdo sde): gzhan dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag kyang mchod pa de nyid la 'god pa bas 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis de bzhin gshegs
122a3(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la tha na mos par byed na/ 'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par
122a4(mdo sde): bskyed do// 'jam dpal chos kyis rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i nga byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol tu phyin pa bye ba khrag khridag 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag yongs
122a5(mdo sde): su rdzogs par byed do// sa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag da/ bag tu med/ grangs med pa dag gnon to// bskal pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med
122a6(mdo sde): pa dag phyir snyil bar byed do// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag rab tu shes so// nga rgyal gyi ri dpag tu med/ grangs med
122a7(mdo sde): pa dag rnam par 'jig par byed do// phrag dog dang / ser sna'i rgyal mtshan dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag snyol bar byed do// sred pa'i chu klung dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag bskam
122a8(mdo sde): par byed do// skye ba'i rgya mtsho dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag las rgal dar byed do// bdud kyi zhags pa dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag gcod do// nyi zla rnams dang / brgya byin
122b1(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te 'dug go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / 
122b2(mdo sde): yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang phrad par 'gyuraro// 
122b3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// chos thams cad la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i
122b4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rin po che
122b5(mdo sde): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// dga' ba byed pa zhwa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// pad+ma dko/ da pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thod bo// nam
122b6(mdo sde): mkha' mdzod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// 'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob po// dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i
122b7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob po// yul la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// cher bsgyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob po// rnam pa dang sam+ba la dbang byed pa zhes bya
122b8(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob po// seng ge sgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// mtha' yas 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting
123a1(mdo sde): / 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rab tu g.yo ba'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rdo rje'i rgyal
123a2(mdo sde): mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob po// rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rdo rje lte ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// sa 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob
123a3(mdo sde): po// lhun po sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob po// lhun po rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob po// rin po che'i mdzod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// sems la
123a4(mdo sde): dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// se dmas can thams cad kyi sems la dbang byed pa zhes bya ra ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// spyod pa thams cad kyis yul
123a5(mdo sde): las nges par byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin kyang 'thobapo// sbyor ba zab cing gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// sna tshogs snang ba'i spobs pa zhes bya ba'i
123a6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob po// bltar mi mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob po// chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// 
123a7(mdo sde): rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// mngon par shes pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang
123a8(mdo sde): 'thob po// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// gzugs thams
123b1(mdo sde): kyi khyad par zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob po// lus rnam par 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob po// spyod pa thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// shes
123b2(mdo sde): rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// mngon sum du byang chub snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// so so
123b3(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pa rin po che bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob po// chos thams cad 'dul bar rnam
123b4(mdo sde): par nges pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob bo// / rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i ti dang nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
123b5(mdo sde): 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// zab cing brtan pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu'i dus rlabs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// de dag la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
123b6(mdo sde): grangs med pa dag 'thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa bsgrubs pa'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob
123b7(mdo sde): po na sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// mi zad pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// mtha' yas khyil pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// rgya
123b8(mdo sde): mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// so so yang dag par
124a1(mdo sde): rig pa rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis byin gyis rlabs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi sku dang
124a2(mdo sde): kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob ste/ de dag la sogs pa gzungs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag kyang 'thob bo// chos thams cad la spyad
124a3(mdo sde): pa'i khyad par nyid kyang 'thob po// chos thams cad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa yang 'thob bo// chos thams cad la som nyid gcod pa nyid kyang 'thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa
124a4(mdo sde): stong phrag grangs med pa dag kyang 'thob po// sems can tha mas cad kyi spyod pa'i bye brag la mkhas pa yang 'thob bo// 'jadam dpal dper na/ ra'i rgyal po ri rab ni ri thams cad zil
124a5(mdo sde): gyis mnan nas/ lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// 'ja/ ma dpal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / sems can thams cad kyi dag
124a6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad zil gyis gnan nas lam me/ lhan ni/ lhang nga'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
124a7(mdo sde): sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpas gang dag la mos pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang / gzhan dag kyang 'thob pa'i chos kyi bye brag gzhan dag kyang
124a8(mdo sde): yod dam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems
124b1(mdo sde): dpa' gang dag la mos na/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang / gzhan dpag tu med pa dag kyang 'thob pa'i chos lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ chos thams cad gnyen po med pa dang / ma skyes pa
124b2(mdo sde): dang rnam 'gags pa dang / brjod du med par mos pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi chad par skad cig skad cig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa dang / spyod lam la 'jug pa'i gnas 'dzam bu'i gling
124b3(mdo sde): gi rdul las kyang lhag pa dag la lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mo rtog par 'jug par mos pa dang / seng ge bran bzangs kyi bu'i rtogs pa brjod pas/ sems can yongs su smin par byas pa de// 
124b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nas/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te ma dzad par mo sa pa dang / mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa
124b5(mdo sde): nas bzung ste/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i ba ra der bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang yin pa de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul
124b6(mdo sde): gyi mthas klas pa'i bskal pa nas/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan pa yin par mos pa dang / shAkya thub pas bstan pas sems can yongs su smin par byas pa gang yin
124b7(mdo sde): pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa'i bskal pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mdzad pa yin par mos pa ste/ 'jam dpal lnga po de dag ni
124b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas gang dag la mos pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang / gzhan dpag tu med pa dag kyang 'thob pa yin no// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
125a1(mdo sde): zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa rnams la nyin/ 
125a2(mdo sde): gcig bzhin du/ lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i gos dag byin te/ de ltar na byin pa bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
125a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyi ma gcig zas byin na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
125a4(mdo sde): bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang gtsug lag khang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ nor bu rin po glog gi 'phreng bas smras pa/ nor bu rin
125a5(mdo sde): po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stegs bus yongs su ba/ skor pa/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i 'a/ phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal
125a6(mdo sde): mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla re bros pa/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i drug pas byug pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos khebs par byas pa/ rgya mtshon
125a7(mdo sde): gnas pa'i rin po rnam par dag pa/ bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba nor bu rin po che'i ka ba mang pos dkrigs pas nor bu rin po che seng ge ral pa zhes bya ba'i spang lab bres pa nor bu
125a8(mdo sde): rin po che seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo las byas pa'i sgo gang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung gis brgyan pa/ dar gyi lda ldi mang pos bres pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
125b1(mdo sde): cad kyi rdul snyed dag byas te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas stong phrag grangs med dag dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag la nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa/ lha'i gos dag kyang
125b2(mdo sde): byin zhing / de ltar byin pa bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis sangs rgyas she 'am/ 'jig
125b3(mdo sde): rten gyi mgon po zhe 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhe 'am/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i sgra thos na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed na/ gang gis de bzhin
125b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku ri mor bris pa 'am/ gzugs su byas pra mthong ba lta ci smos te/ 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nam sra grangs med par bskyed do// gang gis mar me phul ba
125b5(mdo sde): 'am/ gdugs pa 'am/ spros sam/ me tog dag ga/ ma/ rol mo'i sgra 'am/ mchod pa sna tshogs gzha/ na dag byed pa lta ci smos te/ 'di nyid de bas bsod
125b6(mdo sde): nams grangs med par bskrad do// glang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir/ nyi ma gcig bslabs pa gcig bsrung ba lte ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med
125b7(mdo sde): par skyed do// 'jam dpalo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dang bcas pa/ nyan thos dang bcas pa/ phyogs
125b8(mdo sde): bcu'o 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rabs snyed rnams las nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i na bza' dag kyang 'bul la/ de ltar 'bul
126a1(mdo sde): ba bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'bul zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs
126a2(mdo sde): pa re re'i phyir/ mchod rten tshad gling bzhi pa tsam rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar las byas pa/ 
126a3(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che klog gi sgron mas spras pa/ nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stegs bus yongs su bskor pa/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i 'phreng bas mdzes
126a4(mdo sde): par byas pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dad na bsgreng ba/ dril bu g.yar ka'i dra ba'i bla re bras dpa/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i byug pas byug pa/ nor
126a5(mdo sde): bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdu la snyed dag byas te/ mchod rten de dag la nyin gcig
126a6(mdo sde): bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad tsam gyi lha'i gos dag dang / gdugs kyi sprin dag dang / rgyal mtshan gyi smon dag dang / ba dan gyi sprin dag dang / me tog gi sprin
126a7(mdo sde): dag dang / spos kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i sprin dag dang / rol mo'i sgra'i sprin dag dang / rgyan gyi sprin dag dang / seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i zla ba'i sprin dag dang / lha'i sil snyan
126a8(mdo sde): dang / ngag rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs kyi sgra'i sprin rnams kyis gtor/ mngon par gtor la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan
126b1(mdo sde): gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang / ye shes bsam gyis khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos shing tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song
126b2(mdo sde): ba'i sems can gcig la zan kham gcig byin na/ 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal mdo sde 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
126b3(mdo sde): gang la la zhig gis mdo 'di las ji skad smos pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byed pa bso// byang chub sems dpa' mdo 'di nyid la mos pa gzhan gang gis mdo
126b4(mdo sde): 'di nyid la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan ni gra mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mdo 'di nyid del mos pa'o snyam ste/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga'
126b5(mdo sde): ba chen po rnyed la/ de sems dang bas langs te/ de la/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te/ ci nus ci lcogs su de la yongs su bzungs pa byas na/ 'di nyid de bas chas
126b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams grangs med par snyed do// 'jam dpal de lta bas na/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam
126b7(mdo sde): grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang rgal te 'gro bar bya'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la
126b8(mdo sde): zhig gis bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyad pa bas/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa'o// 
127a1(mdo sde): snyam du mos par byed na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis/ sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i
127a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la lha'i zas ro brgya dang lha'i na bza' dag nyin gcig bzhin du 'bul zhing de ltar 'bul ba bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
127a3(mdo sde): tu 'dul ba bas/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam
127a4(mdo sde): grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ngo mtshar ra tu 'dzin par gyur nas/ khyod chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa legaso leg so// khyod ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
127a5(mdo sde): phyag bya ba'i 'os yin no// zhes bsam pa thag pa nas lag sa so zhes bya ba byin la/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa tha/ mas cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas rnams su zhugs la/ 
127a6(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo skor cig ces byas na/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par 'phe la te/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la sbyin pa
127a7(mdo sde): las byung ba'i bsod nams snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba 'bum gyi tshe dang / 
127a8(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / zla dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
127b1(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bas de skad ces smras nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dza dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang
127b2(mdo sde): mi nga / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bces pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
127b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / 
127b4(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar b+ha dang zhu chen gyi lo che ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// mdo sde snyan gyi gong rgyan zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ 
127b5(mdo sde): lo ka las 'das pa/ rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de'i bar med/ na rdo rje bstan pa yi 'jig rten gyi khams rigs rab tuganas so// de'i bar med na yangs par yongs su dag
127b6(mdo sde): pa'i gser grags pa'i mngon mtshan rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na rdul gyi 'og gnas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar
127b7(mdo sde): med na snang bas lha nge zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na rnam pa tha dad par las kyis snyoms par brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar/ 
127b8(mdo sde): med na skad zhi ba zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na rab tu 'phyang ba'i mngon du ba'i mngon pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas ste/ de lta bu la sogs pa brjod
128a1(mdo sde): du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam rnams kyi phyi rol gyi kho ra khor yug gi mtshams na/ 'od 'phro
128a2(mdo sde): sdug pa'i sprin rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mtshang rnam ste/ de na rgyan thams cad kyi dmigs pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rigs rab tu gnas pa/ byang chub
128a3(mdo sde): kI dkyil thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra ma lus pa'i gzhi'o// der thams cad kyi 'og ma ni/ lags mig bris pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
128a4(mdo sde): ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' gcig tu yongs su dag pa'i 'khor rnams ste/ de na rdo rje zla ba phyogs
128a5(mdo sde): thams cad du rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'o// de'i gong sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i/ mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi
128a6(mdo sde): khams rnams las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs kyi dbus rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'og dang mnyam pa na/ pad+mo dpal gyi be'u yi kha dog ces bya/ 
128a7(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ste/ de na brtson 'grus chen po shin tu blo gros shes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de'i gong mi mjed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'og dang / 
128a8(mdo sde): mnyam pa na rdo rje sra ba'i mtshams bris pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams ste/ de na shing sa la'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de'i gong sangs
128b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs kyi spyi bo na/ rgya mtsho mching rnam dag pa bris pa zhes
128b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams ste/ de na zil gyi ma mnan par shin tu 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// yang rin po che 'byung gnas snod kyis brtsegs pa'i dra chu'i/ 
128b3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho mching rnams/ de'i bar med na rin po che thams cad snang ba'i 'od rnam par lha de zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de ni grags pa dri ma med pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi
128b4(mdo sde): khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na tshad med pa'i rin po che rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu rgya mtsho ma ching rnam ste/ de na mtshan nyid nam mkha' rnam par spyod
128b5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rnam par snang mdzad kyi dpal bla re zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mchidang rnam ste/ de na thogs
128b6(mdo sde): pa med par kun tu snang ba'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na tsan dan gyi sdong po'i ke sa ra zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnams ste/ de na
128b7(mdo sde): 'khyil pa mtha' med pa phyogs su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na gser rin po che'i rgyal po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho/ 
128b8(mdo sde): mching rnam ste/ de na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo zhing 'khyil pa rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i mtshungs pa'i mdab chags na/ kun tu rdo rje'i me tog 'dud
129a1(mdo sde): gnas zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na bsam du med pa'i rnam pa'i cha ston pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na
129a2(mdo sde): bsam pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po 'khor los 'og bris pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na chags pa med pa'i rnam par shes par byed pa sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid snang ba zhes/ 
129a3(mdo sde): bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rin po che'i sa mo de 'og tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na rnam pa'i blo gros dge ba mtha'
129a4(mdo sde): med kyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri dgas rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na mu tig sna chogangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis snyoms par brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i
129a5(mdo sde): dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na sangs rgyas kyi yu la smon lam 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi kham sa kyi rigs rab tu gnas ste/ de lta bu la sogs pa/ 
129a6(mdo sde): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang / mnyam pa'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho rnams ste/ thams cad kyi phyi rol kho ra khor yug gi mtshams na
129a7(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i chu rin po che'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnams ste/ de na kun tu sgra rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs mngon par gong du 'phags
129a8(mdo sde): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo mor gzhan dang gzhan par 'jug pa'i sgra ma lus pa ni gzhi'o// der thams cad kyi 'og ma ni me tog ke sa ra'i 'od 'phro zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
129b1(mdo sde): ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' gcig tu yongs su dag pa ni 'khor rnams ste/ de na rtsal sbyin zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs
129b2(mdo sde): pa'o// de'i gong sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams las 'das pa'i rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi 'og dang mnyam
129b3(mdo sde): pa na/ pad+mo rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' gcig
129b4(mdo sde): tu yongs su dag pa ni 'khor rnams ste/ de na yon tan thams cad kyi mchog sems kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba de/ debazhin gshegs pa'o// de'i gong sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
129b5(mdo sde): mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi kha mas rnams las 'das pa'i mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'og dang mnyam pa na/ stobs bcu rgyan zhes
129b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par dag pa'i 'khor rnams ste/ 
129b7(mdo sde): de na dpag tu med pa'i yon tan gyi rgyal po shin tu 'byung zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de'i grong 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs kyi steng na/ dri'i nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal mtshan
129b8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams ste/ de na rnam pa'i blo gros yangs pa spyan bzangs shes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// yang rin po che rjesu 'gro bar brgyan pa dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching
130a1(mdo sde): rnams ste/ de'i bar med na 'od zer gyi mdzod lhun po rten pa zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na sdug po yangs pa'i sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten
130a2(mdo sde): gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rnam par bris pa'i rgyan byin gyi rlabs kyi spyod yul zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na dri ma med pa'i rnam pa'i cha mi
130a3(mdo sde): sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rin po che stug po'i pad+mo ba yal ga 'phyang ba zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na lus kyi rgyun
130a4(mdo sde): rab tu dam pa'i mar me zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na ri na po che thams cad kyi rgyan yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i dri
130a5(mdo sde): chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na nyi ma'i 'od zer/ gyi dra ba'i 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi kha mas kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na mang po byi bdar
130a6(mdo sde): dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na rin po che ke sa ra byin gyi rlabs kyis gnas shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na shin tu yid rno ba spyod
130a7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na dam pa'i lus rgya mtsho mching rnam rgyan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na bris pa'i nor
130a8(mdo sde): bu brtsegs pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnams ste/ de na kun tu rnam par dag pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar
130b1(mdo sde): med na yangs par dag pa'i gzi brjid lha de zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na in dra ni la'i dbyibs skar mda' snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// 
130b2(mdo sde): de'i bar med na 'dod par byed pa'i nor bu dang / mu tig 'thor ba rnam par lha nga zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na sgra kun tu nga ro'i skad ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
130b3(mdo sde): rigs rab tu gnas te de lta bu la sogs pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnams kyi
130b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi pha rol kho ra khor yug gi mtsha/ dmas na/ in+d+ra nI la rab tu mtho ba zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na phyogs kun tu rgyas pa dbyer med pa
130b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gan sa pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos 'bru nga ba'i nga ro'i sgra ma lus pa'i gzhi'o// der thams cad kyi 'og ma
130b6(mdo sde): ni dge ba mchog gi snying po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' gcig tu yongs su dag pa ni 'khor
130b7(mdo sde): rnams te/ de na yon tan rab tu dag pa blo gros shes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de'i gong sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
130b8(mdo sde): rnams las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbus rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'og dang mnyam pa na dbyings kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ 
131a1(mdo sde): de na 'od lhag par gong du 'phags pas snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de'i gong mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'og dang mnyam pa na/ bai DUr+ya brdegs
131a2(mdo sde): pa'i kun tu 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ de na lhun po mar me zhes bya de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de'i gong 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs kyi steng na/ me tog rgyal mtshan
131a3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho mching rnam zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' gcig tu yong su dag pa ni 'khor
131a4(mdo sde): rnams te/ de na sprul pa mi zad pa shin tu sprin gyi bdag po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// yang skad rdo rje 'dus pa'i sgra ma lus pa dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam/ de'i
131a5(mdo sde): bar med na rin po che'i phur pa byas pa shin tu gong du 'phags kha zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na ri/ na po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig
131a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na me tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi snyoms par brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na snang ba thams cad ston pa zhes
131a7(mdo sde): bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rin po che'i gtso'i sprin can zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na rin po che thams cad kyi 'og gi rgyan
