131a8(mdo sde): snang ba rnam par lhang nge zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rin po che'i sdong po kaM sa ra'i kha dog rgyan ces bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ 
131b1(mdo sde): de na lags par brdegs pa gzi brjid snyan gyi gong rgyan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rin po che gtso'i gos rab tu brgyan po'i tshogs rgyun zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgyam
131b2(mdo sde): mching rnam ste/ de na rgya mtsho mchid rnam gyi snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rin po che'i sdong po yal ga brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig
131b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na rin po che'i 'od 'phro'i sprin la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na 'dod
131b4(mdo sde): pa'i yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnams ste/ de na chags pa med pa'i rdo rje kun tu rjes su spyod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rig
131b5(mdo sde): rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na kun tu pad+ma'o lhab lhub ce/ sa bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na mtha' ma dpa'o 'gram rgya mtsho mching rnams 'khyil pa zhes
131b6(mdo sde): bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar mod na rin po che dam pa'i yan lag lha lhub ces bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na zhing gi 'og dmigs pa'i
131b7(mdo sde): mdzod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas pa de lta bu la sogs pa brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa dri chu'i rgya mtsho
131b8(mdo sde): mching rnams kyi thams cad kyi phyi rol kho ra khor yug gi mtshams na/ mi phigs pa'i snying po can zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par
132a1(mdo sde): na la rgya ma pa tshus na pa sgyu nas/ du ma / 
132a2(mdo sde): kyi 'og ma ni shin tu dri'i snying po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ de na tshad med pa'i 'od sprul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i rigs kyi
132a3(mdo sde): dbus rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'og dang mnyam pa na/ bsam tu meng pa'i rgyan gyi tshul gyi sgo mo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ de na mi dkar ba'i ye
132a4(mdo sde): shes tshangs pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de ni dgong mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'og dang ma nyam pa na/ phyogs kyi snang ba me tog gi snying po zhes bya
132a5(mdo sde): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ de na seng ge spyan 'od 'phro sprin ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de'i gong 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs kyi steng na/ rgya
132a6(mdo sde): mtsho mching rnam gyi sgra zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams te/ de na chu'i lha 'od 'phro zhal zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// yang lha'i grong khyer nor bu'i mkhar bu'i rgyan gyi dri chu'i rgya
132a7(mdo sde): mtsho mching rnam/ de'i bar med na snang ba'i 'khor lo rnam par 'tshar ba zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho na/ ting rnam ste/ de na brjod du med pa'i phyogs kyi gnas brgyan ban+de bya ba 'jig
132a8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rin po che'i rdul lam rnam par bris pa zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na 'khyil pa du mar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i
132b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rgyun thams cad snyoms par thar pa'i 'og ces byad dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na rin po che'i 'od rnam par snga
132b2(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar mdun rin po che dra ba rnam pa'i cha 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mtshang rnam ste/ de na tshul gyi mtshams
132b3(mdo sde): kyi mthu zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i rgyan ces bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na 'jig rten gyi kham
132b4(mdo sde): rnam par shes par byed pa rgya mtsho mching rnam ma lus pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gan sa so// de'i bar med na nyi ma'i khang pa yongs su spyad par
132b5(mdo sde): snang ba zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na dang / nga po'i dra ba kun tu 'thor pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar
132b6(mdo sde): med na sil 'khrol thams cad kyi skad bsgrags pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na 'khyil pa thams cad kyi 'og tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten
132b7(mdo sde): khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rgya mtshos smras pas rnam par bris pa zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na 'od kyi sprin stug po dri ma med par 'bar ba
132b8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rin po che'i mar me'i 'od 'phro snyoms par mngon tu 'thor ba zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ 
133a1(mdo sde): de na sangs rgyas kyi smon lam sna tshogs kyi dbyings byin gyi rlabs shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas pa de lta bu la sogs pa brjod du med pa'i
133a2(mdo sde): yang brjod du med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mchog tu 'phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam rnams te/ thams cad kyi phyi rol khor khor yug gi mtshams na/ se
133a3(mdo sde): mo do'i gos kyi tshogs shes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na legs pa'i gos kun tu ston pa sprul pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs mngon par gong du 'phags
133a4(mdo sde): pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi sgra ma lus pa dani bzhi'o// drar thams cad kyi 'og ma ni dbang po'i kas
133a5(mdo sde): ra 'khyil pa'i snying po zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na rab tu grol bar dga' byad ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mchog
133a6(mdo sde): tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' gcig tu yongs su dag pa ni 'khor rnams te/ don sad pa'i ye shes pas mi 'jam pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs
133a7(mdo sde): pa'o// de'i gong sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khrims kyi rigs kyi dbus rdo rje'i
133a8(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'og dang mnyam pa na/ rin po che'i dpal dri ba'i rgyan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul
133b1(mdo sde): dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' gcig tu yongs su dag da ni/ 'khor rnams te/ de na tshad med pa'i glog gi gtso// drang srong chen po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de'i
133b2(mdo sde): gong sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams las 'das pa'i mi mdzad pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'og dang mnyam pa na/ rin po che'i
133b3(mdo sde): bstan pad+mo sang ga zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par dag pa ni
133b4(mdo sde): 'khor rnams te/ de ni dri ma med pa'i drag shul thos pa tho gus pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de'i go/ rang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang
133b5(mdo sde): mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das pa'i 'jig rte na gyi khams kyi rigs kyi gong na/ rin po che'i klu'o// da kyi kha dog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas
133b6(mdo sde): kyi zhing nyi shu'i mchog tu phra mo'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' gcig tu yongs su dag pa ni 'khor rnams to// de na chos kyi khams yongs su rgyas pa rnam par snang
133b7(mdo sde): mdzad ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnams ste/ de dag
133b8(mdo sde): las sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs de dag thams cad
134a1(mdo sde): kyang / dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnams de dag rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rnam par shes par byed pa brnyan mar snang ba rgyal mtshan nor bu'i rgyas
134a2(mdo sde): pos rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan pad+mo rab tu gnas pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs par med kyi mtshams gzhan dang gzhan pa'i rgyan rnams dang / gzhan dang gzhan pa'i rin po che'i kha dog gi snang ba rab
134a3(mdo sde): tu gtang ba'i rnams dang / gzhan dang gzhan pa'i 'od zer gyi 'od dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu g.yogs pa'i rnams dang / gzhan dang gzhan pa'i brgyan pa'i rgyan gyi 'od rnams dang / gzhan
134a4(mdo sde): dang gzhan pa'i bskal pa'i grangs kyi tshul bshad pa'i rnams dadang / gzhan dang gzhan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'byung bar 'jug pa'i rnams dang / gzhan dang gzhan pa'i rgya mtsho mchid
134a5(mdo sde): rnams sgrogs pa'i rnams dang / gzhan dang gzhan pa'i sa mas can gyi lus yongs su rgyas pa'i rnams dang / gzhan dang gzhan pa'i phyogs su 'jug pa tha mi dad pa'i rnams
134a6(mdo sde): dang / gzhan dang gzhan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs re re nas kyang 'jig rten gyi mtshams rab tu btang ba dang / 
134a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi dra ba dang / rgyan rab tu gnas pa thams cad kyi me tog 'og gi snying po rgyan gyi rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mching rnam thams cad ji snyed pa 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs kyi
134a8(mdo sde): tshul gyis kun tu rgyas so// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs gcig nas ji bzhin pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyis khams kyi mtshams kyi sgo thams
134b1(mdo sde): cad kyis rgyan sna tshogs gnas pas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba sna tshogs kyis me tog 'og gi snying po rgyan gyi rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho mching rnams thams cad ji snyed pa kun tu rgyas/ 
134b2(mdo sde): so// de nas yang kun tu bzang po'i byang chub sems dpas lhag pa'i tshad du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs mtha' dang dbus med pa 'jig rten gyi khyon gyi tshul gyi tshad pa de nyid snang bar byed pa na/ 
134b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe na tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten khams kyi rgya mtsho ni// chos kyi khams dang tha mi dad // 
134b4(mdo sde): yangs pa yangs par bris pa ni// nam mkha'i 'og tu gnas pra'o// 'jig rten khams kyi rgya mtsho dang // zhing gi ri gas ni bsam med pa// rnam par gnas pa tha dad med// gzhan
134b5(mdo sde): dang gzhan pa'i rnam sprul pa'o// rnam char 'dug pa dris/ pa ni// sna tshogs kha dog rab tu gnas// zhing gi ri/ gas rang chud pa ni// 'jig rten khams kyi rgya mtsho ru'o// sna
134b6(mdo sde): tshogs lus kyis sgra ma lus// sangs rgyas rnam sprul thams cad la// zhing gi rigs rnams snang ba ni// las kyis shin tu rnam bris pa'o// lhun po rgya mtsho dra ba yang // 'khor lo 'khyil
134b7(mdo sde): pa dkyil 'khor to// yal bcu rdul yas pad+mo'i de byibs// de dag gis ni de dag bskor// tshul khrims rgyal mtshan brtsegs pa dang // bsgyur ba rdo rje'i gnas pa rnams// bsam du med
134b8(mdo sde): pa'i khyon rnams kyis// de dag rigs rnams bskor ba'o// 'od kyi dra ba bsam med kyi// snang ba rgya mtsho btang bas ni// zhing gi rigs rnam 'bar ba yang // thams cad pad+mo rab tu gnas// 
135a1(mdo sde): re re'i yang ni rigs las su// 'od zer dra bas bsam med pa// 'od zer zhing du gyur nas su// rgya'i phyogs kyi rgya mtsho ru// thams cad zhing gi rigs rnams
135a2(mdo sde): kyi / dmigs pa thams cad sgo mo ru// thams cad tshul gyi 'jug pa yang // zad pa med pa'i tshul ni snang // bsam du med pa'i zhing rnams su// zad pa med pa'i rigs rnams 'byung // 
135a3(mdo sde): sna tshogs rgyan gyi bshad pa ni// drang srong chen po'i byin rlabs so// zhing gi rigs ni de dag tu// 'jig rten khams ni bsam med de// gong bar 'gyur ba skye ba dang // kun tu 'byung dang mi/ 
135a4(mdo sde): 'byung ngo // ji bzhin shin tu lo ma rnams// 'byung ba da nga ni lhung ba yang // de ltar de bzhin zhing rigs su// 'jig rten khams rnams 'byung ba'o// ji ltar shing rnam
135a5(mdo sde): snying pa ru// 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur// de ltar de bzhin zhing rigs su// gon 'dun sems can 'byu nga ba'o// ji bzhin yang ni bye brag gis// 'bras bu snang
135a6(mdo sde): ba sna tshogs par// de ltar las kyang bre brag gis// sems can rnams kyi zhing byung ngo // ji ltar bsam rgyal rin chen ni// kha dog kun gyi snang ba ste// sems can bsam pa rnam dag
135a7(mdo sde): phyir// de bzhin zhing rnams mthong ba'o// ji bzhin klu'i rgyal pos sprin// nam mkha'i 'og tu ston byed pa// de lta sangs rgyas smon lam gyis// 
135a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'byung ba'o// sgyu ma byed pa'i sngags kyis su// rnam pa sna tshogs bzhin ston pa// de bzhin sems can las kyis su// bsam med zhing rnams 'gyur ba'o// 
135b1(mdo sde): ji bzhin bris byas kyi ni gzugs// rI mo mkhan gyis ri mo bris// de ltar 'di dag thams cad zhing // sems kyis shin tu bri bar bris// sems can rnams kyi gon 'dun lus// ji bzhin
135b2(mdo sde): sems kyis brtags pa pa// de bzhin zhing rnams gon 'dun par// thams cad las kyis bris pa'o// gzhan dang gzhan pa'i gzugs su ni// ji ltar snang ba 'dran pa rnams// ji bzhin
135b3(mdo sde): sems can bsam pa pa// de bzhin zhing rnams mthong ba'o// pad+mo'i dra ba phyi rol dang / sems can zhing rnams mtshams su ste// gzhan pa'i dbyibs dang kha dog rnams// bris par snang ba dri
135b4(mdo sde): med pa'o// pad+mo dra ba de dag la'ang // zhing gi dra ba rab tu dganas// rgyan sna tshogs su chad pa ni// sems can dgon 'dun rnams kyi gnas// kha cig zhing gi de dag 'og/ 
135b5(mdo sde): kun tu nyon mongs pa ru gnas// sems can rnams ni nyon mongs pa// de dag tu ni chos nyid snang // bsam du med pa'i zhing rigs rnams// kun tu nyon mongs rnam dag
135b6(mdo sde): kyang / sems can bsam pa byung ba ru// byang chub sems dpa' rab tu gnas// kha cig zhing 'og mang po ni// rnam par dag dang nyon mongs yang // las kyi rgya mtsho su ni 'byung / 
135b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sprul// kha cig zhing gis 'og btang ba// dri med cing ni rin chen gyi// rnam par bris pa dri med dag/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang yongs spangs so// zhing
135b8(mdo sde): gi rigs ni gcig tu yang // bskal pas bsreg pa bsam med pa// nyon mongs rnams la ston pa ste// zhing gi dkyil 'khor rab tu sra// / rlung gi phung po smon lam gyis/ 
136a1(mdo sde): chu'i phung rab tu gnas pa ni// zhing rnams mang po byung bar 'gyur// sems can rnams kyi las bsags pas// lto shig zhing du gzhan gan+d+ha pa/ snang ba zhing gi chos nyid
136a2(mdo sde): ni// de dag rnams ni 'byung min zhing // de dag rnams kyang ldog med do// mang po zhing rnams 'byung ba ni// thams cad sems kyi skad cig tu// sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyi ni// shin tu dag
136a3(mdo sde): pa dri med ltos// sa chen po yi zhing rnams ni// kha cig byung ba sra ba'i rnams// snang ba med cing 'od med rnams// sdig pa'i las kyi gnas rnams so// kha cig zhing na rdo rje yi// kun tu
136a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs 'jigs pa che// bde ba chung zhing sdug bsngal mang // bsod nams chung ba rnams kyi gnas// kha cig zhing rnams lcags kyi ste// zangs dang khar bar gnas pa rnam// 
136a5(mdo sde): sdig pa'i las kyi khyab pa ni// nyam nga rdo'i ri rnams so// 2 jig rten de ru dmyal ba ste// sems can rnams ni mgon med pa// sdug bsngal pa// mun pa rgyud du
136a6(mdo sde): thob pa ni// 'od 'phrol rgya mtsho 'bar ba'o// de bzhin byol song 'gro ba yang // bdag gi lus ni thag thug pa// rang gi las kyi nyes pas na// sdug bsngal tshor ba'i tshor ba'o// snang ba
136a7(mdo sde): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du// skom dang bru bas nyon mongs pa// me yi ri la 'dzegs pa rnams// sdug bsngal tshor ba tshor ba'o// kha cig rin chen bdun rnams te// kha cig gnas ni
136a8(mdo sde): rnam par bris// dge ba'i las kyis byung ba'i rnams// rnam par bri bar khang pa brgyan// kha cig lha dang mi rnams yang // mtho ris 'jig rten du ni ltos// dge ba'i bsod nams 'bras
136b1(mdo sde): bus ldan// dag pa'i bde ba myongs pa'o// nyags ma gcig gi rtse mor ni// bye ba zhing ni bsam med pa// sna tshogs rnam par bris pa'i dbyibs// de dag la'ang 'dres pa med// bdag
136b2(mdo sde): bdag kun gyi las kyis su// sems can khams ni bsam med pa// sna tshogs 'du shes zin pa rnams// bad dang sdug bsngal myong ba'o// kha cig zhing ni mtha' meng snang // sems
136b3(mdo sde): can thams cad rnams kyi gnas// rdo rje ud dpal 'byung ba'i rnams// bris pa dag pa dri med pa'o// zhing ni kha cig 'od zer gyi// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la gnas// gsar
136b4(mdo sde): dang tsan dan las ni byung // 'od 'phro'i sprin dang mtshungs dpa'o// nyi ma dkyil 'khor gyi ni zhing // dI yi gos/ dkyis g.yogs pa dang // gzhan ni pad+mo'i gcig gis
136b5(mdo sde): na// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rgyan// laM la ra mtshan nyid kha dog snang // zhing rnams rin chen brtsigs pas ni// dbang po'i dra bas 'od btang ba// 
136b6(mdo sde): 'od zer dra bas rnam par 'tsha pa'o// rdo rje pad+mo kha cig ni// zhing rnams pog la gnas pa ste// gzhan na nor bu brnyan mar snang // lto shig zhing ni rnam drag pa// me tog 'khyil
136b7(mdo sde): par byung ba rnams// lto shig zhing rnam bsam med pa// sangs rgyas sprul pas kun tu g.yogs// byang chub sems dpa'i 'od dang mnyam// kha cig me tog shing rnams kyis// 
136b8(mdo sde): yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bris// nor bu'i sprin ni kun tu 'bab// dkyil 'khor zhing gi rnam dag pa'o// rdo rje pad+mo'i zhing rnams ni// legs pa'i pad+mo lhang nge ste// sangs
137a1(mdo sde): rgyas sprul pa sgra ma lus// zhing gi dra ba bsam med pa'o// nor bu'i cod pan bris pa'i rnams// byang chub sems dang sna brgyan pa ste// kha cig snyan par byung ba ni/ 
137a2(mdo sde): rab tu btang bas sprul 'od do// sna tshogs tsan dan phye ma rnams// smin mtshams spu'i lha de bod// sangs rgyas thams cad 'od zer gyis// zhing gi 'byung bzer ba'o// kha cig gcig gi
137a3(mdo sde): rgyan gyis snang ba'i rnams// zhing ni dri med snang ba ste// kha cig rgyan ni thams cad kyi sa// rnam par bris par brgyan pa'o// kha cig zhing bcu rnams kyi ni// rgyan gyi su ni brgyan pa ste/ 
137a4(mdo sde): gzhan zhing stong phrag du ma'i rnams// rgyan yi rab tu ga/ nas pa'o// wang gi rgyan ni bye bas su// kha cig ni dang ni rnam par bris// sna tshogs rgyan gyi dbyings pa rnam/ 
137a5(mdo sde): byis pa snang ba mthong ba'o// brjod du med pa'i zhing rnams na// rgyan ni gcig pu snang ba ste// gzhan dang gzha na pa'i 'od btang ba// b+h+ring ngo sangs rgyas smon lam gyis// 
137a6(mdo sde): smon lam rgya mtsho mching rnams kyis// kha cig zhing rnams rnam par spangs// de dag thams cad rgyun du ni// zhing gi rgya mtsho snang ba'o// kun tu bzang po smon lam gyis// zhing gang yo
137a7(mdo sde): su sbyangs pa ni// dus gsum zhing rnams de dag gi/ rgyan ni thams cad snang ba'o// rgyal ba'i bu ge ltos shig kye// zhing gi rigs su rnam sprul pa// gang na zhing ni ma 'ongs rnams/ 
137a8(mdo sde): rmi lam 'dra bar snang ba'o// ji skad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// 'das pa'i zhing ni rgya mtsho rnams// zhing gcig tu ni sgo shig dag/ brta ni mar snang bar shin tu sprul// dus
137b1(mdo sde): gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// zhing gi rnam sprul ji snyed pa// shing gi rigs su snang ba ni// thams cad nang du chud par 'dul ba'o// lho shig rdul gyi thog ma ru// sangs rgyas
137b2(mdo sde): kun gyi rnam spangs pa// chud par snang ba de dag la// mtshan ma med pa brnyan mar snang // kha cig rgya mtsho mching rnam dbyibs// zhing gi rigs rnams mang po ltos// dbyibs ni lhun po
137b3(mdo sde): ri'i rnams// 'jig rten khams ni bsam med pa'o// kha cig zhing ni shin tu bgyis// dbang po'i dra ba shin tu gnas// zhing gi dbyings su shin tu gnas// zhing gi dbyings su shin
137b4(mdo sde): tu bris// thams cad sangs rgyas kyis ni rgyus// nor bu 'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i zhing // gzhan ni pad+mo ga/ denas pa ste// cha brgyad du mar bris pa'i rnams// kha
137b5(mdo sde): dog sna tshogs shin tu dri med pa'o// stan gyi dbyibs su/ kha cig dang // gla ba mkhar gyi dbyings su skye// dga' ru'i dbyibs pa kha cig ni// tshangs pa'i lus su
137b6(mdo sde): shin tu gnas// lha yi dbang po gtsug gi dbyibs// zla ba kham par gnas pa'i rnams// nor bu ri'i dbyibs pa ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du ni gnas pa'o// dri chu mtsho ni 'khyil
137b7(mdo sde): pa rnams// 'jig rten khams ni shin tu gnas// 'od zer dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbyibs// sngun ni sangs rgyas mngon par sbyangs// 'khor lo bde bar byed pa'i dbyibs// 'jig
137b8(mdo sde): rten khams kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// smin mtshams spu dang u smis dbyibs// 'di ni dbyibs kyi tshul rnams so// sangs rgyas phyag gi dbyings rnams dang // gzhan ni rnga
138a1(mdo sde): rjer gnas pa ste// 'od 'gro ro'i dbyibs gnas pa// byang chub sems dngas rgyas pa'o// zhing rnams rnams ni seng ge dbyings// nor bu'i go char gnas pa yang / 
138a2(mdo sde): du ma'i gzugs kyi dbyibs rnams te// thams cad lus su gnas pa'o// zhing gi rigs ni gcig pu la// zhing gi rigs ni zad med pa// byin gyi rlabs kyis rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas
138a3(mdo sde): smon pas byung ba'o// kha cig zhing ni bskal pa mnyam// gzhan ni bskal pa bcu pa ste// kha cig zhing ni rdul dang mtshungs// bskal pa bye bar bsgrags pa yi// kha cig bskal pa gci
138a4(mdo sde): pa ni// zhing gi byung ba snang ba yA// gzhan du med dang grang das med pa// rnam par ldog pa bsam med pa'o// kha cig zhing rnams sangs rgyas med// kha cig zhing du sangs
138a5(mdo sde): rgyas bcas// sangs rgyas gcig pa'i zhing rnams dang // gzhan ni sangs rgyas mang ba'o// sangs rgyas mi bzhugs zhing du ni// 'jig rten khams ni gzhan du
138a6(mdo sde): yang // sangs rgyas sprul pa 'ongs nas su// rnam par sprul pa smon pa'o// 'da' ba'i tshe la shi 'phos par// sangs rgyas byang chub rnam par sang // bdud kyi sde ni brnyil nas su// 
138a7(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor pa'o// sems can rnams kyi bas ma pa ji bzhin par// sna tshogs gzugs su ston pa ni// 'jig rten kun tu tha ma dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor pa'o// 
138a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing ni re ra na// rgyal ba gcig pu byung nas su// lo ni bya ba stong phrag du// mchog gi chos ni bshad pa'o// snod ma yin gyi sems can la// sangs rgyas ltar ni mi ster
138b1(mdo sde): te/ de nyid gcig tu kun d+ha yang // sangs rgyas bsam pas mthong ba'o// sangs rgyas zhing ni re re na// sangs rgyas bye ba bsam med pa// de ru rgyal ba byung ba ste// gang zhing sangs rgyas
138b2(mdo sde): mang ba na'o// rgyal ba ra ra da ru ni// sprul pa mang po mthong zhing ni// chos kyi khams ni rgyas nas su// sems can rgya mtsho gdul bar mdzad// kha cig zhing ni snang med pa// mun
138b3(mdo sde): pa dang ni 'jigs che ba// spu gri kha dog sdug bsngal reg/ gtum po mthong nas 'jigs pa'o// kha cig zhing du lha yi 'od// gzhan dag tu ni khang pa'i 'od// la la ru ni gnyi zla'i 'od
138b4(mdo sde): zhing gi dra ba bsam med pa'o// kha cig zhing du rang gi 'od// shing gi snang bas dri med dad // gang na sdug bsngal mi mthong ba// sems can rnams
138b5(mdo sde): kyi bsod nams byung // ri yi snang bar yod pa dang // kha cig zhing na nor bu'i 'ad// me mar snang ba gzhan du ni// sems can rnams kyi las kyi byung // kha cig zhing du
138b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rgyas// pad+mo'i 'od zer 'od kyi zhing // 'od 'phre'i snang ba mdzes pa'o// me tog snang ba'i zhing rnams dang // dri chu yis ni snang bar
138b7(mdo sde): byas// dri dang pog gi 'od 'phro snang ba ni// sna tshogs smon lam gyis ni sbyangs pa'o// kha cig zhing ni sprin gyi 'od// nor bu'i go chas snang bar byas// sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs kyis snang
138b8(mdo sde): ba ni// sgra yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan no// nor bu'i cid pan 'od snang dang // rdo rje gser gyi 'od 'phro 'char// yongs su dag pa'i sgra skad no// gang na sdug bsngal med pa na'o// thams cad
139a1(mdo sde): rgyan gyi snang ba dang // kha cig zhing du nor bu'i 'od// byang chub dkyil 'od kha cig tu 'khor rnams kyis ni snang bar byas// sangs rgyas sprul gyi snang ba dang // sangs rgyas
139a2(mdo sde): sprin gyis mngon par g.yogs// kun tu 'od kyi snang ba ni// chos kyi khams dang mnyam pa'i 'od// la la'i zhing na gtum chen dang // skrag par byed pa'i sgra sgrog pa// rtsub po zhes
139a3(mdo sde): gcod skad rnams dang // yid du mi 'ong 'jigs che ba'o// dmyal dang byol song rigs kyi dang // gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal gang // kun tu nyon mongs zhing du ni// mya
139a4(mdo sde): ngan smos su rgya mtsho zer// kha cig tu ni mgu byed sgra// yid du 'ong bas ston par byed// dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu'i sgra// sgrog pa zhing gi dkyil 'khor du// brgya byin lha
139a5(mdo sde): yi dbang po sgra// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs gzhan du ste/ 'jig rten kun gyi sgra yang ni// kha cig zhing du thos/ pa'o// zhing rnams sgra ni sprin gyi ste// rin chen gyis ni
139a6(mdo sde): 'od 'phro mtsho// nor bu'i shing na mdzod kyi sgra// sil khrol sgo na rgyas pa'o// 'od zer 'khyil pa'i sgra ma lus// sangs rgyas sprul pa mi zad pa// byang chub sems dpa'i sgra ma lus/ 
139a7(mdo sde): 'od zer sgra yi dbyangs snyan to// chos kyi 'khor lo rnams kyi sgra// kha cig zhing du bsam med de// smon lam rgya mtsho sgra ma lus// spyod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa'o// dus gsum
139a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor sgrog pa ste// zhing rnams 'byung ba de dag go/ sgra'i skad ni zad med pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs sgra dang // sa dang pa
139b1(mdo sde): rol phyin par song // chos kyi rang bzhin sgra ma lus// kha cig zhing du thos pa'o// kun tu bzang po smon lam gyi// sgra ni ma lus bye ba'i zhing du ste// bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi
139b2(mdo sde): zer ba'i// ma lus sgra ni btang ba mi zad pa'o// kha cig zhing gi lam dag par// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam sprul gyi// ma lus sgra ni der thos pa// chos kyi khams ni rgyas nas su// 
139b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rnam par gzhag pa'i sgra ma lus pa zhes bya ba bsgyur pa dgu po rdzogs s+ho// / rigs kyi bu rnams 'das pa'i dus na/ sngun yod
139b4(mdo sde): ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang nga mnyam pa'i bskal ba rnams kyi pha rol gyi yang pha rol dan/ phyogs kun tu mig dri ma med pa rab tu snang ba'i
139b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi dbus na/ dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam/ yod par gyur pa/ de'i dus de'i che na/ dpal gyi sgra
139b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de yang / nor bu'i pad+mo dra ba'i rgya mtsho mching rnam la rab tu gnas pa/ ri rab kyi mchog tu phra rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa dang / 
139b7(mdo sde): kun tu snyoms pa ni 'khor rnams te/ kun tu zlum po dang / mtha' med pa'i brgyan gyis 'og brgyan pa dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi sdong po'i 'khor lo'i ra ba sum brgyas bskor ba dang / 
139b8(mdo sde): rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyis kun tu g.yogs pa dang / rnam par dag pa'i 'od dri ma med pa/ snang ba/ ri reb lta bur grong khyer dang / khang pa'i brgyan te/ zas dang / 
140a1(mdo sde): skom dang / gos gang longs spyod yid du 'ong ba dang / gang tshogs su brtag par brgyan pa bshad do// yang dpal sgra'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i dbus na/ rnam par/ 
140a2(mdo sde): dag par snang ba zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de nas me tog gi 'od 'phro dang mnyam pa'i rgyan rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba me tog chen po'i ri rab mngon par gong du 'phags pa/ rin po
140a3(mdo sde): che'i lda ldi bcu ni/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi brgyan te/ dri'i 'og de na/ nor bu me tog rgyas pa yal ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba stug po'i tshal chen po ste/ dri'i rgyal mtshan stong phrag
140a4(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa'i rnams bsgrengs pa'i brgyan dang / dang / dag tu med pa'i me tog gi khang bu brtsegs pa'i 'phreng ba de rnams kyis shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / dpag tu med
140a5(mdo sde): pa'i nor bu'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i 'phreng ba rnams shin tu rnam par bsgrengs pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i rin pa che'i pha bo nga rgyal mtshan rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par
140a6(mdo sde): byas pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i rin po che pun da ri ka'i 'phreng bas bskor ba dang / dpag tu med pa'i dri thams cad kyi nor bu pad+mo'i dra bas rab tu rgyan pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i
140a7(mdo sde): sil khrol gyi sgra'i sprin yid du 'ong ba'i rnams dang / dpag tu med pa'i dri dang / phog gi 'od 'phro'i sprin rnams kyis snang bar byas so// sems can gon 'dun gyi gnas rnams
140a8(mdo sde): rin po che'i grong khyer bye ba thar 'bum brgya stong phrag bcus bskor pa ni/ gang 'di nor bu'i yal ga'i dkyil 'khor stug po'i tshal chen po de'i shar na 'od 'phro'o snang ba zhes bya ba/ 
140b1(mdo sde): grong khyer chen po ste/ ma'i rgyal po'i khab rin po che dag pa'i grong khyer bye ba ther 'bum brgya stong phrag bcus bskor ba ni/ zheng dang srid du dpag tshad stong phrag bdun te/ rin po che'i
140b2(mdo sde): phyir bdun rnams// rin po che sna tshogs kyi brtsegs pa'i khur bus sbrengs pas kun tu bskor ba'o// rin po che'i 'obs bdun dri chus yongs su gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi/ 
140b3(mdo sde): ud pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / me tog pun da ri kas nye bar mdzes par byas pa rnams kyis kun tu bcas pa'o// rin po che sna tshogs kyi ta la'i 'phreng ba bdun// rgyan
140b4(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi mdzod rab tu btang bas bskor ba'o// rin po che thams cad kyis lhab lhub pa'i khang bu brtsegus kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o// steng du gser gyi dra ba dang / 
140b5(mdo sde): spangs rgyan gyi dra ba rnams dang / me tog gi dra ba rnam/ sa dang / in dra nI la'i dra ba rnams dang / rdo rje pa d+mo'i dra ba rnams dang / 'og na nor bu'i sdong po me tog
140b6(mdo sde): gi dra ba rnams dang sgra ma lus par yid du 'ong ba'i sil khrol thams cad kyi dra ba'i sprin gyis kun tu g.yogs pa/ dr-i sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba brgyas ni brgyan no// de'i 'khor ba
140b7(mdo sde): na sgo mo bye ba ther 'dum brgya stong phrag bcu rnams so// sgo mo de dag thams cad kyang rin po che thams cad kyis bris pa'i rnams so// ske mo de dag rnams kyi mdun na/ phang bong gi rgyal
140b8(mdo sde): mtshan bdun bdun te/ rgyan thams cad kyis kun tu g.yogs pas nye bar mdzes pa'o// tshal gsing bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnams kyis kun tu bskor ba ste/ dga' ra de dag
141a1(mdo sde): thams cad rnams kyang / dri sna tshogs kyi nor bu'i sdong pos kun tu dri rab tu btang ba'i rnams dang / bya thams cad 'dus pa'i skad yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ma lus pa
141a2(mdo sde): rnams so// yang 'od 'phro'i sgra ma lus pa grong khyer chen po der/ gang bdag mi skyes pa'i rnams de dag thams cad las rnam par smin pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul so sor rnyed pas/ na mkhar
141a3(mdo sde): mnyam par 'gro zhing lha mi mnyam par rgyu ste/ yid kyi yul gyi longs spyod do// de'i g.yas na sdong po'i me tog gis rnam par bris pa zhes bya ba lha'i grong khyer ro// de'i g.yas na
141a4(mdo sde): yongs su thub pa zhes bya ba klu chen po'i grong khyer ro// de'i g.yas na rdo rje'i dpal bris pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer ro// de'i bar med na shin
141a5(mdo sde): tu gzhal med khang zhes bya ba dri za'i grong khyer ro// de'i ba/ ra med na 'khor lo dpal zhes bya ba lha ma yin gyi grong khyer ro// de'i bar med na rin po ches bris pa legs pa'i lta
141a6(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba gsar gyi grong khyer ro// de'i bar med na lags par rnam par bris pa'i rgyan ces bya ba tshangs pa'i grong khyer te/ de lta bu la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba ther 'bum brgya stong phrag
141a7(mdo sde): bcu rnams kyis bskor ba'o// grong khyer chen po re ra la'ang rgyun du ma ste/ grong khyer bye ba ther 'bum brgya stong phrag bcu rnams kyis bskor ba'i bar du'o// yang nor bu rgyas pa yul
141a8(mdo sde): pa'i dkyil 'khor tshal stug pa chen po de'i dbus na/ rin po che'i me tog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub kyi dkyil te/ rin po che thams cad kyi sdug pa yangs pa'i yal ga'i
141b1(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor sbrengs pa/ gzugs sna tshogs kyi dbyings so// nor bu'i me tog gi dkyil 'khor rgyas pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog gi mar me dang / phreng ba sngags yangs pa'i
141b2(mdo sde): sprin dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phros zhing gi steng kun g.yog pa ni/ rnam par dga' ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin spa ba dang / phyogs bcur 'od zer yangs pa'i dri ba rnam par 'tshar
141b3(mdo sde): ba dang / rgyan pad kyi rin po che sna chos kyi mdzod bcags pa dang / sil khrol thams cad kyi skad rjes su bsgrags pa'i sgra dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i sku byung ba dang / 
141b4(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i rnam par bris pa'i me tog gi 'od byung ba da'o// de'i mdun na me tog ke sa ra'i 'o de 'phro'i da dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba pad+mo chen po mngon par gong du byung
141b5(mdo sde): ba ni/ zheng dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya ste/ dri'i nor bu rdo rje'i rgya mtsho mching rnam par byung ba dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi dpal gyi shin tu rnam par bris pa'i sdong po dang / 
141b6(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa'i rin po ches rnam par bris pa'i lo ma dang / mtha' med pa'i rin po che'i 'od 'phro'i dri'i ka sa ra'i dkyil 'khor rgyan dang / kha dog mtha' med pa'i dpal pad+mo'i lgang bu sbrengs
141b7(mdo sde): pa/ pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa'i bye ba ther 'bum brgya stong phrag bcu rnams kyis bskor bas/ phyogs bcur yangs par 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu btang ba dang / yid du
141b8(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i skad ke sa ra thams cad las sgra ma lus pa'o// yang sgra dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ ri rab bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
142a1(mdo sde): / byung ba'o// de dag las bskal pa dang po de bzhin gshegs pa gang / ri rab bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa// de dag tham/ 
142a2(mdo sde): cad rnams kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni/ yon tan thams cad kyi ri/ lhun po dpal gyi sprin zhes bya ba de bzhin
142a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa ste/ gang gis de phyogs kun tu mig dri ma med par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho mching rnams yongs su sbyangs pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i bu rnams sgra dpal
142a4(mdo sde): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ lo brgyan de bzhin gsheg/ nges pa yod par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ de'i bar du nor bu'i sdong po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor stug pa'i
142a5(mdo sde): tshal chen po nga rgyan thams cad pa'i rgyan gyis/ rab tu brgya na pa ni 'di lta ste/ bsam du med pa'i rin po che/ 'od 'phro'i sprin rab tu btang ba'i snying po gnas par
142a6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra ma lus par rab tu btang ba dang / sangs rgyas grangs med pa'i gsung gi rgya mtsho mching rnam kyi sgra ma lus par rab
142a7(mdo sde): tu btang ba dang / phyogs bcur 'od zer gyi dra ba rnam par 'tsher ba'i snying pos/ khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang bu brtsegs pa thams cad snang bar byas pa dang / 
142a8(mdo sde): rin po che'i me tog 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin byung ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sngun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs pa'i sgra ma lus pa lus pa dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin
142b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rab tu btang ba'i sgra ma lus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i
142b2(mdo sde): sgra ma lus pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo gdon mi za ba'i tshig sna tshogs kyis sgrogs pa'i sgra ma lus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba'i phyir sngun
142b3(mdo sde): gyi mtshan ma rnams te/ gang rgyan de dag rnams 'byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes 'jig rten gyi khams der/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis rig
142b4(mdo sde): go/ de dag rnams kyi sngun gyi mtshan mas glengs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par yongs su smin pa de'i rnams dang / sangs rgyas lta bar mos pa rnams dang / 
142b5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi dkyil du mngon du byung ba rnams kyi phyir// bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi ri/ lhun na po dpal gyi sprin de bzhin gshegs pa de pad+mo chen
142b6(mdo sde): bau der drung ba/ de bzhin nyid dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi khams kyis rgyas pa'i sku ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing skye bar mched pa dang / byang chub kyi dkyil thams
142b7(mdo sde): cad du bzhugs pa'i sku dang / mtha' dang dpung med pa'i gzugs kyi skra shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu gong du 'phags pa zil gyis
142b8(mdo sde): mnan pa dang / mtshan nyid rin po che thams cad rgyas pa dang / sems can gyi gnas thams cad du snang ba phyin pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad lta bar mngon du ba dang / kha dog
143a1(mdo sde): mtha' med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sprin gyi dra ba rab tu gtong ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis rgyu ba dang / kha dog
143a2(mdo sde): mtha' med pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu btong ba'o// ji bzhin du yang rnam par dag par snang ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam la rab tu gnas pa/ me tog gi 'od 'phro'i rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan
143a3(mdo sde): gser du 'bar ba'i rgyan ri rab kyi spyi bor nor bu'i me tog tu rgyas pa'i yal ga'i 'khor stug po'i tshal chen po na/ sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ de bzhin du thams cad
143a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i sgra dngal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri rab bye ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi ri rab spyi bo na bzhugadas par snang ngo // de bzhin du kun tu mig dri ma med
143a5(mdo sde): par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho mching rnams tha/ mas cad na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ 
143a6(mdo sde): kyi rigs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khyon na/ glang bzhi thams cad na/ byang chub kyi dkyil na bzhugs par yang dag par snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das yon
143a7(mdo sde): tan thams cad kyi ri lhun po dpal gyi sprin de bzhin gshegs pas/ sman mtshams kyi smra mdzod nas/ dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bskrad pa'i sgra zhes bya ba/ 'od
143a8(mdo sde): zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'od zer 'khor rnams dang / rab tu btang nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas te/ gdul ba
143b1(mdo sde): thams cad rnams la bskul bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi ri lhun po dpal gyi sprin de bzhin gshegs pa des/ 'od zer de rab tu gtang ma thag tu/ de nas
143b2(mdo sde): de nyid kyi skad cig skad cig par sems can thams cad rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tsha ba rnams nye bar zhi'o// sgrib pa thams cad kyi dra ba bsalnga pa/ sangs rgyas lta bar
143b3(mdo sde): bsgrib pa'i ri rnams gtor to// sems can thams cad kyi rnyog pa'i rnams rnam par sbyangs so// dge ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i rgya mtsho mching rnam rnams byung ngo // mos
143b4(mdo sde): pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya che ba'i rnams yongs su sbyangs so// khom pa med pa thams cad dang / ngan song dang /  'gro ba ngan pa dang / g.yangs sa'i 'jigs pa rnam
143b5(mdo sde): dang bral bra'o// / lus dang sems las byung po rnams kyi ga nod pa thams cad rab tu zhi nas/ sangs rgyas lta bar dga' ba'i drag shul rnam par 'phel te/ 
143b6(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid par 'byung ba so sor rnyed do// de dag 'od zer de rnams kyis bskal pa dang / mnyam par 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad 'khor brgya stong du ma rnams
143b7(mdo sde): dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der nye bar dong ngo // de la kye rgyal ba'i bu rnam 'od 'phro'i snang ba grong khyer chen po de na/ blta bar dga' ba shin tu yid rno bo'i blo gros shes bya ba
143b8(mdo sde): rgyal por yod pa/ grong khyer bye ba ther 'bum brgya stong phrag bcu'i dpon po ste/ bsod nams kyi dpal la sogs pa/ bud med stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun yod pa'o// gzi brjid
144a1(mdo sde): chen po la sogs pa lnga brgya yod pa'o// yang gzi brjid chen po rgyal bu gzhon nu de la/ lta bar mdzes pa la sogs pa/ bud med stong phrag bcu yod pa'o// 
144a2(mdo sde): de nas gzi brjid chen po rgyal bu gzhon nus/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa mthong nas/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba byung bas chos bcu rnams skyes so// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
144a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad yon gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin skyes so// yang 'di lta ste/ sgo mo kun sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'og tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba gzungs skyes so// 
144a4(mdo sde): yang 'di lta ste/ tshul yangs pa'i sprin snying po zhes bya ba ro shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes so// yang ba di lta ste/ 'gro ba thams cad gdul ba'i rgyan chen po
144a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byams pa skyes so// yang 'di lta ste/ kun tu skad kyi sprin rgya che ba zhes bya ba snying rje chen po skyes so// yang 'di lta ste/ mtha' dang dpung med pa'i bas
144a6(mdo sde): pa'i dz+nyAn yang dag par gong du 'phags pa'i drag shul ces bya ba dga' ba chen po skyes pa'o// yang 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ji bzhin du grag shul zhes bya ba btang snyoms
144a7(mdo sde): chen po skyes so// yang 'di lta ste/ 'og ga tshul yangs pa rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi snying po zhes bya ba mngon par shes pa chen po byung ngo // yang 'di lta ste/ mos pa'i rgya
144a8(mdo sde): mtsho mtshang rnam stobs kyi drag shul gyis rnam par spel pa zhes bya ba smon lam chen po'i tshul gyi sgo mo skyes so// yang 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi snang
144b1(mdo sde): ba la 'jugs pa'i drag shul zhes bya ba so sor yang dag par shes pa'i ye shes chen po'i ske mo phra mo skyes so// de nas gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba rgyal bu gzhon nu chos chen po'i snang ba rnyed
144b2(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis 'khor gyi mdun ma thams cad ji snyed pa la tshigs su bcad po 'di dag smras so// nyi ma'i sprin ni stong phrag rnams// nam mkhar shar pa ji
144b3(mdo sde): bzhin pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni snang ba ni// byang chub dkyil du dri med pa'o// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag nas// 'jig rten 'dren pa gong du byung // sangs rgyas byung bar yang dag skyes// / 
144b4(mdo sde): kun tu rgyas pa snang ba'o// lto shig sangs rgyas 'od zer/ dgyis// sangs rgyas sprin rnams bsam med pa// da gnas kun tu ni snang ba ni// de bzhin gshegs pa
144b5(mdo sde): snyems zhugs pa'o// 'od 'phro'i sprin ni rab btang bas/ 'od zer sprin las zad med phyir// snang bar byed pa/ 'i 'jig rten 'dir// lto shig sangs rgyas rnam sprul
144b6(mdo sde): lo/ lto shig sangs rgyas sku las su// 'od zer dra bas dri med pa// sems can kun dang mnyam sku rnams// rgyas so phyogs dang mtshams rnams so// yid ni chud pa'i sangs rgyas
144b7(mdo sde): gsung // 'gro ba kun tu gsung ba ni// sems can kun gyis dbyangs kyi yan lag du// sangs rgyas bsngags par zer de'o// sangs rgyas 'od kyis reg nas su// sems can thams
144b8(mdo sde): cad bde bar gyur// sdug bsngal thams cad ni gnas kyang // 'gro bar dga' skyes rmad byung ba'o// lho shig byang chub sems rnams kyi// sprin rnams 'ong ba phyogs bcu nas// 
145a1(mdo sde): nor bu'i sprin rnams rapa gtong shing // stong pa'i spyanarnams rgyal ba'i spyan sngar ro// byang chub dkyil du sgrog pa ni// sgra yi rgya mtshobab mo ste// sems can kun gyi
145a2(mdo sde): bsngal zhing // lho shig sangs rgyas rnam sprul lo// thams cad rim gror bcas gyur to// dga' ba skyes nas shin tu dga'// 'jig rten mgon por 'dong par byar// chos kyi rgyal po lnga/ 
145a3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir// kye rgyal ba'i bu rnams gzi bi rjid che ba'i rgyal bu gzhon nu/ de tshigs bcad 'di dag smra ba na/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/ sgra dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
145a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems can gyi gnas su rjes su sgrog go// de nas rgyal po lta bar dga' ba shin tu yid rno ba'i blo dgros/ tshigs bcad 'di dag thos nas/ dga' ba
145a5(mdo sde): chen po skyes te/ rang gi 'khor la tshigs bcad 'di ga smras so// bsdu bar gyi shig rgyal po rnams/ gzhon nu rnams dang dpon sna rnams// blon po rnams
145a6(mdo sde): dang grong 'dab de bzhin te// de bzhin gnas kyis sems can yang ngo // rnga rdung gau shig myur du ni// grong khyer rnams su kun tu ste// g.yugs su lhan cig thams cad ni/ 
145a7(mdo sde): chos shig rgyal ba lta ba ru// bkra shis dril bu dkrol bar byos// 'don bzhi ru ni kun tu ste// bu dang chung ma 'khor bcas par// deng shig rgyal ba lta ba ru// brgyan par gyis
145a8(mdo sde): shig grong khyer ni// rgyan gyi su ni kun tu ste// sbrengs shig rgyal mtshan rtse mo rnams// sna tshogs nor bus rnam bris pa'o// rin chen dra ba'i bla re rnams// bris shig nam mkha'i
145b1(mdo sde): 'og tu ste// dkrol shig sil khrol sprin rnams nI// nam mkha' 'di'i kun tu'o// lam dang srang rnams brgyan nas su// rin chen gos rnams char du drog// rdeg pa rin chen rnams ni
145b2(mdo sde): sbyor 'ding ngo rgyal ba lta ba ru// ring rang gi ni rnam rgyal bar// sna tshogs sprin ni cher phob shig/ thams cad rgyan gyi sprin gyis su// nam mkha'i 'og ni g.yogs par gyis/ 
145b3(mdo sde): dri'i pad+mo 'od sprin rnams// me tog gdugs kyang bsam med pa// saM mo do dang zla gam sprin// gos kyi sprin kyang char du phab// ri rab dri chu'i rnams su ni// nor bu 'khor los
145b4(mdo sde): rnam bris pa// dag pa'i tsan dan phye ma rnams// nam mkha'i 'og tu ston par gyis// nor bu do shal me/ dag do shal yang // rin chen se mo do rnams dri med rag
145b5(mdo sde): nor bu mar me sprin rnams kyang // nam mkha' 'og tu bas ngas par gyis// thams cad sangs rgyas mngon gyur ma/ dga' ba bskrad cing gzha' ba dang / bu dang 'khor du
145b6(mdo sde): bcas pa yang // dang shig rgyal ba blta bar ro// de nas rgyal po lta bar dga' ba shin tu yid rno ba'i blo gros dang lhan cig pa ni/ bsod namos dpal sogs pa bud med stong phrag
145b7(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang / gzi brjid chen po la sogs pa gzhon nu lnga brgya rnams dang / blo gros kyi stobs la sogs pa/ blon po stong phrag drug cu rnams te/ de lta bu la sogs
145b8(mdo sde): pa srog chags bye ba ther 'bum brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun rnams kyis bskor nas/ mdun du byas te/ 'od 'phro'i snang ba'i grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ stobs dang
146a1(mdo sde): bcas pa mang po nam mkha'i 'og tu mngon par gong du 'phags nas/ rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos rgyun thams cad kyi sprin gyis/ 
146a2(mdo sde): nam mkha' thams cad ji snyed pa brgyan cing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der nye bar song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig na 'dug go/ 
146a3(mdo sde): sdong po'i me tog gis bris pa'i lha'i grong khyer nas kyang / shin tu 'deng ngo ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i lha'i dbang po lnga bye ba thar 'bum brgya stong phrag bcu rnams dang lhan cig tu
146a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba drer nye bar song nas/ bco dam ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgos phyag 'tshal nas / mtha' cig tu 'dug go/ yongs su thug pa'i klu chen
146a5(mdo sde): po grong khyer nas kyang / dri ma med pa'i chu'i snang ba zhe sa bya ba/ klu'i dbang po ni klu bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga rnams dang lhan cig du'o// rdo rje'i dpal gyis bris
146a6(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal mtshan gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer nas kyang / 'gro bar dpa' zhes bya ba/ gnod sbyin bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun rnams dang lhan cig tu'o// shin tu dri ma med pa// dri
146a7(mdo sde): za'i grong khyer nas kyang / lta bar dga' ba zhes bya ba/ dri za'i rgyal po ni bye ba phrag dgu cu rtsa bdun rnams dang ngo // 'khor lo dpal gyis rnam par bris pa lha ma yin gyi grong khyer
146a8(mdo sde): nas kyang / rnam par dag pa'i gzugs sems pa zhes bya ba lha ma yin gyi dbang po ni/ lha ma yin bya ba brgya stong lnga cu rtsa brgyad 'khor rnams dang ngo // rin po ches shin tu
146b1(mdo sde): bris pa'i lte ba nam mkha' lding gi grong khyer nus kyang / stobs bcu spyod pa zhes bya ba/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'khor/ nam mkha' lding stong drag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rnams dang ngo // 
146b2(mdo sde): rol par dga' ba dang ldan pa mi 'am ci'i grong khyer nas kyang / rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po// mi 'am ci bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang ngo // rin po che rdo rje
146b3(mdo sde): sra ba'i rgyal mtshan/ lto 'phye chen po'i grong khyer nas kyang / rin po che grags pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po lto 'phye chen po bye ba thar 'bum brgya stong
146b4(mdo sde): phrag gsum rnams dang lhan tsog du'o// legs par dbris pa'i rgyan tshangs pa'i grong khyer nas kyang / da gra las shin tu rgyal ba zhes bya ba tshangs pa'i dbang po
146b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang lhan cig pas bskor te/ mdun du byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das yo na tan thams cad kyi ri lhun po dpal gyi sprin/ de bzhin
146b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa gang na ba dang nye bar song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgos phyag 'tshal nas/ mtha' gcig na 'dug ste/ de lta bu la sogs pa grong khyer bya ba ther
146b7(mdo sde): 'bum brgya stong phrag bcu rnam nA grong khyer 'khor dang bcas pa'i sems go 'dun gyi ris gnas pa rnams dang / rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams ni/ bcom ldan 'das gang na
146b8(mdo sde): bder nye bar song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ mtha' gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi ri lhun po dpal gyi sprin de bzhin gshag
147a1(mdo sde): pa/ sems can de dag gi gdul ba'i dbang bzhes te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho mching rnam de la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par/ 
147a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa/ chos rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud bsam pa ji bzhin pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag par ston par mdzad pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi mchog
147a3(mdo sde): tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i rgyud ni 'khor to// de nas gzi brjid che ba'i byang chub sems dpas/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi ri lhun po dpal gyi sprin de bzhin gshegs
147a4(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di thos nas/ sngon gyi yang dag pa/ byung ba'i chos kyi rgya mtsho mching rnam gyis chos kyi spyan yang dag par rnyed pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi
147a5(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mo ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag par rnyed do// yang 'di lta ste/ tho gas mar chos thams cad la snyoms par 'jug pa byang chub
147a6(mdo sde): kyi sems bskyed pa'i gnas shes pa'i snang ba yang dag par rnyed do// 'di lta ste// chos kyi khams phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying pos mig rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag par
147a7(mdo sde): rnyed do// yong 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi snang ba rnam par shes pa'i smon lam rgya mtsho mching rnam la ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag par rnyed
147a8(mdo sde): do// yang 'di lta ste/ mtha' dang dpung med pa'i yon tan chen po'i rgya mtsho mching rnams rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag par
147b1(mdo sde): rnyed do// yang 'di lta ste/ yangs pa'i sgo mo zab mo'i snang ba 'byung ba'i rgya mtsho mching rnamapa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag par rnyed pa
147b2(mdo sde): ni/  gang 'di stobs chen po drag shul gyis snying po gnas rib chen po'i rgya mtsho mching rnam la ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag par rnyed do// yang 'di lta ste/ chos kyi khams kyis mtha'
147b3(mdo sde): dang dpung med pa'i rgyan du sprul pa 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag par rnyed do// yang 'di lta ste/ chad med pa'i yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho mching
147b4(mdo sde): rnam la 'jug par mngon par sgrub pa'i rgya mtsho mching tsApa 'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag par rnyed do// yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen par mos pa'i rgya
147b5(mdo sde): mtsho mching rnam gyi sprin gyi rgyan yang dag par 'ongs pa'i rgya mtsho mching rnam la ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag pa rnyed do// yang 'di lta ste/ chos kyi khams mtha' dang
147b6(mdo sde): dpung med pa dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par mkhyen par 'gro ba thams cad mngon du lta ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa'i rgya mtsho mching rnam la ye shes kyi snang ba
147b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rnyed do// yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag par rnyed do// de nas gzi
147b8(mdo sde): brjid che ba'i byang chub sems dpas yon tan thams cad kyi lhun po'i dpal gyi sprin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i rgya mtsho mching rnam la ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag par
148a1(mdo sde): rnyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i chen tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ngadagul snang ba smras pa ni// rgyal po'i chos nyid thos nas su// gang gis mthong
148a2(mdo sde): ba sangs rgyas kyi// sngun gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rnams// thams cad che yi mthong ba ni// gzugs kyi 'byor pa ji 'dra ba// mi mang rnams kyi dmigs pa dang // gang yang sangs rgyas mchod
148a3(mdo sde): pa rnams// bskal pa rgya mtsho spyod pa na// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thad nas sngun// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mchod nas su// zhing ni rgya mtsho sbyangs pa'o// bdag gis lus rnams btang ba ni// 
148a4(mdo sde): yangs pa'i rgya mtsho mang po rnams// dam pa'i spyad pa spyod pa na// zhing rgya mtsho rnams sbyangs pa'o// dan dang shings kyi rgya mtsho rnams// zhabs phyag dbu rnam
148a5(mdo sde): de bzhin te// rgyal dang nang gi 'khor rnams btang ba ni/ zhing rgya mtsho rnams sbyangs pa'o// zhing ni re re re re/ na// bskal pa bye ba bsam med pa// byang chub spyad pa
148a6(mdo sde): spyod pa ni// sbyangs so zhing rgya mtsho rnams// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyis// spyod pa rgya mtsho sprad nas su// sangs rgyas thams cad rgya mtshon// zhing rgya mtsho rnams sbyangs pa'o// 
148a7(mdo sde): ji ltar nyi ma'i snod pas ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba ltar// sangs rgyas shes pa'i snang bas su// sngun gyi spyod pa mthong ba'o// zhing gi rgya mtsho gang dag pa// dri mad
148a8(mdo sde): 'od du mthong ba ste// byang chub sad pa zhi ba ni// chos kyi khams ni rgyas na'o// de 'drar dbyang bar bya ba ni// yangs pa'i zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs
148b1(mdo sde): kyis/ byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na'o// yang rgyal bu'i bu rnams gzi brjid chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' des/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams can gyi ri lhun po dpal gyi sprin de
148b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs po de la/ lta bas mnyes par byas pas/ mchod pa'i las byas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang / 'jig rten thams
148b3(mdo sde): cad du snang bar byed cing / sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mching rnam yang rab tu grang bar byed cing / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi tshul rnams kyang rab tu grags
148b4(mdo sde): par byed cing / yon tan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho mchi dang rnam gyi tshul rnams kyang / rab tu grags par byed cing / chos kyi khams thams cad la mtshungs par
148b5(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i yang shes kyi sgo mo yongs su sbyangs pa yang rab tu grags par byed cing / byang chub kyi dkyil tha mas cad du mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam par
148b6(mdo sde): sprul pa rnams kyang rab tu grags par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / ye shes kyang tha ma dad par rab tu glags par byed cing / 
148b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ sgo mo kun tu lta ba rnam par chud pa yang rab tu grags par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'ang rab tu grags
148b8(mdo sde): par byed cing / mtha' dang dpung med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyan rnams kyang ston par byed cing / kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam kyang mngon par
149a1(mdo sde): sgrud cing / ri rab kyi mchog tu dra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub kyi sems bskyed par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mdog tu dra ba'i rdu
149a2(mdo sde): dang mnyam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa kun tu bzung ngo // de nas yon tan thams cad kyi ri lhun po dpal gyi sprin de bzhin gshegs pas gza
149a3(mdo sde): brjid chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' la/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gzi brjid che ba dge'o dga'o// bsod nams snying po grags pa che// gang khyod sems can thams
149a4(mdo sde): cad la// phan phyir ru ni byang chub chos// snang ba khyod kyi/ brtan pa ni// chos kyi khams ni rgyas nasu// bsod nam/ sa sprin dang blo che ba/ 'gyur ro ye shAs rgya mtsho ru/ 
149a5(mdo sde): zhing gi rdul mnyam bskal pa rnams// zhing gcig tu ni spyod nas su// ye shes 'di 'drar 'gyur ba ni// dzi drar de la mthong ba'o// mi nus chu ngu'i brtson 'grus kyis/ 
149a6(mdo sde): kun shes pa ru tshul 'di ni// brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs ldan pas// zhing rgya mtsho rnams ngag byed do// thams cad rdul gyir 'jug pa ni// gang gis bskal pa rgya tshe spyod// de dag
149a7(mdo sde): 'di ni 'di 'drar 'gyur// rgyan rnams zhing gi rgya mtsho ru// sems can re re re ra la// byas pas bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams// 'khor zhing bskyob med pa ni// de dag 'jig rten 'dren
149a8(mdo sde): par 'gyur// tha ma'i mtha' yi bskal pa rnams// rgyal ba rer mchod pa yang // gang dag sems ni mi skyo ba// de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// rgyal po khyod ni smon
149b1(mdo sde): lam gyis// gang dag dus gsum 'dren pa kun// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor na ni// khyod kyi lus ni 'dug pa'o// mtha' dang dpung med smon lam rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgya mtsho
149b2(mdo sde): la// 'jug pa rnams kyi blo che ba// de dag tshul 'dir gnas par 'gyur// nga la mched pa byed pas ni// gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ste// lhun po'i rdul mnyam sems can
149b3(mdo sde): rnams// byang chub phyir ni yongs smin byas// kun tu bzang po gang dpa' rnams// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// chos kyi khams ni rgyas nas// rgya mtsho zhing rnams
149b4(mdo sde): ngag byed do// de la kye rgyal ba'i bu rnams rgyan por rig dpa'i bskal pas/ chu bo gang ga'i bye ma dang mnyam dang / bar ma'i bskal pa rnams gyur to// de'i dus na mi
149b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar ma'i bskal pas gnyis su gyur pa'o// yang rgyal ba'i bu rnams yon tan thams ca/ da kyi ri lhun po dpal gyi de bzhin gshegs pa/ de'i tshe
149b6(mdo sde): tshad kyang lo bye ba phrag lnga brgyar gyur pa'o// da mya ngan las 'das nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa lags spyan rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung ngo // nor bu'i ma
149b7(mdo sde): tog gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor stug pa'i tshal chen po de nyid mthong ngo // gzi brjid che ba'i rgyal bu gzhon nus pha rol tu phyin pa lags so spyan rgyan gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
149b8(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub kyi rnam par sprul pa/ de mthong nas mtha' med pa'i ske mo rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rnyed do// ye shes
150a1(mdo sde): / yangs pa'i byin gyi dmas chos khyil pa'i gnas kyang rnyed do// kun tu rjes su song ba 'gro ba gdul bar gti mug med pa zhes bya ba byams pa chen po yang rnyed na
150a2(mdo sde): dmigs pa thams cad kyi ske mo'i sprin rgyal ba zhes bya snying rje chen po yang rnyed par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho mching rnam byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod ces bya ba/ 
150a3(mdo sde): dga' ba chen po yang rnyed par gyur to// chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i 'og tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba btang snyoms chen po yang rnyed nas/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa chos kyi
150a4(mdo sde): khams lus yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnyed par gyur to// chags pa med pa'i 'og rnam par snang bar rjesu song bzla bya ba/ 
150a5(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa'ang rnyed par gyur to// dri ma med pa/ ra 'khyil pa shin tu rig par snyoms par 'jugapa zhes bya ba/ so sor yang dag par shes pa'ang rnyed
150a6(mdo sde): par gyur to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyong ba'i mdzod ces bya ba ye shes kyi steng ba yang rnyed par gyur to// de lta bu la sogs pa'i chos stong
150a7(mdo sde): phrag bcu rnams thob par gyur to// de nas gzi brjid che ba'i rgyal bu gzhon nu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyi mdun ma thams cad ji snyed pa la tshigs su bcad pa
150a8(mdo sde): 'di dag smras so// bskal pa bye ba phrag rnams bsam med par// 'jig rten 'dren pa mchog ni dkon pa ste// shin tu khyer rnyed zhing 'di sems can rnams// gang gi sangs
150b1(mdo sde): rgyas gnyis po 'dri mthong ba'o// sangs rgyas sku las 'od ni rab btang ba// kha dog mtha' med yangs pa rnam dag ste// 'od zer sprin gyis zhing kun rgyas nas// thams cad rgyal ba
150b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi yon tan zer// 'od zer rag nas yang dag dga' ba bskyas// 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal ma lus ni// phan tshun rim gror bcas nas byams pa'i sems// sangs rgyas rnam
150b3(mdo sde): sprul rnams ni 'di mthong ba'o// bsam med sprul pa dra ba'i sprin rnams ni// du ma'i gzugs kyi 'od kyi dra ba btang bas no// phyogs bcu'i zhing ni rgyas par byed pas su// sangs rgyas
150b4(mdo sde): rnam sprul rnams ni ston par byed// ba s+phu re re nas ni rgyu dal bas btang // dbyangs kyi sprin rnams nam mkha' rgyas nas su// mun pa dang ni mun gnag sdang byed
150b5(mdo sde): dang // dmyal ba kun tu sdug bsngal zhi byed do// sangs/ rgyas kyi ni gsung skad phyogs bcu ru// thams cad skad kyis kun tu sgrog pa ni// sems can rnams kyi sngon
150b6(mdo sde): dag rgya mtsho rnams// sangs rgyas rnam sprul rnams ni de lto shig/ 'khor gyi rgya mtsho yongs pa tshad med rnams// mtha' dang dpung mang byung ba sangs rgyas kyi// da ru rgyal du chos kyi 'khor
150b7(mdo sde): lo bskor// sems can rnams kyi rgya ma tshe zad med gdul// rnam par sprul pa tshad med ltos// thams cad zhing du rgyal ba bzhugs// de ltar chags med yang shes bang gshegs
150b8(mdo sde): kyi/ sems can rnams kyi don phyir byang chub sad// chos shig dga' zhing gzha' ba dang // rim gror bcas shing yid dga' rangs pa su// 'dong bar bya'o bde gshegs de lta bar
151a1(mdo sde): gang mthong nas ni sdug bsngal thams cad zhi// byang chub phyir ru yang dag sems bskyed nas// 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i yid gyur la/ kun tu bzang po smon lam
151a2(mdo sde): byas nas su// thams cad 'gyur ro chos kyi rgyal po bzhin// de'i sgra de sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis/ thogs pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ji snyed par rgyas par byed
151a3(mdo sde): de/ de thos nas tshad med pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi smon lam byas par gyur to// de pha dang ma dang 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa dang / sani bya ba thar 'bu ma brgya stong mtha' mod
151a4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi kyang bskor te/ mdun du byas nas rin po de che'i gdugs kyi sprin lnga rnams kyis nam mkha' tha/ dmas cad ji snyed pa snyoms par g.yogs shing bcom ldan
151a5(mdo sde): 'das grang na ba der nye bar phyin to// nye bar phyin pa de dag rnams la/ bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa legs spyan rgyan gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa des/ 
151a6(mdo sde): chom kyi khams rang bzhin gyis/ dri ma med pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i rgyud yang dag par ston par mdzad pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho mchod rnams kyi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang / 
151a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa'i rgyud 'khor to// des de thos nas tshul thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa srid par byung ngo // rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi gom pa dri ma med par snang ba zhes
151a8(mdo sde): bya ba'i sa yang thob bo// 'gro ba thams cad la byams pa yang dag par ston pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor yang bzhugs so// zhing thams cad
151b1(mdo sde): mtshungs par 'byung ba/ du ma'i 'jig rten du blta bar rnam par dag pa spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang mched pa'o// dri ma med pa'i bsod nams kyi sprin rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan spyod
151b2(mdo sde): pa'i dkyil 'khyer la yang zhugs so// chos thams cad rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi khyon snang ba rjes su 'gro ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su yang byung ngo // ye shes chen po'i drag shul gyi rgyun
151b3(mdo sde): gnas rab kyi dkyil 'khor du yang yang dag par chas so// rang byung gi sgom par shin tu lta ba'i drag shul dbang skur ba'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mching rnam la yang zhugs so// de bzhin
151b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi mtsha/ dan nyid brnyan par snang de'i rnam par snang ba chen po das kyang snang bar byas so// tshad med pa'i smon lam gyi
151b5(mdo sde): stobs smos pa'i rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi snying po smon la/ ma gyis bsgrubs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis kyang rnam par dag go/ de nas pha rol tu phyin pa lag spun rgyan
151b6(mdo sde): gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas/ bzi brjid che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// dge'o dge'o ye shes yon tan mtsho// sangs rgyas
151b7(mdo sde): byang chub smon lam la ni gnas// 'gyur ro rgyal ba'i dam pa bsam med pa// samra can kun gyi mgon dang bor ba'o// byung ngo ye shas chen po'i mtshor// chos kyi khams
151b8(mdo sde): kun rgyas nas su// mi zad yangs pa sangs rgyas yul// bsam med tshul du 'jug 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan sprin ni mthong // ye shes sa ni 'jug pa zad
152a1(mdo sde): med pa// pha rol phyin pa thams cad rgya mtsho tshul// grags chen yon tan rnams ni rdzogs par 'gyur// gzungs kyi tshul ni rgya mtsho mang po dang // yang dag shes
152a2(mdo sde): kyi tshul gang zad med rnams// spyod dang smon la mngon par bsgrubs nas khyod// mtshungs pa'i ye shes 'byung bar 'gyur// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho rnams la 'jug par 'gyur// smon lam
152a3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho rnams su byung bar gyur// rnam par sprul pa 'di la byung gyur nas// sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di ni bsam med pa'o// chos khams dam pa bsam med pa// bsam pa yangs pa
152a4(mdo sde): sbyangs nas su// sangs rgyas sprin 'di rnam lnga ste/ rgya mtsho zhing ni dri mod sbyongs// nga yi byang chub spyod pa dazhugs// sngon gyi sbyor tshul rgya mtsho mang po ru// ji 'drar/ 
152a5(mdo sde): ngas ni spyod pa sbyangs// de 'drar khyod kyang tshul la songs// re re re re'i zhing du ngas sangs rgyas// rgya mtsho brgya rna/ mas mang po shin tu mchod// sngon gyi spyod pa de yi 'bras
152a6(mdo sde): bu 'di// ltos shig rgyal hI med 'di 'dra ba// yangs pa'i bskal pa rgya mtsho mo zad par// zhing ni rgya mtsho spyod pas rnam pa spongs// smon lam go cha bgos pa bsam med pas/ 
152a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro rnam par sprul pa 'di 'dra bar// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ma lus mchos// zhing gi rgya mtsho yangs pa sbyangs// bskal po kun gyi khyen sprad nas// rgyal ba yon chen 'od 'gyur ro// 
152a8(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i bu rnams pha rol tu phyin pa legs spyan rgyan gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ pha bltar dga' ba shin tu yid rno ba'i blo gros dus
152b1(mdo sde): 'das nas/ gzi brjid che ba'i gzhon nus 'khor los skor ba'i rgyal thabs thob bo// nor bu me tog gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor sngags pa'i tshal chen po de na yang bsod nams rgya mtsho mching
152b2(mdo sde): rnam shin tu gong du byung bas/ zil gyis ma mnan pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas de'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rnam par sprul pas
152b3(mdo sde): des de mthong nas/ 'khor thams cad dang lhan cig pa ni/ yan lag bzhi pa'i ris stobs dang lhan cig pa dang / rin po che bdun rnams dang lhan cig pa dang / grongs 'dab na gnas
152b4(mdo sde): pa'i sems can dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das bsod na dmas rgya mtsho mching rnam shin tu gong du byung ba/ zil dgyis ma mnan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
152b5(mdo sde): gang na ba der phyin nas/ dri thams cad kyi nor bu'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ nor bu rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la des phul lo// 
152b6(mdo sde): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des/ kun tu mig spyad pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud yang dag par ston par mdzad pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi/ 
152b7(mdo sde): mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i rgyud 'khor to// gang gzi brjid che ba'i byang chub sems dpas thos nas/ bsod nams chen po rnam par snang bar byed pa zhe bya ba ting nge 'dzin rab tu
152b8(mdo sde): rnyed do// gang ting nge 'dzin rnyed nas/ dus gsum thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang / bsod nas ma yin pa'i rgya mtsho mching rnam
153a1(mdo sde): rnams mngon du gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams rgya mtsho mching rnam shin tu gong du byung ba zil gyis mnan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas/ 'khor
153a2(mdo sde): gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par gzigs nas/ gzi brjid chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// bsod nams yon tan gzi brjid dge'o// 
153a3(mdo sde): gang nga'i thad du khyod 'ongs pa// dam pa'i byang chub smon lam yid kyi ste// 'gro ba kun la snying rje bsam pa'i mtsho// sdug bsngal sems can kun la khyod// rab dgrol snying rje snying
153a4(mdo sde): por chas// 'gyur ro 'gro ba'i dpung gnyen du// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod tshul de'i// byang chub sems dpa'i rab sra skyon min gyi// yid kyis dam pa'i spyad pa spyod pa
153a5(mdo sde): ni// de dag gis ni ye shes 'di 'dra snyed// mchog dang / dam pa chags pa med pa'o// bsod nams 'od// dang bsod nams mngon mtshan dang // bsod nams 'byung
153a6(mdo sde): gnas bsod nams rgya mtsho ste// rnam dag gang khyod kun tu bzang po yi// smon lam spyad phyir chas pa bdag che ba 'o// khyod ni 'di ru mtha' dang dpung med pa// rgyal po'i
153a7(mdo sde): rgya mtsho bsem med rnams su 'jug/ de dag gi yang bsod nams rgya mtsho ni// mu med mthong zhing mos par 'gyur ba'o// gang khyod rgyal ba rnams kyi sprin rnams ni phyogs bcu yi ni
153a8(mdo sde): zhang du mthong ba ni// de dag gi yang rgya mtsho spyod pa rnams// sngon ni ji ltar spyod pa mthong ba'o// gang tshul rgya mtsho mching rnam de las su// gal te ye shes sa ru gnas pa ni// de
153b1(mdo sde): dag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur bas na// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni rjes su slobs// khyod zhing kun gyi rgya mtsho mching rnam rdul// mnyam pa'i bskal pa rgya mtsho sprad nas su// sngun
153b2(mdo sde): gyi spyod pa rgyal ba kun gyi mtsho// khyod slob shig dang rang 'byung bar ru 'gyur// ji ltar phyogs bcu ru ni mthong ba ni// zhing rnams kyi na rgya mtsho shin tu dag/ de bzhin khyod kyi zhing yA rnam dag
153b3(mdo sde): par/ 'gyur ro sla bzhin du ni smon lam gyis// de dag 'khor gyi rgya mtsho 'dir// khyod smon thos nas dga' ba skyes// byang chub phyi ru chas byed ni// kun tu bzang po'i theg pas
153b4(mdo sde): so// bskal pa rgya mtsho spyod par bya ba ni// mtha' dang da/ bung med zhing gi khyon du ni// smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ni// kun tu bzang po yi ni spyod phyir ro// 
153b5(mdo sde): nor bu'i me tog gi yal gi dkyil 'khor stug pa'i tshal chen po de nyid na/ brjod par grags pa sbran pa d+mo'i mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'jog rten
153b6(mdo sde): du byung ngo // de yang de nas shi 'phos nas/ ri rab kyi steng na/ rin po che zhi ba'i gnas shes bya ba// lha'i grong khyer du phyin to// de nas bsod nams yangs pa'i mngon mtshan
153b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba lha chen po'i rgyal po ste/ lha'i 'dun ma'i 'khor dang bcas par/ rin po che'i me tog gi sprin mngon par 'bebs shing bcom ldan 'das brjod par grags pa
153b8(mdo sde): spyan pad+mo'i mngon mtshan zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang na ba der nye bar phyin to// de la bcom ldan 'das brjod par grags pa spyan pad+mo'i mngon mtshan de bzhin gshegs pa
154a1(mdo sde): des yangs pa'i tshul sgo mo kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud yang dag par ston par mdzad pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi mchog tu phra ba
154a2(mdo sde): rdul dang mnye pa'i rgyud 'khor des de thos nas ske mo kun tu dga' ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho mching rnam pa'i 'og tu zhugs so// 
154a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi snyan gyi gong rgyan las shin tu rgya che ba'i theg pa chen po bshad pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// / 
154a4(mdo sde): lotso ba tse btsan skyes kyis bsgyur/ yi ge ba ni shin mu la/ tol bris/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rata nA ka ran nA maHdmA hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon
154a5(mdo sde): mchog 'byung gnas shes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// 
154a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das yul gnas bcas na/ nags pa'i kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ dgra
154a7(mdo sde): bcom pa drug khri nyis stong dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang thag pa chen
154a8(mdo sde): po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ thag pa dpag tu med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa grangs med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang dag par
154b1(mdo sde): zhugs pa/ theg pa mtshungs pa med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa gzhal du med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa brjod du med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa
154b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
154b3(mdo sde): zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam
154b4(mdo sde): la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshung sa pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su drag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ dri 'jig
154b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa/ yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhug/ sa pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i sangs
154b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par bzhugs pa sha stag go/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil
154b7(mdo sde): gyis gnon pa la sogs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rtse ba'i slad du rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa
154b8(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa bshad du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ thag pa dpag tu
155a1(mdo sde): ma mchis pa yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa grangs ma mchis pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa
155a2(mdo sde): mtshungs pa ma mchis pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa brjod du ma mchis pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma
155a3(mdo sde): mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon la la yang dag
155a4(mdo sde): par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag dpa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs 'jig rten gyi
155a5(mdo sde): khams mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongasu dag pa'i smon le la yA dag pa zhug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
155a6(mdo sde): tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa sha
155a7(mdo sde): stag mchis pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das las sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa thos na/ 'jig rten gyis khams dpag tu ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchi/ 
155a8(mdo sde): pa yongs su dag pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / 
155b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / 
155b2(mdo sde): gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par 'jug pa'i slad du/ brtson 'grus rgya cher
155b3(mdo sde): rtsom zhing / de dag go cha sra bar 'gyur/ go cha stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ go cha rdo rje lta bur 'gyur/ go cha mi shigs par 'gyur/ go cha mi ldog par 'gyur/ go cha mi bzlogs par
155b4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ yi dam brtan par 'gyur/ yi dam stobs dang lnga na par 'gyur/ yi dam mi 'khrugs par 'gyur/ yid mra mi ldog par 'gyur/ yi dam mi ldog par 'gyur/ 
155b5(mdo sde): stobs bskyed pa thob par 'gyur/ bgyid pa thams cad la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis rab tu/ bstad bstod par 'gyur/ de dag mchi ba'i phyogs su
155b6(mdo sde): mun pa ma mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bla na med pa spyod pa na/ zhum pa ma mchis/ rgod pa ma mchis smyig lug pa ma mchis/ sems can rnams kyi bsam
155b7(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pa la/ de dag gi byang chub thogs pa ma ma chis par 'gyur/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i bsgrubs pa btsal pos/ 'thun par chos ston par 'gyur/ sems can
155b8(mdo sde): rnams kyi gan du mchi ba'i dus btsal ba la gnas par 'gyur/ sems can gdul ba'i cho ga la mkhas par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa la sems can rnams 'dzud pa'i thabs
156a1(mdo sde): la mkhas par 'gyur// brjod pa thams cad lam chags par 'gyur// mdor bsdus pa dang / rgyas pa la mkhas pas/ nye ba dang / ring bar 'du shes pa ma
156a2(mdo sde): mchis par 'gyur lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal lags so
156a3(mdo sde): legs so// khyed ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa dpag tu med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du
156a4(mdo sde): med brjod du med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang // 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi re zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag
156a5(mdo sde): par zhugs pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/ gzhal/ du med/ brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa
156a6(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / snying rtse ba/ don 'dod pa/ snying rje can 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / bde par rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sem
156a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces spras byed pa ste/ 'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa de yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
156a8(mdo sde): de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas spobs so// 'jam dpal de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la/ yid la zung shig dang bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs
156b1(mdo sde): zhes gsol te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs cha na/ 
156b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa/ bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rabs kyi rdul rnyed kyi sangs rgyas zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
156b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te mtsho zhing gzhes la/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i sangs
156b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam dang ldan/ 
156b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam dang ldan/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i
156b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam dang ldan no// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo
156b7(mdo sde): gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa
156b8(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa thos na/ de thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams grangs/ 
157a1(mdo sde): med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jam
157a2(mdo sde): dpal ngas gang ga'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams mar me can na/ tshong dus kyi dbus su/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad las/ 
157a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa thos pa de'i tshe/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// gang gi tshe ngas mi skye ba'i chos la
157a4(mdo sde): bzod pa thob pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad des / nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa
157a5(mdo sde): khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med na/ de bzhin ga/ shags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi
157a6(mdo sde): khams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ rjod du mang
157a7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de las/ ngas rang gi lung bstan pa thos nas/
