237b5(mdo sde): pa/ 'jam dpal phyin ci logs ces bya ba de ni chos gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'a/ des phyin ci log ces bgyi ba de ni yang dag pa nyid kyi
237b6(mdo sde): mtha'i tshig bla dgas so// bka' stsal po/ 'jam dpal yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha' ni skrag par mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/ yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha'
237b7(mdo sde): ni skrag par mi 'gyur te/ mi skrag pa zhes bshad pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dpar bgyi na yang dag pa'i mtha' yang yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes brjod lags mod kyi/ don
237b8(mdo sde): dam par na yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mi dmigs te/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das skrag pa'ang mi dmigs/ mi skrag pa'ang mi dmigs lags so bcom ldan 'das chos thams
238a1(mdo sde): / cad brjod du ma mchis pa yang mi dmigs lags so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// chos rnams thad mi smag ste/ mi/ 
238a2(mdo sde): skrag pa yang mchis ma lags// chos rnams brjod pa tsam du bas// yang dag mtshan nyid de ma lags// ma skyes pa yi bu la yang // bu zhes gdags par 'gyur mod kyi// de na bu ni rnyed mi
238a3(mdo sde): 'gyur// kun rdzob chos rnams de 'dra lags// ji ltar mo sham bu rnams ni// 'chi bar 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa// de bzhin kun rdzob chos rnams kyang // rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs lags// kun
238a4(mdo sde): rdzob rnams kyang kun rdzob tu// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyu/ dar te// ji ltar nam mkha' bar snang la// ri mo bris pa/ ma mchis lags// kun rdzob la yang kun rdzob ces// mi
238a5(mdo sde): gang rjes su 'byung ba ni// de la phyin ci log ces kyang // mig ldan rnam par mthong ba smra// kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don// de dag nyi ga mi rtogs te// gang gis de ltar mi
238a6(mdo sde): rtogs pa// de ni chos nyid mi rtogs so// gang dag chos nyid mi rtogs pa// de dag so so'i skye bor gsungs// de dag 'jig rten mgon kun gyis// mu stegs gzhan zhes rab tu gsungs/ 
238a7(mdo sde): gang gis chos nyid rig pa ni// de dag sangs rgyas bstan la skyes// bdud stong bya ba rnams kyis kyang // de la skrod par rngo mi thog/ gang dag bla med sangs rgyas sa// zhi ba de ni
238a8(mdo sde): rnam rtog pa// mkhas pa de dag skrag pa dang // mi skrag par ni rmongs mi 'gyur// gang dag sangs rgyas bye ba las// zhi ba sa la spyad bgyis pa// mkhas pa de dag skrag pa dang // 
238b1(mdo sde): mi skrag rnam par tog mi 'gyid// gnyis su ma mchis sa thob nas// mkhas pa gang dag mi zhen pa// de ni mi dbang sras lags te// chos kyis sprul pa thugs kyi sras// rtogs shing mngon bgyis
238b2(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / chos mchog gang gis rnyed de dag/ gum na'ang mya ngan mi bgyid la// dge bar 'gyur ba'ang ma mchis lags// 'gum pa la yang dga' ma bgyid// 'tsho ba'ang yongs
238b3(mdo sde): su tshol ma bgyid// btang snyoms smra ba dpa' bo dag/ dge ba'i chos ni mang po bgyid// byang chub ched du lam skyong zhing // sangs rgyas rigs 'dzin de dag ni// sangs rgyas spyod yul gang
238b4(mdo sde): lags pa// yab kyi rjes su rab tu sleb// brtson 'grus da ldan zhing 'jigs ma mchis// sems can kun la sman slad du// thams cad mkhyen pa yongs tshol te// zhi ba mya
238b5(mdo sde): ngan 'da' bar zhugs// 'jig rten shin tu bsregs pa la// de dag mya ngan 'da' ston te// bdag nyid la ni/ mi lta zhing // bde dang sdug bsngal mi gnas lags// 
238b6(mdo sde): ji ltar mgo la me 'bar ba// zhi bar bgyi ba tshol ba bzhin// sems can kun gyi don slad du// de dag de bzhin chos rnams tshol// 'gro la dag pas nyin mtshan du// de dag rang byung shin tu
238b7(mdo sde): chol// bskal pa bye ba stong du yang // nams kyang brtson 'grus mi 'dir ro// bu dang chung ma nor dang 'bru// mgo dang de bzhin rgyal po'i srid// zhum pa ma mchis kun gtong zhing // de dag
238b8(mdo sde): gtong ba rab tu bsgoms// srog chags kun gyi don slad du// de dag byang chub mchog reg 'gyur// blo mchog ldan pa de dag ni// mthong zhing thos pa rnyed pa dka'// de nas 'khor
239a1(mdo sde): der byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dus te/ 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra/ 
239a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper bgyin/ bar snang la rgyu ba'i bya rten pa ma mchis shing / nam mkha'i khams la mi chags par gang dang gang du 'tshal ba de dang der mchi ba de bzhin du// bcom ldan
239a3(mdo sde): 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang chos kyi dbyings la gnas te mi chags par chos 'chad lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di chos kyi dbying
239a4(mdo sde): la zhugs nas ji srid lags// de skad ces gsol pa/ dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka'
239a5(mdo sde): stsal to// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa gang dag/ gang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang / 'jam
239a6(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu btsud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
239a7(mdo sde): par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 
239a8(mdo sde): bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/ brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
239b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas shes
239b2(mdo sde): bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin
239b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa ye shes mthong ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes spyod yul zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // / 
239b4(mdo sde): de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs dpa ye shes mdzod ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // / de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs/ 
239b5(mdo sde): pa ye shes dpa' bo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin ga/ shegs pa seng ge sgrog pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du
239b6(mdo sde): byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ da
239b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa seng ge blo gros zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyobs rab tu 'jom pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung
239b8(mdo sde): ngonade'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na// de bzhin gshegs pa shugs 'chang zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
240a1(mdo sde): dpal brtsegs snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs rnam par 'jom pa zhes bya
240a2(mdo sde): ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na
240a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi shugs rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi bar spyod pa zhes bya/ 
240a4(mdo sde): ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od zer tog gi rma la po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang
240a5(mdo sde): ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas blo gros shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'dul ba cwa
240a6(mdo sde): bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin
240a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i zhal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha
240a8(mdo sde): rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od gser ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dogs
240b1(mdo sde): pa thams cad legs par 'joms pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa snang byed ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha
240b2(mdo sde): rol gyi yang chas pha rol na/ de bzhin go shegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang chos pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs
240b3(mdo sde): pa bdud rtsi 'chang zhes bya ba 'jig rten du d+hango // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi grags pa zhes byabya 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang
240b4(mdo sde): ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i da spun zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi
240b5(mdo sde): zlog pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma me da pa'i mig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol
240b6(mdo sde): gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri mchog rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri mchog dpal
240b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na// 
240b8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros spos shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ud pa la'i spyan zhes bya ba 'jog rten du
241a1(mdo sde): byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas snang ba'i spyan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ 
241a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i ra rgyal
241a3(mdo sde): brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches
241a4(mdo sde): pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas bskyabs she su bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ bskal pa cig la sangs rgyas drug khri 'jig
241a5(mdo sde): rten du byung ste/ de dag gi thog ma ni 'od byed ces bya// tha mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa glags pa'i 'od ces/ bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches
241a6(mdo sde): pha rol na/ sangs rgyas bya ba phrag bzhi 'jig rten du byung ste/ de dag gi thog mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de dag gi tha mar na de bzhin
241a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa spyan rig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu byung ste/ de dag gi thog mar ni de
241a8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa bde spun zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // tha mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'byed pas rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha
241b1(mdo sde): pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na grags
241b2(mdo sde): sprin zhes bya ba dang / dpa' mkhas shes bya ba dang / tshangs pa'i mig ces bya ba dang / can dan zhes bya ba dang / rab mdzes shes bya ba dang / seng ge 'dzin ces bya ba dang // 
241b3(mdo sde): kun nas mdzes shes bya ba dang / spobs pa mtha' yas shes bya ba dang / blo gros mi zhen ces bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / 'grogs na bde zhes bya ba byang chub sam
241b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' tshon po des shing 'grogs na bde ba/ yon tan 'bum phrag mang po dang ldan pa bcu ga ci/ dag tshangs par spyad pa spyod do// de'i tshe na yang bram
241b5(mdo sde): ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu nyi mas byin zhes bya ba mkhas shing yid rno ba shes rab kyi rang bzhin ca na zhig yod du/ de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la/ 
241b6(mdo sde): chen po lta bu nyi mas byin grogs bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu rin chen ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer chen po nas/ phyi rol du 'khyam
241b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir byung nas dong ste de dag dga' ba sna tshogs shes bya ba'i tshal ga la ba der phyin to// de'i tshe dga' ba sna tshogs shes bya ba'i tshal de na byang chub sems dpa' bcu gcig
241b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten rnams kyi don de la sems phan par sems/ bde bar sems shing 'khod pa bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu nyi mas byodan de/ dga' ba sna tshogs shes
242a1(mdo sde): bya ba'i tshal de na 'khyams dang dga' ba sna tshogs kyi tshal de na/ 'khod pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag des shing 'grogs na bde la mi rgod ma khengs/ mig yeng mu
242a2(mdo sde): cor mi smra/ smra ba mi mang zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag li/ shes rab can/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ shin tu grims par gnas pa mthong ngo // mthong nas des dge ba'i rtsa ba
242a3(mdo sde): bskyed cing / yun ring por shes rab yongs su bsgoms pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la bsten pas/ skyes bu dam pa de dag la sems rab tu drang bar gyur to// de sems
242a4(mdo sde): rab tu dang bas skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag ga la da ba der bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'i bu'i g.yog rnams dang lhan cig tu dong ngo // skyes bu
242a5(mdo sde): dam pa glags byon des bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mar+tha/ nga ngo // mthong nas bram ze'i rigs shing stso la chen
242a6(mdo sde): po lta bu'i bu de 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / lta ba dang / spangs pa dang / bkum pa'i smod pa kun kyang tshangs par smad pa yun ring du smad pa'i spyod yul bzhin te/ skyes bu dam
242a7(mdo sde): pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snod du 'gyur ro snyam du sems so// de nas rigs kyi bu grags byin gyis skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag la 'di skad ce
242a8(mdo sde): smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar nyi mas byin skyes bu dam pa sangs rgyas kyi sras kyi tshul du 'gro ba/ bla na med pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa 'ong gis// byang chub
242b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di la skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis snying rje bskyes la gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pas ci nas rigs kyi bu 'di la skye bo phal po che'i don byed cing / snang ba smon pa snang
242b2(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i phyir legs par dgongs shig/ de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin/ skyes bu de pa bcu gcig po de dag gis drung du song nas 'di dag ni sbyin
242b3(mdo sde): pa'o// 'di dag ni 'phags pa'o// zhes skyes bu dam pa de dag la ston par 'du shes/ skyes bu dam pa de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'grang ngo // de nas
242b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu grags byin gyis bram ze'i rigs shing sA dal chen po lta bu'i bu nyo mas byin de la/ kye bram ze'i ri dgos shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin khyod 'dug
242b5(mdo sde): shig ces smras nas/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po ste bu'i bu nyi mas byin skyes bu dam pa de dag la shin tu ri mo skyed de/ 'dug pa ni 'di lta ste dper na/ rigs kyi
242b6(mdo sde): mna' ma gyos rgyug gi mdun na 'dug pa bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag la ri me skyes par gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ nad pa nad kyi btab nas yun ring ba las sman pa mthong na/ 
242b7(mdo sde): dbug byung ba de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs shing sA lo chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de yang rigs kyi bu de dag mthong ma thag tu dbugs byung bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ bas pa/ 
242b8(mdo sde): la thugs pa'i mi gsad du bkri ba las/ don bya bar 'dod/ phan par 'dod/ bde bar 'dod pa'i mi la la zhig byung ste/ des de bsad pa las thar par byas nas de mi de la 'di na
243a1(mdo sde): bdag gi skyabs bdag la snying brtse ba can no zhes de byas pa gzo ba cher skyes pa bzhin du// bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin yang smras
243a2(mdo sde): bu dam pa de dag la bdag gis skabs/ bdag la snying brtse ba can no zhes byas pa bzo ba skas so// de nas rigs kyi bu grags byin gyis/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu
243a3(mdo sde): nyi mas byin la smras pa/ nyi mas byin de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du byung ba rnyed par dka'o// 'di lta ste dper
243a4(mdo sde): na/ ud dum bai ra'i me tog rgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
243a5(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyang brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byu/ nga ste/ gang 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa// / 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba/ zab pa mthong bar
243a6(mdo sde): dka' ga rtog par dka' ba/ rtag tu med pa/ mu stegs can gzhan thams cad kyi rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa/ nyan thos rnams kyis ma chud pa/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi/ 
243a7(mdo sde): shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de la khyod kyis gus pa bskyed par bya'o// sti stang dang bcas/ ri mo
243a8(mdo sde): dang bcas pa la ni shes rab yang dag par gnas shing byams pa skyed ye shes rab tu 'byung / rigs skyed/ mngon par shes mngon du 'gyur// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
243b1(mdo sde): nadun na gnas par 'gyur ro// bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten tham cad dang mi 'thun pa'i chos ji ltar ston ce na/ nyi mas byin chos thams cad ni na mkha' la bris pa bzhin du dngos po
243b2(mdo sde): med pa ste/ chos de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma byung / mi 'byung ba de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzug
243b3(mdo sde): nI nam mkha' lta bu ste ngo bo nyid kyi 'gags pa'o// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang nam mkha' lta bu ste/ ngo bo nyid kyi 'gags pa'o// 
243b4(mdo sde): nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma skyes pa ste/ de bzhin du gzugs/ kyang ma skyes pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
243b5(mdo sde): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa 'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma 'gags pa ste/ de bzhin du nyi mas
243b6(mdo sde): byin gzugs kyang ma 'gags pa'o// tshor ba dwa / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma 'gags pa'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'
243b7(mdo sde): la bris pa ni mi 'ong / mi 'gro ba de bzhin du/ nyi mas byin gzugs kyang mi 'ong mi 'gro ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang mi 'ong mi 'gro'o// / 
243b8(mdo sde): nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma skyes ma byung ba de bzhin du// gzugs kyang ma skyes ma byung ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
244a1(mdo sde): shes pa'ang ma skyes ma byung ngo // nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma 'phos ma skyes pa de bzhin du gtsug kyang ma 'phro ma skyes ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du
244a2(mdo sde): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma 'phos ma skyes so// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' lo bris pa ni ma byung kun nas ma byung ba de bzhin du gzugs kyang / 
244a3(mdo sde): ma byung kun nas ma byung ste/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma byung kun nas ma byung ngo // nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa
244a4(mdo sde): ni ma skyes shing med pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang ma skye/ nas shing med pa ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes da/ nga / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes shing
244a5(mdo sde): med pa'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma grub mngon par ma grub pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang ma grub mngon par ma grub ste/ tshor ba dang / 
244a6(mdo sde): 'du shas dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang ma grub mngon par ma grub bo// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni brjod du med cing brjod pa ma yin pa
244a7(mdo sde): de bzhin du gzugs kyang brjod du med cing brjod pa ma yin te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang brjod du med cing brjod pa ma yin no// 
244a8(mdo sde): nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa btags pa med cing gdags pa ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang btags pa med cing gdags pa ma yin te/ 
244b1(mdo sde): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang btags pa med cing / gdags pa ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa
244b2(mdo sde): ni the snyad tsam ste/ nam mkha' la bris pa tha snyad tsam las/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang tha snyad tsam su/ gzugs tha snyad tsam las gzhan ma yin no// 
244b3(mdo sde): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang / tha snyad tsam ste/ tha snyad tsam las rnam par shes pa gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dpa
244b4(mdo sde): na/ nam mkha' la bris pa 'di ltar kun rdzob rtsam ste/ kun rdzob las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma/ yin pa de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs kyang 'di ltar/ 
244b5(mdo sde): kun rdzob tsam ste/ kun rdzodab las gzugs gzhan ma ya na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed da rnam par shes pa yang 'di ltar kun rdzob tsam ste/ 
244b6(mdo sde): kun rdzob las rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa 'di ltar ming tsam ste/ ming tsam las nam mkha' la
244b7(mdo sde): bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang ming tsam ste/ ming tsam las gzhan ma yin no// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar ming tsam ste// 
244b8(mdo sde): ming tsam las rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa tsam las
245a1(mdo sde): nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa tsam las gzugs ma yin no// de bzhin du rnam par shes
245a2(mdo sde): pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa tsam las rnam par shes pa gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste
245a3(mdo sde): btags pa tsam las na mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam las gzugs gzhan ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 
245a4(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam la das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
245a5(mdo sde): shes pa gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dang / ra na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar 'dud na/ sa tsam ste/ 'du shes tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa
245a6(mdo sde): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar 'du shes tsam ste/ 'du shes tsam las gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin
245a7(mdo sde): no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni brda' tsam ste/ brda' tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes
245a8(mdo sde): pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar brda' tsam ste/ brda' tsam las gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ tshig gang gis na mkha'
245b1(mdo sde): la bris par brjod pa'i tshig ni don dam par mi dmigs pa de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / nor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos
245b2(mdo sde): dag kyang 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma dmigs ma byon pa dang / da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma dmigs so// nyi mas byin ye shes de rtog
245b3(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sdug cing phongs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su btang yang zhum par mi 'gyur
245b4(mdo sde): te/ gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'jig rte/ na du gtogs par mi blto'o// gang ye shes 'di dal gnas pa de dag ni 'jig rten gyi grangs su mi 'gro'o// 
245b5(mdo sde): gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni gdags par bya ba ma yin no// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// gang
245b6(mdo sde): ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'khor ba las spyod pa ma yin no// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i chos can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yang
245b7(mdo sde): ma yin no// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can ma yin no// rnam par byang ba'i chos can ma yin no// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni zhi
245b8(mdo sde): bar spyod pa yang ma yin// ma zhi bar spyod pa yang ma yin no// de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin/ skyes bu dam pa grags byin gyis bshad pa
246a1(mdo sde): la legs so zhes shin tu bstod de rjes su yi rang ngo // de nas yang skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag gis bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de
246a2(mdo sde): rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos zab mo 'di thos kyang ma skrag/ sgeg par
246a3(mdo sde): ma gyur/ shin tu skrag par ma gyur/ ma mos mos par ma gyur pa legs so logs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang la bslab par bya ba'i sa ni 'di yin no// de nas bram ze'i rig
246a4(mdo sde): shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zab mo gos pa med dpa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu ste// yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde
246a5(mdo sde): ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo mthar phyin par gyur to// / bam po bdun pa/ de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas/ 
246a6(mdo sde): byin dang / skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' mchog ces bya ba de gal ba der dong skye/ phyin
246a7(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas skyes bu dam pa grags byin des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
246a8(mdo sde): dga' mchog de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// zhi ba'i dbyings la rab tu zhugs pa'i tshul rnams la// mkhas pa 'dren pa rnams ni lags so zhes// gang gis
246b1(mdo sde): mi mchog shin tu 'thob 'gyur ba// de ni mi rnams dam pa bstan du gsol// 'jig rten mkhas pas bstan pa thos nas su// byang chub mchog la mi rnams rab tu 'jug/ gang
246b2(mdo sde): thos drang srong chen por 'gyur ba dag/ tshul de srog chags rnams la sman slad gsungs// bde gshegs bdag gi rigs la gnas nas su// thub pa sangs rgyas ye shes
246b3(mdo sde): mngon par bstod// rgyal bas de yid rab tu dga' bar mdzad// de dag thos nas shin tu gnas par 'gyur// rgyal ba dag gis ji tsam tshal ba rnams// 'dren pa dag gis
246b4(mdo sde): chos rnams bshad lags te/ ston pa ji ltar tshwa rnams na kun mkhyen pa// 'dren pas legs par ma lus bstan du gsol// de la dga' mchog 'jig rten
246b5(mdo sde): 'dren pa yis// rgyal sras spyod pa gang la sprad pas na// mr-i yi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur ba yi// sa ngas rgyas chos rnams mA lus nges par bstan// thams
246b6(mdo sde): cad chos shes bya ba mtshan nyid cig/ mtshan nyid bral zhing mtshan nyid ma mchis te// zhi ba mi g.yo nga yi ma mchis la// yon tan ma mchis ma spros tshwa med zhi// kun
246b7(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs rnam par byang ba stong // dngos po ma mchis ci yang ma lags te// 'di ni bstan pa ma lags ston ma mchis// bshad pa ma mchis 'chad par bgyid
246b8(mdo sde): ma mchis// tshor ba ma lags tshor ba po ma mchis// shes pa ma lags shes par bgyid mi mchis// su la'ang ma lags gang gis kyang ma lags// 'di dag
247a1(mdo sde): ma bgyis bgyid du stsal ma mchis// sus kyang blangs pa ma mchis btang ma mchis// sus kyang bsgrags pa ma mchis blom mchis// sus kyang ma rig na par shes ma mchis// 
247a2(mdo sde): 'di dag dngos por sus kyang mthong ma mchis// 'di ni zhi ba ma lags rgod ma lags// zhi bgyid ma lags zhi bar bgyis ma lags// bgyis pa ma lags bgyid pa ma mchis
247a3(mdo sde): min/ sems dpa' ma mchis tsher bar bgyid ma mchis// 'dus byas ma lags 'dus ma byas ma lags// 'pho ba ma lags mi 'phro ba ma lags// 'ong ba ma mchis 'gro ba ma
247a4(mdo sde): mchis te// 'di ni kun tu mi 'chi skye ma mchis// skye ba mi mchis skyed pa'ang ma lags te// 'di ni 'gags dpa ma mchis 'gags ma lpags// 'di ni bstan pa ma/ 
247a5(mdo sde): mchis bshig ma mchis// de ltar rgyal po'i chos rnam/ sa rtog par bgyi// 'dran pa bde bar gshegs pa/ gang 'das pa/ de dag gis kyang tshul 'di rab tu
247a6(mdo sde): bstan// 'dren pa sangs rgyas ma byon 'byung ba rnams// de dag kyang ni tshul 'di 'chad par 'gyur// rnam par 'dren pa da ltar gang byung ba// rgyal ba de dag kun kyang tshul 'di sten// 
247a7(mdo sde): chos nyid 'di dag rab tu rtogs pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa ma mchis 'gyur// zhi ba'i sa yang rab tu rtog 'gyur te// mkhas pas rtogs par dka' ba rab tu bstan/ 
247a8(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i thugs sras ci tsam rtogs pa dag/ 'gro ba gtses 'dir mya ngan ma mchis lags// de las snying rje bla na med pa skye// 'gro ba kun la byams pa shin tu gnas// stong pa nyid
247b1(mdo sde): la gnas pa gyur dus na// rgyal ba'i bstan pa dag la the tsom bral// mtshan ma mchis rtogs par gyur pa na// de la smon lam 'debs pa'ang yod ma mchis// rlung rnams nam
247b2(mdo sde): mkha' dag la mi thogs bzhin// dpa' bo de yang 'gro bar yong mi chags// bskal pa mang po bye bar kun 'khor zhing // sems can bye ba mang la ston par bgyid// kun tu
247b3(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs mi 'gyur te// des ni byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya nus// gal te bdud kyis sangs rgyas bye bstan de// de dag nyan thos kyis shes smra na yang // ngas ni chos nyid
247b4(mdo sde): yang dag rab rtogs te// khyed ni 'dren pa min zhes de smra lags// dri ma bral ba'i ye shes mig sbyangs te// bdag ni the tsom ma lus rnam par byang // stong par
247b5(mdo sde): bdag ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/ khyod ni gang zag mchog min phar deng shig/ de ltar rgyal bus chos nyid bstan pas na// gang la 'dren pa'i sras rnams gnas pa
247b6(mdo sde): lata bya ba khrag khrig bdud kyis thub dka' ste// ji ltar ra bo bskyod par mi nus bzhin// de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
247b7(mdo sde): pA dga' mchog de las stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas// 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob ste// dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu thob pas ta la bdun
247b8(mdo sde): srid du nam mkha' la 'phags te/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag dpag
248a1(mdo sde): tu med pa rnams thabs mkhas pa rnams tha dad pas byang chub yang dag par sgrub pa mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams dga' ldan
248a2(mdo sde): gyi gnas nas shi 'phos te/ yum gyi rum du zhugs pa yang mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba dpag tu med pa rnams lha 'bum gyis mchod cing yum gyi rum du 'gro ba yang mthong // / 
248a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa rnams btsas nas gom pa bdun 'dor ba yang mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med
248a4(mdo sde): pa rnams mngon par 'byung ba yang mthong / byang chub sem// sa dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams byang chu/ ba mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang mthong // 
248a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams la ba rgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba yang mthong / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra/ 
248a6(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa rnams chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yang mthong // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams spyod la dpag tu med pas sems can rnams 'dul ba yang mthong
248a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang
248a8(mdo sde): mthong ngo // de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin par snang la 'dug bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshigs su
248b1(mdo sde): bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ legs so legs se rkang gnyis kun gyi mchog/ 'dren pa khyod kyis 'di dag chos bstan pa// bar snang gnas kyi bya'i rjes bzhin du// dngos bral mtshungs
248b2(mdo sde): med ci yang ma lags pa// mtshan ma mchis nam mkhar bris pa bzhin// de ltar bde bar gshegs pas chos stan te// sprul pa dag gis ji ltar gzhan sprul bzhin// yang dag tu na rgyal
248b3(mdo sde): bas bstan ma mchis// sos ka'i dus kyi smig rgyu ji bzhin du// snang yang yang dag par ni mchis ma lags// de bzhini bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan te// ston pa gang lags
248b4(mdo sde): de yang de dang 'dra// sngon chas the tsom nam nur gang byung / pa// de yang 'dren pa dang du bral gyur te// bde bar ga sha dgas pas gsungs pa'i chos kyang rig/ 'gro ba grol
248b5(mdo sde): mdzad rnam par 'dren par shog/ stobs bcu dag gi sa bsgrag pa ci 'dra bar// rgyal ba'i zhing mchog bzang po spyang par bgyi// sangs rgyas rgyal ba rkang gnyis
248b6(mdo sde): gtsor gyur te// skye bo ma gtogs rab tu rtogs par bgyi// srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba'i 'gro ba rnams// gnas dang skyabs dang rten kyang mu mchis pa'o// skyabs su 'gyur
248b7(mdo sde): zhing sdug bsngal thor bgyi ste// rga shi bral ba'i gnas kyang bstan par bgyi// bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyi spyod yul ni// thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul du yang bgyi// sems
248b8(mdo sde): can bdud kyi yul nas gton nas su// drang srong chen po'i yul du drang bar bgyi// bde bar gshegs pas zhi ba'i chos bstan pa// gang gis thob nas gang la'ang mi reg pa/ 
249a1(mdo sde): de dag mchog gi tshul la gnas par 'gyur// 'dren pa srog chags rnams kyi ston par 'gyur// chos nyid 'di ltar mi grang rab rtogs shing // ston pa rgyal ba'i/ 
249a2(mdo sde): dbang po'i spyan snga nas// bstan bcos kun la mkhas shing 'jigs bral ba// de dag bla na med pa'i bde gshegs 'gyur// stong pa 'di nyid gang gis rab rtogs shing // stong
249a3(mdo sde): par dmigs pa'i 'du shas bral gyur na// de dag ma smad bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// srog chags bye ba mang po 'grol bar bgyid// mkhas pa sogs pa la ni mi dga'
249a4(mdo sde): ste//  zas kyi ro rnams la yang chags ma mchis// rtogs pa dgon pa'i gnas la shin tu moso// dade dag rkang gnyis dam pa mkhas par 'gyur// sbyang/ 
249a5(mdo sde): pa gang dag stobs bcus bsngags pa dag/ de la rtag tu rab tu gnas par 'gyur// 'phags pa'i rigs la de dag rtag tu dga'// rab tu dga' bas
249a6(mdo sde): byang chub mchog kyang thob// de dag chos rnams bde bar gshegs pas bsngags// de la mkhas pa gnas pas 'di thob ste// zhi ba gang la bder gshegs gnas pa
249a7(mdo sde): yin/ byang chub de ni 'jig rten 'dren pas bsngags// 'dren pa khyod las stong pa deng thos te// ye shes bla na med pa'ang bdag gis bsgrubs// spangs rgyas rkang gnyis
249a8(mdo sde): gtso bor 'gyur bar bgyi// mi mkhas 'gro ba dag kyang rnam par grol// thub pa khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// gang la logs pa'i blo gros mi dmigs shing // 
249b1(mdo sde): chos rnams kun la khyod ni the tsom bral// de la 'jig rten khyod dang 'dra ma mchis// 'dren pa bde bar gshegs la gang bstod pa'i// bsod nams mi chung bdag gis bsags pas
249b2(mdo sde): na// bdag ni de yi dge ba'i las 'di yis// mi yi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur bar shog/ de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin gyis/ bcom ldan
249b3(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa brjod du med por nams kyang myos pa dang / 
249b4(mdo sde): glen par ma gyur to// gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang / der 'dren pa skyes bu chen por gyur te// nams kyang / log par ltung bar ma gyur to// nams kyang gzhan gyi
249b5(mdo sde): dring la 'jog par ma gyur to// nams kyang gzhan gyi ngor lta bar mi gyur to// nams kyang bskal pa brje da du med pa/ tha na saM gol gtogs pa tsam gyi bar
249b6(mdo sde): du sems can rnams yongs su smin par mA byas par ma gyur to// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu grags byin zhes
249b7(mdo sde): bya bar gyur pa gzhan zhig yin pa snyim du 'dzin no/ thams cad zil gyis gnon pa khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu bzang zhes bya ba de'i tshe de'i
249b8(mdo sde): dus na rigs kyi bu grags byin zhes bya bar gyur to// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'od ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ mkhas pa'i snying por gyur pa de gzhan
250a1(mdo sde): zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas shes bya ba de/ de'i tshe de'i
250a2(mdo sde): dus na/ rigs kyi bu mkhas pa'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tsan dan snying po zhes bya bar gyur pa gzhan
250a3(mdo sde): zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyob sbyin zhes bya ba de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu can dan snying po zhes bya
250a4(mdo sde): bar gyur to// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rigs kyi bu tshangs dpa'i mig ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam
250a5(mdo sde): du 'dzin na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' dad dpon bzang po de/ de'i tshe de'i dus ni/ rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i mig ces
250a6(mdo sde): bya bar gyur to// de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang rigs kyi bu nges pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' mes byin yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rigs kyi bu blo gros 'chang zhwa
250a7(mdo sde): bya bar gyur pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang srong yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gang rigs kyi bu kun tu mdzes par gyur pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang pos
250a8(mdo sde): byin yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gang rigs kyi bu spobs pa mtha' yas su gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' chu'i lha yin no// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam
250b1(mdo sde): du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi ma byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ thams cad zil gyi gnon pa khyod
250b2(mdo sde): kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zhes bya bar gyur
250b3(mdo sde): to// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri bar 'dod pa dang / gzhan
250b4(mdo sde): gyi der mi blta bar 'dod na/ chos kyi dbyings la rab da tu 'jug pa'i phyir dge pa'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par bya/ 'grogs par bya bsnyen bkur bya'o// 
250b5(mdo sde): chos zab mo mnyan pa'i phyir yongs su 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can du bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
250b6(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar stobs bskyed pas chos kyi dbyangs la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'dis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
250b7(mdo sde): rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrad logs/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la yongs su zhu ba zhus lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
250b8(mdo sde): kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa dang / rtsa dang / shing dang / yal
251a1(mdo sde): ga dang / lo ma rnams rdul phra rab tu byas shing bgrang bar nus kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las
251a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos kyi dbyings yongs su zhus pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la 'jug pa yongs su
251a3(mdo sde): dris pa ni bgrang por mi nus so// 'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med/ dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med gzhal du med/ brjod
251a4(mdo sde): du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ zhi ba'i phung po'i nga bskal pa la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par yongs su dag pa dang
251a5(mdo sde): ldan pa brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa/ dang ldan par de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
251a6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lho dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de
251a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal ma tshan de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na yang / dge slong dpa' sra zhes bya ba/ mkhas pa/ yid bzhungs pa/ bye brag phyed pa/ rtogs pa/ shes rab kyi
251a8(mdo sde): rang bzhin can zhig byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de la rim gror byed par gyur to// des
251b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de la lo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu'i bar du shin tu gus par byas te/ bshad pa rnams kyang gzungs su 'dzin cing rang gi don kyang mi gtong ste/ 
251b2(mdo sde): des de bzhin gshegs pa la lo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu'i bar du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis rim gro byas te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag
251b3(mdo sde): tu med pa rnams mnyes par byas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi rim gro byed par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la'ang / thams mkhyen
251b4(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi sems kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// de bzhin ga shags pa de dag thams cad kyis thog ma dang dbar dang / tha mar dus gsum du bstan pa rnams
251b5(mdo sde): yongs su bzung bar gyur to// de'i 'og tu zhi ba'i snying po na sa bya ba'i bskal pa de la sangs rgyas bye ba phA ga dgu byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
251b6(mdo sde): thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des yang mnyes par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi rim gro byed par gyur te// de dag thams cad la yang thams cad
251b7(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis rim gro byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thog ma dang / bar dang / tha ma dus gsum du bstan pa rnams yongs su bzung
251b8(mdo sde): ngo // de'i 'og tu zla 'od ces bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal
252a1(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni/ bskul pa bye ba phrag brgyad cur gyur te/ de la yang byang
252a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dpa' sra des bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu'i bar du yid du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur byas te/ yid du mi 'ong bas ma yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog ma
252a3(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des/ bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu'i bar du ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur ba/ nam mkha' la bris pa lta bur chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa bstan
252a4(mdo sde): to// bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu chos thams cad nam mkha da' la bris pa lta bur bstan te/ de ni gzhan du 'gyur kyang srid kyi/ nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu'i chos
252a5(mdo sde): thams cad ni cung zad kyang gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sras chos kyi/ dbyings la 'jug pa 'di thos nas/ 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i
252a6(mdo sde): rtsa ba'i shugs thob ste/ ji lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob pas nam mkha' la/ ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med
252a7(mdo sde): pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mthong / kha cig ni bla na med pa'i
252a8(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo skor/ kha cig ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can rnams 'dul/ kha cig ni tshe'i 'du byed 'dor/ kha cig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i ma
252b1(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po de la zab mo'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag
252b2(mdo sde): gis mngon par bstod do// ni ba'i byang chub mtshungs med btsal slad du// bdag gis sangs rgyas 'das pa bye stong la// shin tu gus pa chen po bskyed nas su// sngon gyi 'dren pa dag
252b3(mdo sde): la bsnyen bkur bgyis// sems ni nams kyang gzhan du ma gyur te// rtag par yid ni stong pa nyid la bzhag/ chos rnams stong par bde bar gshegs pas bstan// de dag chos kyang
252b4(mdo sde): yid kyis rnam par bsams// bdag tu smra ba'i mi gang mi mkhas pa// mu stegs can kun bdag gis ji ral gyis mnan// chos rnams thams cad chu'i zla ba bzhin// 
252b5(mdo sde): de la bdag ni the tsom cang ma mchis// mig 'di dam pa'i rnga na tu stong par ni// bde bar gshegs pa ban da pa thos nas rtogs// mig 'di mig tu mchis pa ma
252b6(mdo sde): lags te// mdzangs pa ma lags mi rnams 'di la slad// nges par sna lce rna ba de bzhin te// lus kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mchis ma lags// de bzhin sems dang sems pa'ang stong
252b7(mdo sde): pa nyid// sems ni dben zhing rab tu stong pa lags// gzugs kyang rigs kyi chos rnams dben zhing stong // sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg kyang stong // chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid
252b8(mdo sde): stong ste// skye mched de dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong // de bzhin khams kyang khams rnams nyid kyis stong // bden pa'ang bden pas de bzhin stong pa ste// 'di la mdzangs pa ma lags/ 
253a1(mdo sde): 'gro rnams bslad// gang na'ang stong par rig pa ma mchis par// nam mkha' bar snang bya yi rjes dang mtshungs// gang na'ang ngo bo nyid ni ma mchis pa// de ni nams kyang / 
253a2(mdo sde): gzhan gyi rgyur mi 'gyur// gang gi ngo bo nyid ni mi rnyed pa// rang bzhin de med ji ltar gzhan gyi rkyen// rang bzhin med pa gzhan gyis ci zhig skyed// rgyu de bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'o// / 
253a3(mdo sde): thams cad ches kyang mi g.yo bstan par gnas// mi 'gyur gtse ba ma mchis zhi ba ste// ji ltar nam mkha' rig pa ma mchis ltar// de la mi mdzangs 'gro ba myos par 'gyur// ji ltar
253a4(mdo sde): ri bo dag ni mi skal pa// de bzhin chos rnams rtag tu bskyed mi nus// 'chi 'pho ma mchis skye ba ma mchis pa'i // chos rnams de ltar rgyal bso rab tu bstan// gang gis
253a5(mdo sde): yang dag chos rnams nges rtogs pa// des ni rgyal ba rnams 'dren bsnyen bkur bgyis// gang la 'di 'dra/ 'i nan tan ma mchis pa// de dag rgyal ba chos nyid mchod
253a6(mdo sde): ma bgyis// gang gis tshul bzhin rab tu chos rtogs pa// des ni rgyal ba'i bde gshegs bkur bsti bgyis// de dag rgyal ba chos kyis mchod bgyis te// byang chub dam pa mchog
253a7(mdo sde): tu 'tshang yang rgya// gang gis tshul bzhin chos rnams rab rtogs pa// mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyang 'dzin// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa des bzung ste// byang chub
253a8(mdo sde): dam pa mchog tu 'tshang yang rgya// rgyal ba brgya yis stong pa nyid bshad de// byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig rnams kyis bzung // bde bar gshegs pa'i shul 'dir byang chub/ 
253b1(mdo sde): phyir// de la mkhas pa the tsom gzhar mi 'byung // bde bar gshegs pas chos rnams gang bstan pa// chos nyid de ni de ring bdag gis 'tshal// 'dren pa mi rnams kyi yang mchog tu 'gyur
253b2(mdo sde): shin tu sdug bsngal skye bo rnam par dgrol// 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni rigs pas na// bdag gi de ring chos kyis yab la mchod// gang slad mi yi gtso bo khyod 'phags pas// de bzhin
253b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa de la skyabs su mchi// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po la stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshigs
253b4(mdo sde): su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nas/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang gzu dgas dang zhi gnas dang / shes rab kyis sems can thams/ 
253b5(mdo sde): cad zil gyis mnan to// 'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras su gyur par gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ 'jam dpal khyod/ 
253b6(mdo sde): kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras zhes bya bar gyur to// de lta
253b7(mdo sde): bas na 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rnams yongs su spang bar 'dod pas stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo la bslab
253b8(mdo sde): par bya'o// de la slob pa'i tshe'ang sems gang la'ang mi chags mi thogs te/ de'i sems ma chags shing thogs po med pas/ bya ba gang dang gang la dmigs pa de dang de
254a1(mdo sde): yang mngon sum du 'gyur ro// 'jam dpalang stong pa 'di la bslab pa na/ ye shes ji lta bu rab tu thob pas ji ltar bsams pa de bzhin du 'gyur zhing gar 'dod pa der
254a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i ye shes de lta bu rab tu thob bo// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu 'das pa na/ rtag tu snang bar byas shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod
254a3(mdo sde): de dza de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shugs 'chang zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs
254a4(mdo sde): char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad 'das pa na/ rin chen yod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na dang la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegaso pa
254a5(mdo sde): drag pa'i spyan zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal sha ra gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug cu 'das pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags shes bya ba'i 'jig rten
254a6(mdo sde): gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad sems pa zhes bya bar shes
254a7(mdo sde): so/ 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya 'das pa na/ baiDUr+ya'i snying po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis
254a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi phung po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal sher gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya phrag gnyis 'das pa na/ gsar du snang ba/ 
254b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po zhes bya
254b2(mdo sde): bar shes so// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dri nas shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing snying brgyad brgya 'das pa na/ zhi ba spyod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yid
254b3(mdo sde): de// de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal
254b4(mdo sde): shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bum 'das pa/ na/ sprin gyi kha dog ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhi
254b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi
254b6(mdo sde): zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum brgya 'das pa na/ yid du 'ong ba'i dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs
254b7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum khri brgyad stong
254b8(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ me long dkyil 'khor snang zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
255a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgyad
255a2(mdo sde): cu 'das pa na/ zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rga
255a3(mdo sde): shi 'joms pa zhes bya ba shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'das pa na/ dus las 'das shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ 
255a4(mdo sde): de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa da dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyadas dge sbyong rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal
255a5(mdo sde): shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ tshe mnyam zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga
255a6(mdo sde): la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spros mchog ces bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char 'jig rten
255a7(mdo sde): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na// zhi ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gsha
255a8(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros dag pa zhes bya ba shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig
255b1(mdo sde): gyi khams 'das pa na/ ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
255b2(mdo sde): rin chen dkod pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ rin
255b3(mdo sde): po che kun tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod do// de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi
255b4(mdo sde): brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jadam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhi dang brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig
255b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'dra ba na/ dkon mchog 'byung gnas shes ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de nang la sa mas can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
255b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtul zhugs sprad ces bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bco brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
255b7(mdo sde): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ yid grub ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
255b8(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug pud rgyal po zhes bya bar shos so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi
256a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ nges pas song zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
256a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug pud 'byung zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
256a3(mdo sde): khams 'das pa na/ grong rdal zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
256a4(mdo sde): zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dang shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
256a5(mdo sde): khams 'das pa na/ bde ba'i dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyi sa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
256a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnas med par spyod ces bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi
256a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
256a8(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug ces bya ba shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten
256b1(mdo sde): gyi khams 'das pa na/ tsam pa'i kha dog ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
256b2(mdo sde): grags pa'i lha zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ lhas
256b3(mdo sde): sprul pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgya
256b4(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi pa cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten dgyi khams 'das pa na/ rab tu grub po zhes bya ba'i 'jig
256b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes
256b6(mdo sde): so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bdun cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig
256b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
256b8(mdo sde): pa bdun curtsa bzhi'i rdul phra kyi rdul ste kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ gser du snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
257a1(mdo sde): / mi rtag gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs cha na/ gser gyis rab tu brgyan ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems
257a2(mdo sde): can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gso ba byed pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs cha na gsar gyi gtsug ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la
257a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs dri ma sbyangs shes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi'i
257a4(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa/ do na/ mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis/ 
257a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs chan snang ban zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems
257a6(mdo sde): can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs shes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs chur sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab
257a7(mdo sde): kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ grags can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs pa zhi bar
257a8(mdo sde): byed pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ gzi
257b1(mdo sde): brjid can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros 'dzin ces bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs
257b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa drug gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ tshangs pa 'byung zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi mas yod de/ de na nga la sems can/ 
257b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs cher sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rdul
257b4(mdo sde): phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ sa ngas rgyas dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yo/ dad de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin
257b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa blo gros rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'ja ma dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar gyi phyogs cha ra sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa brgyad
257b6(mdo sde): kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ rin chen sgo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig
257b7(mdo sde): rten slob dpon zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa
257b8(mdo sde): na/ rin po che'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi
258a1(mdo sde): phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ rin chen me tog shin
258a2(mdo sde): tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sa dang mnyam pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs
258a3(mdo sde): char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ shin tu mdzes shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ 
258a4(mdo sde): de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa do dan thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'ja ma dpal shwar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod/ 
258a5(mdo sde): du med pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sang sa rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ tsan tsan gyi dri zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can
258a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas snang ba zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa
258a7(mdo sde): bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin
258a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal de lta bu'i rnam grangasu gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha
258b1(mdo sde): dad pa rnams su sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa'i tshe/ nga la sems can rnams kyis ming tha dad par shes pa ni brjod du med pa'i bskal par smras kyang shar gyi phyogs cha'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
258b2(mdo sde): gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// de bzhin du phyogs cha thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du nga la sems can rnams kyis ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs par shes pa yang
258b3(mdo sde): brjod du med pa'i bskal par smras kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i mtha' bde bar mi rig go// 'jam dpal sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba rnams kyis/ nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
258b4(mdo sde): tshad med pa thos na myos par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal byad chub sems dpa' gang theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs
258b5(mdo sde): pa'i dge ba'i bshos gnyen rab tu mgu bar byas pa de dag kyang 'jam dpal nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa thos na the tsom skye bar 'gyur na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa
258b6(mdo sde): can dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang // de ma yin pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos// 'jam dpal du mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dpag tu
258b7(mdo sde): med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ yon tan rab tu bskrad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa
258b8(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nga ni bram ze'i bu me blo glos mtha' yas shes bya bar
259a1(mdo sde): gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de yang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig brgyad cus yongs su bskor bar gyur te/ byang chub sems
259a2(mdo sde): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa dpag tu med pa'i bar la yang dag par zhugs pa nas/ theg pa brjod du med pa'i bar la yang dag
259a3(mdo sde): par zhugs pa sha stag ste/ de dag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de'i rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa 'chad de/ 
259a4(mdo sde): nga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'do dad pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de la rim gro dang bsnye/ 
259a5(mdo sde): bkur byas so// de nas ngas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa thos nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bas kyang shin tu rgya che ba de 'dra bar gyur
259a6(mdo sde): cig ces de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir bsngos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
259a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dge bar lung bstan mod kyi/ 'on
259a8(mdo sde): kyang ngas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus ma btang bar gyur nas/ de ltar
259b1(mdo sde): ngas de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig tshad med pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byas te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pas/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su dag par bla na med pa
259b2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// brjod kyis mi lang
259b3(mdo sde): 'khor ba na// bsam gyis mi khyab 'das pa'i dus// sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya bkyang phyir// de na nga yis brtson 'grus brtsams// brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba// gang zag
259b4(mdo sde): mtshungs pa med pa byung // sems can bye ba rnam par 'dul// lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams la ston// sangs rgyas cho/ ngas la dbang byed cing // stobs rnams kyi yang pha
259b5(mdo sde): rol phyin// mi 'jigs pa la shin tu gnas// so so ya nga dag rig la mkhas// gnas dang gnas min dbangayang thob// las dang ye shes rtogs par rig
259b6(mdo sde): las rnams yang dag 'dzin pa dang // rnam par smin la the tsom med// khams rnam du mar shes pa dang // rnam par 'dren pa shin tu ldan// sems can rnams kyi dad pa rnams/ 
259b7(mdo sde): ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyen// sems can rnams kyi dbang po yi// rim pa bzhin du yang dag mkhyen// bsam gtan ye shes rnam thar dang // ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol phyin// snyoms
259b8(mdo sde): par 'jug dang tshad med la// rkang gnyis dam pa shin tu bslabs// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin// des ni mi mkhyen gang yang med// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad
260a1(mdo sde): gzigs// gzigs pa la yang sgrib pa med// de bzhin gshegs pa de la ngas// sangs rgyas zhing gi rgyu dris te// sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya che ba// bskal pa chen po bdag la gsungs/ 
260a2(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyen// gang rnams khyod kyis mi mkhyen pa// de 'dra'i chos ni yod ma mchis// sangs rgyas zhing gi skyon rnams dang // yon tan
260a3(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu mkhyen// sangs rgyas bstan pa rgya che ba// rkang gnyis gtso bos bshad du gsol// sems can rnams kyi smin pa dang // ji ltar mi rnams 'tshang rgya ba/ nyon mongs gang gis
260a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pas// mi mkhas 'khor bar rab tu 'khor// mi rnams gang gis nyon mongs pa// nyon mongs de du// ga khyod kyis mkhyen// de'i lam dang bsam pa rnams// 'dren
260a5(mdo sde): pa khyod kyis rnam par mkhyen// ji ltar ting 'dzin 'byung ba dang // byung nas ji ltar gnas pa dang // ji ltar de las ldang ba rnams// ston pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ 
260a6(mdo sde): bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa// ji snyed ting nge 'dzin rnams dang // zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong rnams// rnam pa thams cad shin tu mkhyen// ji ltar chos la 'dogs pa dang // gang
260a7(mdo sde): gis rkyen gyis bshad pa yang // de yang ston pas rab mkhyen to// de la the tsom mi mnga' khyod// khyod kyis bskal pa byer spyad pas// ye shes 'di las nges par 'byung // ston pas
260a8(mdo sde): stobs kyi mthu yang bsnyed// drang srong chen po stobs dang ldan// bskal pa stong phrag bye ba yi// bdag dang pha rol rnams kyi yang // spyod pa dpag tu ma mchis shing // bsam gyis/ 
260b1(mdo sde): mi bye ba thams cad mkhyen// gang du byang chub ci 'dra ba// skye ba thams cad du yang 'jug/ de dag ma lus 'dren pa yis// ji lta bu yang rab tu mkhyen// gang du ci 'drar skye ba dang // gang du
260b2(mdo sde): rigs kyang ci 'dra ba// ji ltar kun tu spyad pa rnams// de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen// tha ma'i chos rnams ci 'dra ba// 'dren pas 'khor ba de rnams kyang // 'gro ba gang du smra ba ni// 
260b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen// ci 'dra ba'i ye shes kyis// sngon chad rnam pa lung bstan pa// mkhas pa khyed kyis de mkhyen pa// de la the tsom mi mnga' khyod// tshul khrim sa
260b4(mdo sde): dang cho ga gang // ci 'dra'i spyod pa spyad pa dang // ye shas gang la zhugs pa dang // de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen// gang dang gang gi las kyis su// skye ba rnams su
260b5(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'gyur// rnam smin ci 'dra 'thob pa yang // de da ga mgon pos rab tu mkhyen// gang du gnas pa de dag gi/ rgyud du mchi bar nges pa yang // de yang ma
260b6(mdo sde): lus khyod kyis mkhyen// de slad yid gnyis mi mnga' khyod// gang gi las kyis sems gang skyes// de yang khyod kyis rnam par mkhyen// sems de'i rgyu ni gang lags pa// de yang
260b7(mdo sde): 'dren pas shin tu mkhyen// sngon chad gnas pa mkhyen pa ni// khyod dang 'dra ba yod ma mchis// sangs rgyas bye ba stong rnams dang // 'dren pa khyod ni de dang 'dra// srog chags so so'i
260b8(mdo sde): dge ba rnams// rjes su dran pas rab tu mkhyen// de slad sangs rgyas chos rnams la// 'dren pa'i ye shes thogs mi mnga'// gang dang gang gi las kyis su// ji lta bu yi rgyud
261a1(mdo sde): du mchi// de yang thams cad mkhyen pas mkhyen// de spang rgyal las lhag ma mchis// 'dren pas chos rnams thams cad la// khyod ni the tsom yong mi mnga'// sems
261a2(mdo sde): can kun gyi spyod yul dang // sangs rgyas spyan gyis rab tu gzigs// skye ba dang ni 'chi 'pho mkhyen// khyod 'dra ba ni yong mi gda'// lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad na// thub pa khyod las
261a3(mdo sde): lhag ma mchis// zag pa zad pa'ang rab tu mkhyen// ma lus par yang rtog par 'gyur// nyon mongs thams cad yongs su spangs// khyod kyis bag chags kun kyang bcom// sems can
261a4(mdo sde): kun gyi nyon mongs dang // spyod pa rnams kyang 'dren pas/ mkhyen// gang la nyon mongs spyod yul dang // nyon mongs 'di dag gar 'byung mkhyen// nyon mongs dag la spyad pas
261a5(mdo sde): na// bag chags rjes su 'jug pa rnams// de dag ku na kyang khyod mkhyen te// de las khyod ni pha rol phyin// ngag dang pha rol rnams kyi yang // nyon mongs gang gis
261a6(mdo sde): spongs pa yi// lam de rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen// de slad khyod ni lam la mkhas// 'jig rten kun mgon rnam 'dren pa// mtha' yas brtson 'grus de bstod nas// bskal bye khrag
261a7(mdo sde): khrig mthul par// 'gro ba gnyis su de skyes so// 'di nas lha ris da skye tshe// rtag par lha yi dbang por gyur// bye ba mtha' yas lha rnams la// rgyal ba'i ye shes 'thob par bsdu
261a8(mdo sde): lha yi gnas nas shi 'phos te// mi yi dbang po rgyal por gyur// sems can khrag khrig mtha' yas pa// rgyal ba'i ye shes 'thob par bstan// de dag nga yi chos thos nas/ !
261b1(mdo sde): snang mtshungs med bskyed nas su// sems ni thams cad nyer bzhag ste// dri med sems kyis de dag nyan// sems can bye ba mtha' yas pa// byang chub mchog la nges par gyur// nga yi tshig rdzo
261b2(mdo sde): rtogs pa ni// sangs rgyas byang chub nges par gyur// sangs rgyas bya ba mtha' yas pa// sangs rgyas zhing gi rgyan shad kyang // bskal pa khrag khrig mtha' yas su// rgya che bshad pa mi tha
261b3(mdo sde): do// sangs rgyas yon tan gang brjod dang // drang srong chen pos zhing bsngags pa// thams cad rang bzhin stong par bshad// de dag ma skyes mi 'gag bstan// grang 'dir sangs rgyas bsngag
261b4(mdo sde): pa dang // sangs rgyas yon tan gang bstan dang // bde ba dar gshegs pas zhing brjod pa// gang gis bshad pa dang de dong 'dra// chos rnams zhi bar bde gshegs pa shad
261b5(mdo sde): ni ba'i rang bzhin de mi rmed// gang la bshad pa de yang nga // 'di la mgon med 'gro ba myos// de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mo blo gros mtha'
261b6(mdo sde): yas kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas bud med kyi dbang po las gyur te/ de phyin chad
261b7(mdo sde): bud med kyi lus su mi skye bar gyur to// 'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su sbyang bar 'dod cing / bla na med pa
261b8(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgrub pa'i stong pa nyid sgrib pa med pa la bslab par bya'o// chos
262a1(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 
262a2(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldag rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldag/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chen// rab tu
262a3(mdo sde): chemachem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho// nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lce
262a4(mdo sde): phyogs mtho/ dbus phyogs dma' na mtha' mtho// ma tha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to// srog chags bye/ pa khrag khrig phrog drug cu rtsa drug lon pa med par zag
262a5(mdo sde): pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma tshad ma da pa phrag brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med
262a6(mdo sde): cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags stong phrag dpag tu med pa/ 
262a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu sngon ma bskyed pa rnams ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka'
262a8(mdo sde): stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
262b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'dags pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas shes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan pa
262b2(mdo sde): 'dzin mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang btsos nas/ smad kyis gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar
262b3(mdo sde): skad du/ Ar+ya g+ha na b+hu ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyan stug po dkod pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang
262b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la mnga' sbyar ba/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs pa
262b5(mdo sde): gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams las 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po ni/ stobs rnams dang / mnga' ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
262b6(mdo sde): rkang pa rnams kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing rjes su spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnal 'byor dam pa'i rnal 'byor can 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
262b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po/ mur 'dug byed pa thams cad kyi gzhung rnam par 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
262b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi
263a1(mdo sde): / dbang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang / 
263a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chubs snadapa' semangs chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par
263a3(mdo sde): grol ba'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba bye ma snyed kyi/ byang chub sem
263a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum pa'i yul la ras yongs su 'das pa/ sems dang yid dang rnam dpar shes pa dang / kun gzhi'i spyod yul las yongs
263a5(mdo sde): su 'das pa/ ye shes dang yid kyi lus su gnas gyur/ pa/ sgyu ma lta bu dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / chos kyi sprin gyi sa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa sangs
263a6(mdo sde): rgyas du ma'i phyag gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/ khams gsum pa'i yul las shin tu 'das pa'i gzhal med khang gi pad+ma chen po la 'khod pa rnams dang thabs gcig/ 
263a7(mdo sde): tu zhugs ste/ de na mur 'dug dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyu ba med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
263a8(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba'i chos la bde bar spyod pa/ bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i spyod yul/ btsun par dbyangs 'byin pa/ sna tshog
263b1(mdo sde): kyi gzugs du ma ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ bzhengs nas kyang / pho brang 'dza' dang glog gi 'od can rgyan dang / lcab lhub du mas brgyan pa nas mngon par byung ste/ zla badra
263b2(mdo sde): ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i khang stengs su gshegs so// gshegs nas kyang stug po'i ri'i ris kyis rgyan/ seng ge gdan dam pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' drang thabs gcig
263b3(mdo sde): tu bzhugs so// bzhugs nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bzhir gzigs te/ gtsug gi rin chen 'od kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs chen po 'od zer stong phrag
263b4(mdo sde): brgya'i 'khor can smin mtshams nas phyung ste/ 'od zer/ gyi tshogs de byung bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gcig dang 'dra bar
263b5(mdo sde): yongs su snang bar gyur to// mchog tu phra ba'i rdul gyi phra ba nyid du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rang bzhin phra ba nyid kyang yongs su snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi
263b6(mdo sde): zhing stug po yang / gzhan gyi rang bzhin rdul gyi phra ba nyid las 'das te gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po ni 'od dang gza' dang zla ba spangs pa ste/ 'dus ma byas kyi
263b7(mdo sde): rang bzhin nyid kyis shin tu phra ba'i rdul gyi phra ba nyid du mi snang gi/ gzhan du mya ngan las 'das pa dang / nam mkha' dang / ma brtags par 'gog pa lta bur/ byang chub
263b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
264a1(mdo sde): po rnams kyis gzigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu phyung ba de dag
264a2(mdo sde): gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis/ phyog bcur byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
264a3(mdo sde): rnam par dgod pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa la bka' stsal pa/ rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa/ stug po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi
264a4(mdo sde): zhing 'di ni// 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs mang pra dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can du gtogs pa'i gzugs sred pa dang / ma rig pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi
264a5(mdo sde): 'bras bu/ ye shes kyi sems rnam par bsgrags te/ gnas gyur pa'i phyir/ ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ming bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / yid bzhin gyi lus stob
264a6(mdo sde): dang rnamangon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang gis brgyan pa/ gseng med pa/ ring du gnas pa/ zla ba dang nyi ma dang / nor bu dang / glog dang / 'ja' dang / byi
