264a7(mdo sde): ru dang / ba p+la dang / ldong ros dang / mtshal dang / 'ol ma se 'bru dang / king shu ka dang / in drag pa dang / gser dang / tsam pa ka dang / pad+mo dang / dung dang / rma ba'i 'gul dang / 
264a8(mdo sde): mdongs bu me long gi nang na 'dug pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bu thob nas/ sa dang sar zag pa med pas sbyangs pa'i rgyu ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir smon lam gyi mthor phyin pa bcu'i
264b1(mdo sde): sngo bas lus thob pa'i khyad par can dag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug por 'ong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang
264b2(mdo sde): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo
264b3(mdo sde): sbyar bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig
264b4(mdo sde): tsog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la zhu ba zhus pa/ lung bstan pa'i slad du/ skabs dbye bar gnang na bdag dgis zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam
264b5(mdo sde): par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sten pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang / ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa/ 
264b6(mdo sde): de dang / de'i dra ba dris pa lung bstan pas/ sems mgu bar byas/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smros shig dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa ji lta ba bzhin du
264b7(mdo sde): ston pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing
264b8(mdo sde): stug po 'ba' zhig/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems las 'das te gnas sam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang de yin nam/ ci lags
265a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'ba' shig/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can las 'das te gnas pa/ 
265a2(mdo sde): ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang yod do// rigs kyi bu 'di nas pha rol shin tu'ang pha rol sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgya 'das pa'i steng gi phyogs cha na/ tshangs
265a3(mdo sde): pa'i dbyangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin du/ sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / skar ma'i rgyal
265a4(mdo sde): po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa yang dag
265a5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi pha rol shin tu 'ang pha rol tu 'ang / sa pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgya mang po// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi tshogs kyis brgyan
265a6(mdo sde): pa/ shin tu yangs shing che ba dag yod de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 'khor gyi tshogs de dang de dag du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bdag gi so
265a7(mdo sde): se rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi gtam dang / mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i chos tshig dang / rnam par rtogs pa'i spyod yul dang / yi ge dang bral ba de/ 
265a8(mdo sde): bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur gtugs pa ston/ de ni rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston te/ 
265b1(mdo sde): de ni gang rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod kyis 'di'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gzhan dang / sangs rgyas dag yod dam zhes smras pa/ de'i lan du ngas 'di smras so// rnam par
265b2(mdo sde): dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod 'ba' shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' la ltad mo blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dri bar
265b3(mdo sde): sems par ma zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shugs 'dzin 'di yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas
265b4(mdo sde): kyi sgra'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / spyi gtsugs tshad me dad pa la ltad mo blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyangs kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgyar song ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
265b5(mdo sde): zhing chu bo gang ga'i bye ma snyed du rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog gis gyen du song yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shugs 'dzin 'di de bzhin gshegs pa
265b6(mdo sde): gcig tsam gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan tam/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ram/ spyi gtsug tshad med pa yang ma mthong ste/ des me mthong ba dang / ngo mtshar du
265b7(mdo sde): gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / spyi gtsug bltar tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par rjes su dran zhing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
265b8(mdo sde): khams 'di nyid du phyin nas mnyan du yod par/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ nyes pa las nyes par bshags nas/ sangs rgyas rnams nam mkha' dang mnyam
266a1(mdo sde): par shes te mngon par bstod nas bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul la mngon par mos shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po
266a2(mdo sde): nyid du song ste/ gnas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rdo rje snying po sa dang sa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa phra ba dang / dmigs su phebs pa dang / rnam par
266a3(mdo sde): gdon mi za ba'i gtam zlos pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal
266a4(mdo sde): mo sbar bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom dpa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig
266a5(mdo sde): cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan/ pa'i slad du skabs dbye bar gnang na bdag gis zhu 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje'i snying
266a6(mdo sde): po khyod kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang / ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de'i dra ba dris pa lung bstan pas/ sems mgu bar
266a7(mdo sde): byas na khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smros shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs
266a8(mdo sde): phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba dang / 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba zhes pa'i don ci zhig lags// 
266b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das don dam pa 'phags pa'i yul chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs ston pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa'i sa la spyod pa dang / gzugs
266b2(mdo sde): dang / mtshan nyid dang / yang dag par bsdu ba'i lta bar ltung ba rnams dang / mur 'dug gzhan gyi smra ba la mngon par chags pa'i blo'i spyod yul la spyod pa rnams dang / rdul dang
266b3(mdo sde): gces pa dang / dbang po dang / phyogs dang / dus dang / nam mkha' dang / bdag dang / yid dang / dbang po dang / don nye bar 'du ba'i lte bar ltung ba rnams kyi blo rnam par bzlog pa'i/ 
266b4(mdo sde): slad du bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du ga dasol/ ma rig pa dang / sred pa dang / las dang // mig dang / gzugs dang / snang ba
266b5(mdo sde): dang de las skye ba'i yid la byed pa dang / gsum 'du ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa can dang / rgyu dang / de ma thag pa dang / dbang dang / dmigs pa'i rten las
266b6(mdo sde): byung ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags par spyod pa dang / yod pa dang / med par smra ba'i rtog pa can dang / chos 'di pa'i phung po dang / gang zag stong pa nyid du lta bar ltung ba rnams kyi
266b7(mdo sde): yang blo rnam par bzlog pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ chos kyi dbang po thos par 'gyur gyis/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol// rnam shes lnga yi rgyu la
266b8(mdo sde): sogs// mnga' bdag dam pa ma gtogs par// sangs rgyas blo dang shes bya dang // ji ltar gang gis 'tshang rgya zhing // shes bya rnam pa lnga po rnam// thugs su chud pa sangs rgyas te// rmo
267a1(mdo sde): rnams thams cad mkhyen pas na// mya ngan 'da' dang mnyam gshegs pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgo'o dge'o rdo rje'i snying po sa bcu la dbang ba
267a2(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa/ mkhas pa chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi rigs grangs par byed pa/ dge'o rnal 'byor dam pa la dbang ga/ sangs rgyas dang / 'tshang rgya bar
267a3(mdo sde): yongs su dri ba 'di la ni khyod 'ba' shig ltad mo byung ba ma yin gyi/ sgra ma byed pa bzang po dang / rgyal ba'i bu gzhan dag kyang don 'di la ltad mo 'byung zhing / sangs rgyas kyi dngos po 'dri ste
267a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don 'di ci zhig/ ci gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ 'on te/ gzugs las gzhan zhig de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ 
267a5(mdo sde): de bzhin du/ phung po dang / khams dang / skra mched kyi 'du byed las kyang ste/ nang dang phyi'i mnyam pa nyid kyang mi mthong zhing / byas pa'i rgyu dang / 'jig pa'i chos can gyi// 
267a6(mdo sde): phyir phung po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa med de/ rdul phra mo med pa thugs su chud pa'i phyir/ shes rab dang / ye shas dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul te/ mnyam par
267a7(mdo sde): bzhag pa'i thugs kyis/ yang dag par rjes su ma gzigs shing / phung po rnams ma skyes pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin pas na rtog pa nyid do snyam mo// kye
267a8(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi shin tu phye ba la mkhas pa dge'o// kye rgyal ba'i bu de bos na/ dge bar shin tu nyon te yid la gyis shig deng / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan
267b1(mdo sde): 'das dge'i zhes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying do// bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rdo rje lta bu'i sna
267b2(mdo sde): po ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba/ rdo rje'i snying po phung po rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/ phung po las gzhan na yang med de/ phung po la gnas pa'ang ma yin/ phung po 'ang ga
267b3(mdo sde): ma yin/ skye ba dang / 'jig pa'ang gnas pa ma yin/ shes par bya ba'ang ma yin/ shes pa'ang ma yin/ don kyang ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na// 
267b4(mdo sde): phung po dang / khams dang / 'du shes dang / yul rnams ni mno bsam med pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegadas pa ni 'di rnams las nang ngam phyir yang mi blta'o// 
267b5(mdo sde): gzugs ni bskyed pa med cing sems med pa ste/ 'byung ba med pa'i chos can mthar 'jig pa rtsa dang / shi dang / bong rdo dang 'dra ba/ shin tu phra ba'i rdul gyi tshogs
267b6(mdo sde): dbu ba dang 'dra ba'o// tshor ba ni gnyis tshogs pa las chu'i chu bur dang 'dra bar skye'o// 'du shes ni bum pa dang / snam bu dang / cod pan la sogs pa'i rgyu las byung ba ste/ de yang
267b7(mdo sde): gnyis las skyes pa smig rgyu dang 'dra ba ste/ dper na dpyid kyis mngon par gdungs pa'i sa la nyi ma'i 'od zer bab pa/ gyen du langs pa rnams chu'i rlabs lta bur rlab cing ri
267b8(mdo sde): dgas dang / bya skom gyis nyen cing / chu tshol ba rnams la chur rmongs par bya bas rmongs par byed do// de bzhin du 'du shes kyang de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i gzugs su 'jug
268a1(mdo sde): pa/ yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa las skyes pa/ dpyod pa pa rnams kyis brjod pa las logs shig tu mi dmigs pa/ bong bu'i ra dang / 
268a2(mdo sde): mo sham gyi bu brjod pa ltar/ ming tsam du zad pa ste/ rmi lam gyi gzugs brjod pa ltar blta'o// dper rmi lam na gzugs kyi 'du shes mthong ba zad pa'i tshe/ gzugs la sogs
268a3(mdo sde): pa dang / bud med bzang mo yang dmigs su med do// de bzhin du mi shes pas/ logs pa na bud med dang / skyes pa la sogs pa mthong ba yang mngon par sangs rgyas
268a4(mdo sde): na mi dmigs so// 'du byed rnams ni chu shing gi snying dpo lta bu ste/ btsal na lus dang / ngag dang / yid las byung ba gzugs med pa rnams rnal 'byor can gyi
268a5(mdo sde): dpyod pa pa rnams kyis mi rnyed do// rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu de'i bdag nyid med pa ste/ sgyu ma byed pa 'am/ de'i slob mas nan tan du/ rtswa dang
268a6(mdo sde): shing dang bong rdo tsam la brten te/ gzugs kyi yan lag du ma las mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sgyu ma'i gzugs glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / mi dang / rgyan
268a7(mdo sde): ma brtags pa'i gzugs kyi phyogs gcig na ngo mtshar du bstan pa lta bu dang / gzhan yang mkhas pa rnams la ma yin gyi/ bus pa'i 'gro ba rnams la 'drid pa de bzhin
268a8(mdo sde): du rnam par shes pa yang / rnam pa gzhan du 'dug la/ rnam pa gzhan du shin tu brtags shing shin tu rtogs ste/ de yang bdag nyid kyis bdag la 'dzin pa gnyis
268b1(mdo sde): su shes nas/ sgyu mas mngon par grub pa'i gzugs gcig po'i ngo mtshar dang 'dra bar phyir ldog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa brtan la ther zug mi 'jig pa ste/ sangs
268b2(mdo sde): rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa'i rnal 'byor can rnams kyi yul yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bsgrags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang / nam
268b3(mdo sde): mkha' lta bur mi 'jig pa ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig gis 'das pa dang / byung ba dang / 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
268b4(mdo sde): kyis bstan te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam sa byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / chos na/ mas kyi chos nyid/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos kyi
268b5(mdo sde): dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid po 'di ni/ de bzhin gnas pa'o// rdo rje'i snying po skyon med pa zhes bya ba ni/ yang 'byung ba'i nyes pa thams cad
268b6(mdo sde): dang bral ba'o// rdo rje'i snying po skyon med pa ni nyes pa thams cad dang bral bar ma zad kyi/ ting nge 'dzin lo yang 'jug go/ skyon med par 'da' ba ni/ byang chub sems
268b7(mdo sde): dpas spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de nyid du mos te/ sems can la lta ba med par gyur cing / yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du
268b8(mdo sde): byas nas/ lcags bsregs po'i me dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur te/ de sems can gyi dgos pa la brtson 'grus btang zhing / snying rje chen po dang / 
269a1(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang bral bas/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung rnam par chad par byed cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas mur 'dug byed pa'i lam du 'gro ste/ 
269a2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi 'dam bu glang po chen po 'dra bar rnam par thogs ste/ rnam par shes pa'i yul rab tu zhum pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi skye mched thams cad kyis kun nas mi gnas
269a3(mdo sde): shing / rdzogs par mi byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir mngon du mi bya zhing / ma reg pa dang / nye bar mi bsgrub par gnas par bya'o// de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku'i rjes su zhugs te/ 
269a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid shes pas/ chos kyi 'khor lo ba skor ba'i sangs rgyas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi yul nye bar spyod pa// sprul pa'i yul can/ de bzhin
269a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyis/ ting nge 'dzin las bslang ba'i spu ra ba sa brgyad pa las 'das pa/ chos kyi sprin gyi sa la shes pa rab tu byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid
269a6(mdo sde): myong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag gi so so rang gis rig pa/ 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi sar zhugs te/ thams cad du 'gro ba/ ma g.yos pa'i ting
269a7(mdo sde): ngo 'dzin spyod pa lhun gyis grub pa/ rtag pa thar zug pa brtan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po na gnas par 'gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang po sa la dbang ba rnams la 'phral pa'i 'jug pa
269a8(mdo sde): ston par 'gyur te/ gnas gyur pa/ yid bzhin gyi ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin can stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang la spyod pa ngang pa'i rgyal po dang
269b1(mdo sde): 'dra bar ma zhugs pa'i chu'i zla ba lta bur 'gro ste/ blta ba'i don yod pa mi'i bdag po thams cad kyi tshogs kyi 'khor du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bu 'dod pa'i gzugs dag gis/ 
269b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po bstan pa'i phyir/ sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po thams cad dang / dbang sgyur ba'i byang chub sems
269b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ nor bu rin po che'i snying po la sogs pa'i gnas dag tu bde ba rnams myong bar byas te/ sa'i rim pa rnams bstan nas/ zhing ni sa zhing du/ phun sum
269b4(mdo sde): bdo ba rnams rab tu ston cing / phyi ma'i mthar thug par/ slu ba grub pa'i sdug 'chang ltar mi snang zhing / khang khyim gyi lha ltar de na gnas bzhin du mi snang ba'i
269b5(mdo sde): gzugs su khyim na 'dug pa ltar/ de dag sprul pa'i 'od zer dang / 'phrul pas sprul pa la spyod cing 'gro/ 'o// song nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i
269b6(mdo sde): sku nub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la zhen nas gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// dbang po phung po sprul yin te/ 
269b7(mdo sde): skye de dang ma rig las kyang min// bag chags kyis bcings mi bzad pa// yul dang dbang po'i rgyu las byung // rnam dpyod tshogs ni 'dod chags rnams// zhugs pa sems skyod de
269b8(mdo sde): yin no// khro ba me lce mnyam pa ste// zhe sdang dug gi dngos po yin// thub spyod rnal 'byor bzang can gyi// 'di dag rtag tu rnam gzhigs te// phung po rnams ni dor ba'i phyir// rdol
270a1(mdo sde): 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor spyod// gzugs ni 'byung ba'i tshogs yin te// phung po'i lhag ma gzugs med pa// ci bzhin par snang ri mo dang // grib la sdong dum la so/ 
270a2(mdo sde): med// mkha' la rlung gzugs mi snang dang // bya'i rjes rnams ci bzhin ni// mkhas pas sau rang rig pa// yang dag nyid dang yang dag mtha'// tshig gi spyod yul 'das pa ni// sangs rgyas
270a3(mdo sde): dngos po mi snang ste// sangs rgyas sgras ni mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das kyang sangs rgyas te// rnam rtog rtog dang bral bas na// de ni bstan tu mi nus pa'o// rgyu dang 'bras bu med pa ste// / 
270a4(mdo sde): yod dang med kyis rnam par spangs// rdo ba phye mar btags pra la// gser ni yod par mi snang ste// spangs pa/ 'i las kyi khyad par gyis// gser ni snang bar 'gyur ba yin// / 
270a5(mdo sde): gzugs rnams rdul du rnam gzhigs te// mkhas pas/ phung po lhag ma dang // khams dang 'du mched/ tshogs rnams dang // rnam par shes dang dbang po dag
270a6(mdo sde): gcig dang tha dad dngos por yang // rdul phran rnam par rab spangs na// dngos por sangs rgyas yod pa min// sangs rgyas med pa'ang ma yin te// rnal 'byor can rnams sangs rgyas
270a7(mdo sde): mthong // mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can// gang na sdug bsngal de na bde// de nyid la ni snang ba yin// sangs rgyas med ces mi bya ste// sangs rgyas mnyam par gzhag pa yod// 
270a8(mdo sde): rgyu'i sangs rgyas dge ba can// rtsa ba mkhas pa nyid kyang ste// 'jig rten kun gyi rgyal ba dang // yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // 'di dag sangs rgyas lngar gsungs so// 
270b1(mdo sde): sprul pa'i rgyal ba lhag ma rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod// mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can// de bas sangs rgyas yod pa ste// rnal 'byor can gyis thub pa mthong // khams
270b2(mdo sde): rnams gsum po 'das pa dang // rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas zhing // de bzhin gshegs kyi lha rdzas zhing // rgyal sras bzang pos kun tu gang // de ni thub chen sangs rgyas bzhugs// mtshan
270b3(mdo sde): gyis kun nas yongs su rgyas// rnal 'byor rnal la mnyam par bzhag/ chos dang bcas su rnam par mdzes// de bzhin phan tshun bsam gtan mdzad// shes rab ma shes shes byed
270b4(mdo sde): la/ stug po de na rnam par spyod// stug po de yi sam/ das can su// sangs rgyas gzugs can de dgakun// skad cig 'jig pa shin tu 'das// ting nge 'dzin
270b5(mdo sde): la rtag tu mos// dga' ldan nas babs 'phrul pa gang // rtog pa can rnams kun gyis mthong // stug da nas gshegs glang po ste// sangs rgyas gzugs ni stug/ 
270b6(mdo sde): na bzhugs// sna tshogs rnam mang gzugs tshul te// sems can bsam bzhin zhugs pa'i sa// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam bzhag pa// chu yi zla ba bzhin du snang // sna tshogs
270b7(mdo sde): gzugs kyi nor bu ni// tshon gyi 'byor las rnam par mdzes// de bzhin sangs rgyas stug zhing na// mnyam par bzhag pas rnam par mdzes// thams cad tshol la gzugs brnyan ltar// / 
270b8(mdo sde): gcig dang tha dad spangs par te// dgos par kun la 'jug pa ni// skyes bu dam pa thams cad mkhyen// rdul las ma yin dus las min// dbang po las min gces las min// 
271a1(mdo sde): rkyen gyis ma yin 'jig rten dang // sangs rgyas ldan par rnam mdzes pa// rgyu'i tshul du sangs rgyas ni// 'bras bu rnams la rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten sku la la/ 
271a2(mdo sde): bya ste// rgya mtsho ri dang shing dag dang // de la 'gro ba sna tshogs bcas// mnyam par bzhag pas shin tu dgyes// bya ba thams cad phyi nang du// gza' zla la sogs mdzes pa'i rnams// 
271a3(mdo sde): phyir yang phyag gis mthil dkod do// yungs 'brur 'gro ba kun mdzud pa// sangs rgyas thub pa'i rnal 'byor mnga'// thub chen thub pa'i dam pa'o// 'jig rten rnams la byed pa med/ 
271a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'phrul gyis sprul pa ste// 'byung ba gsum po 'di dag kun// sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par sprul// / rab rib mi shes myos 'dongs pa'i// rtog pa'i can rnams
271a5(mdo sde): 'phyan pa yin// bdag dang bdag med lta ba'i rnams// yod dang med pa'i smra bas bcom// 'on tam tham sa cad 'jig pa dang // chung zad 'jig pas smra ba rnams// / 
271a6(mdo sde): 'di la med dam chung zad dam// bdag dang bdag med ga la yod// sangs rgyas sna tshogs 'byung kun na// rnal 'byor mkhan po rnam par mdzes// dri za'i grong la bya ba rnams// ji
271a7(mdo sde): ltar snang ba 'jig rten na// rmi lam rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// ri dgas rnams la smig rgyu bzhin// de bzhin 'jig rten sna tshogs dag/ gdag la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang // / 
271a8(mdo sde): rlung ldan sogs pa'i thag pa bzhin// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor mkhyen pa'i mchog/ mi la 'khrul 'khor skor ba ste// rgya mtsho skye ba 'dzin dang 'dra// stug po'i ris kyi ye shes
271b1(mdo sde): kyi rgyan las byung zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la bzang / pus mo g.yas pa'i
271b2(mdo sde): lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal
271b3(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsel to// bcom ldan 'das mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / 'phags pa spong ba rnams dang / 
271b4(mdo sde): mnar med pa la gzhol ba rnams dang / ma dang pha la snying ring ba rnams dang / tshangs pa 'gum pa rnams dang / ra ba lang 'gum pa 'gums pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar
271b5(mdo sde): yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das sems ca na de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ji ltar yod/ su 'grol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
271b6(mdo sde): pa 'jam dpal sbyin pa gnyis byin pa'i sems can rnams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur to/ de 'di ltar chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa'o// 
271b7(mdo sde): chos kyi sprin pas ni/ skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pas ni/ sems can thams cad lnga phan btags par 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pas ni bkres pa dang // skom pa'i
271b8(mdo sde): sdug bsngal yongs su sbyong ngo // chos kyi sbyin pas ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs
272a1(mdo sde): su grol to// 'jam dpal sbyin pa gnyis po 'di byin na/ sbyin pa thaMd 'dul bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang sprin pa lngas sbyin pa dang / nye'i sbyin pa thams cad 'dus
272a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bzhon pa byin pa dang / gdugs sbyin pa dang / dar sbyin pa dang / gos sbyin pa dang / chos goso dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / 
272a3(mdo sde): stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad sbyin pa rnams kyis/ sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal yang sems can la la mtshams med pa lnga byed
272a4(mdo sde): pa dag gam/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dag gamo/ 'phags dpa spong ba dag gam/ mnar med po dag la gzhol da ba dag gam/ bskal par gnas pa dag gam/ sems
272a5(mdo sde): can gang la la dkon mchog gsum la snying ring ba 'am/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun lag nod par byed pa 'am/ tshogs kyi nor la 'phrog pa dag
272a6(mdo sde): gam/ chung ngu na lug gsod pa dag kyang rung / phyag dang pa yang rung / sme sha can yang rung ste/ 'jam dpal sus shin tu rgyas pa chen po rmad du byung ba'i chos stug po'i rgyan rin
272a7(mdo sde): chen 'di thos pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / chung
272a8(mdo sde): du na yi ge gcig kyang rung ste/ brjod pa dang / su yang chos de smra ba la mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang / nang par langs nas/ ngo phrad par byed cing / lta ba dang / sngar smra ba
272b1(mdo sde): byin par byed pa dang / lag pas reg par byed pa'i sems can de dag thams cad/ 'jam dpal sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal
272b2(mdo sde): thams cad las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal sa'i phyogs gang na chos smra ba de 'dug gam/ de'i dur ram/ ro 'am/ ro bom pa zhig yod la/ de'i ngo mthong na'ang mtshams med
272b3(mdo sde): pa'i las lnga rnams byang bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yi dgas lto dpag tshad brgya stong du mar skyes pa yod de/ yi dgas de bdag gi las kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad
272b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshor ba yod do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ sems ca na su mdo sde chen po rin po che 'di spong ba de dag kyang / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal su yang
272b5(mdo sde): mdo sde rin po che 'di rim gro byas te/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang // byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / 
272b6(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyis mchod pa dang / chos smra ba de'ang mchod par bya ste/ ji ste chos smra ba de mtshams med pa lnga byed na yang / 'on kyang de'i sems 'khrugs par mi
272b7(mdo sde): bya'o// chung ngu na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dgas dang / bya gang la las chos smra ba de shi ba'i ro bam pa dur khrod na 'dug pa'i sha zos kyang / de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog
272b8(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// ri dgas dang bya gzhan po de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'di nyid du 'thob par
273a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ de la nem nur dang the tsom dang yid gnyis mi bya'o// sems can gang la la sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sngon byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba/ 
273a2(mdo sde): sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon las ma nyams pa de dag thams cad/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ mdo sde chen po rin po che 'di thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang mchod pa chen
273a3(mdo sde): bos mchod par 'gyur ro// mdo sde thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan stug po rin po che las/ sbyin pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // mtha' yas yul can shin tu
273a4(mdo sde): phra// bsam gtan mkhyen pa skyes bu'i mchog/ dbang po 'a/ rangs pa mngon sum pa// chags dang dbang po rnam pa dar spangs// bsam gtan bsam pa bsam gtan pa'i// da ni
273a5(mdo sde): dgos pa'i tshul yin te// thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa rna mas// kun gyi snying la gnas pa yin// yod dang / med kyi phyogs dang bral// sangs rgyas phyogs ni dri ma med/ 
273a6(mdo sde): blo dang shes bya bral ba ste// ched dang dbang po spangs pa yin// sems shes rnams kyi yul ma yin// da ni grol ba rnams kyi yul// mtshan rnams kun kyang snang ba ste// de bzhin
273a7(mdo sde): gshegs ni mtshan med pa// dregs can rnams kyi dregs med mdzad// mnyam par bzhag cing gos pa med// g.yo ba ma yin g.yo med min// chags med lem la gnas pa ste// 
273a8(mdo sde): lha yul byung ba'i lha rnams dang // dri za lha min mi 'am ci// thub pa rnams dang mur 'dug gis// bstod kyang rtag tu yong mi g.yo// de la ngo mtshar srid pa med// 'gro ba gang na'ang
273b1(mdo sde): g.yo ba med// sngon las dag pa'i rnal 'byor gyi// de ni pha rol yin pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas 'phrul pa'i spyod pa yis// bya ba tsam gyi lha rnams kyis// mthong yang de dang 'di na med
273b2(mdo sde): ji bzhin nyi zla de dang 'dra// rnal 'byor yul du gnas pa ni// drags pa med mdzad 'gro bas mthong // rnam pa tha dad mur 'dug rnams// gang la gang gis dbang 'gyur ba// de la
273b3(mdo sde): de lta'i chos ston te// rnal 'byor bskyed pa'i 'od zer gyis// rnal 'byor chos can rnam phye zhing // rgyal ba'i tshul dang gsum po dag/ rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i 'khor rnams dang // 
273b4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i yul gyi bya ba dang // dka' thub tshal dang zhing rna mas kyi// phun sum tshogs pa de las byung // lha rdzas rnams dang nam mkha' dang // rin chen 'byung khung rnam
273b5(mdo sde): dag pa// lha yi lha yi mthu yis na// phyogs dang yul na 'bar ba yin// 'byung ba gsum gyi thabs rnams gang // rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas rnams kyis// gang rnams
273b6(mdo sde): byed bzhug bya ba dag/ sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub 'bras bu// de ni mdo 'dzin 'gro ba yi// dgos dang dka' thub can rigs dang // gad mi rtse ba'i sbyor ba dang // gar mkhan rnams
273b7(mdo sde): la rtag tu'o// dga' ldan gnas babs 'jig rten gyis// mthong ba bud med 'gro dang bcas// 'phrog cing sbyin dang 'brel pa dang // cod pan can dang lag na gzhung// dam pa rnams
273b8(mdo sde): kyis kun tu mthong // stug po nas ni de ma bral// yul 'di thub pa de yis te// thams cad na'ang shin tu snong // rab rib can gyi rab rib bzhin// ri dgas rnams kyi smig rgyu 'dra// 
274a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten rnams kyi sgyu ma la// ji ltar gzhan du mthong ba dang // rmi lam na'ang gzhan du ba'i// rmi lam bzhin du bus pas mthong // khyad par rab tu mthong ba ni// rnal
274a2(mdo sde): 'byor can rnams log long bzhin// lha yi lha yi yul yin te// de yi sras kyi dus kun tu// mi sprin gu lang tshangs pa dang // sa nan ta dang sa nan 'da'// sa nan gzhon nu sar skra dang // ne
274a3(mdo sde): co la sogs rnams bsams kyang // de yi yul la rnam par bslad// de dag rnal 'byor gyi mi mthong // thub pa gang dag 'byung ba dang // byung dang da ltar gang 'khod pa// de dag yul na gang
274a4(mdo sde): yang min// lta ba'i bag chags g.yogs pa'i phyir// sa drang sar ni rnam spyod pa'i// rdo rje'i snying po de la bstan// lha yi lhas ni byas pa yi// stug po'i zhing na yod pa yis// 
274a5(mdo sde): 'di dag rdo rje'i snying po de// mnyam par bzhag la shi/ na tu bstan// rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul// ji ltar gang gis sbyor ba dag/ dbyibs dang mdog dang
274a6(mdo sde): khyad par dag/ gzo bor gyur pas byas pas na// gces dang rdul phran dag gi su// brtags pa'i dngos po yod pa mon// skye ba dag ni chos tsam ste// ldog par 'gyur ba chos tsam
274a7(mdo sde): mo// kun tu phra ba'i bdag nyid kyi// yon tan da ga tu dngos yod brtags// mar ma bzhin du gsal byed pa// rgyu rnams dgos pa sgrub pa dag/ mtshan nyid snga nas mi rnyed de// 'jig dang
274a8(mdo sde): bral bas mi gnas pa'o// 'das dang 'das pa'i dngos por yang // yod pa ma yin 'byung ba med// rkyen tu bya rnams med par yang // brtags pa'i dngos po gang yang med// rkyen
274b1(mdo sde): rnams 'dus te byas pa la// dngos po yod pa ma yin te// rkyen rnams gang gi rkyen du 'gyur// yod dang med pa'i dngos mi snang // med pa'ang snang ba yod ma yin// phra ba'i bdag gis rnam par
274b2(mdo sde): brtags// phung po rdza ma ras la sogs// ri dgas skom gdungs smig rgyu bzhin// rmi lam dri za 'dra ba ste// gtsug lag nor pa dug dang bcas// rab tu smra ba sum brgya yis// 'jug pa
274b3(mdo sde): dag dang phyir ldog dang // mya ngan 'da' ba gang yang med// de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa/ sa'i dbang po lag pa'i phreng ba
274b4(mdo sde): tshad med pa lus dpe med po/ dpung rgyan dang / cod pan da dang / gtsug gi rin po che dang / se mo dos shin tu chas dpa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
274b5(mdo sde): nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/ theg pa gsum dang / 'jig rten dang mi 'gal ba/ lta ba'i chos la bdag gri so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes
274b6(mdo sde): kyis rig pa'i spyod yul bde ba la gnas pa/ rdo rje snying po'i dbang po rnal 'byor chen po'i rnal 'byor can/ rnal 'byor gyi mkhan po/ sa dang sa'i mtshams thams cad mi 'gal bar ston
274b7(mdo sde): pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rdo rje dbang po khyod skye ba thams cad dang / rgyal po'i 'khor dag tu/ cod pan can dag la chos ston pa yin te/ de'i phyir rgyal ba'i sras khyod la gsol ba
274b8(mdo sde): gdab kyis/ bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa lta ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa/ gzhan gyi dring mi
275a1(mdo sde): 'jog par spyod pa'i gnas ston cig/ des bdag dang cod pan can 'di dag gis bdag la mngon sum du gyur pa'i spyod yul/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'i sgo'i bde ba nan tan gyis
275a2(mdo sde): rab tu thob ste/ yid bzhin gyi lus rnam pa bcu la dbang sgyur zhing / stobs dang mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang gyi gzhal med khang gis gnas gyur te/ yang
275a3(mdo sde): dag pa'i mtha' la gnas spangs te/ sna tshogs kyi lus yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur te/ rgyal ba'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dang / stug por stug po na spyod
275a4(mdo sde): pa rnams la chos sna tshogs ston par 'gyur ro// rdo rje snying dpos smras pa/ rgyal po smos shig/ dga' dge'o// dad pan can la khyad par du// chos la 'jug pa bdag
275a5(mdo sde): med pa// stug po'i rgyan ni rab ston pa// sems kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid dag/ rnam rtog spyod yul yin shes na// rnam rtog don las phyir ldog pa// 'gro ba rnam rtog
275a6(mdo sde): mthong nas te// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mthong nas kyang // ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur// chos kyi ngo bo nyid bstan gyis// rgyal po nga la de nyon cig/ dpyid kyi smig rgyu ci bzhin pa// 
275a7(mdo sde): de'i rnam par 'gro ba 'di// mtshan gzhi mtshan ma rgyu rnams las// rnam par rtog pa rnam mi rtog/ blo dang rtogs byas bskyed pa ste// rtogs bya de'i khyad gyur pa// gnyen por gyur/ 
275a8(mdo sde): pa gcig med pa// nyi ma dang ni grib ltar gnas// sems med tsam po'ang yod pa min// tshad dang gzhal dang gnyi ga med// rnam par rtog pa sems tsam ste// rnam par rtog
275b1(mdo sde): pa rnam mi rtog/ shas dang shes bya rnam rtog pa// sems tsam de ltar yin na ste// shes bya sems dang tsam pa ni// rtag tu tsam la shas yod min// sems kyi chos kyi ngo bo nyid// gang zag/ 
275b2(mdo sde): dag kyang g.yo ba rnams// grang tshe sems la rnam brtags na// rtog dang brtags pas spangs pa yin// brgyad po rnyed nas dga' bar 'gyur// dgu la bsam gtan spyod yul te// bcu
275b3(mdo sde): la sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyis// dbang bskur rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyal ba'i yul la chos rnams kyang // mi zad chos kyi skur 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i zad dang 'dra ba ste// sems
275b4(mdo sde): dang rnam shes de bzhin te// mi 'jigs pa'ang ma yin ni dang // rtag cing zhi ba de la brtan// 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes te// stug po'i zhing na rnam par mdzes// rnam
275b5(mdo sde): shes 'byung gsum 'das pa ste// sna tshogs gzugs / rin chen bzhin// de bzhin sangs rgyas sa bsam med// stug zhing rgyal ba'i gnas gyur pa// ji ltar
275b6(mdo sde): gyo mo rnams kyi rgyu// rdza ma chag par bstan pas bzhin// gyo mo rnams kyang rdul gyi ste// rdul kyang mchog phra'i de bzhin du// dngos po rnams kyi rkyen rnams la// rgyu nams ji ltar
275b7(mdo sde): snang ba bzhin// zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// rgyu ni de bzhin zag bcas pa'o// ji ltar shing las me 'byung ba// phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar byed// de bzhin ye shes byung ba'i
275b8(mdo sde): me// phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya// gnas kyi lus las 'phos 'gyur cing // sems dang rtog pas rnam spangs pa// chags pa med pa'i ye shes ro// stug po'i dbus na
276a1(mdo sde): rnam par mdzes// bskyed med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// sa la gnas pa ma yin pa// lta ba thams cad zad byed pa'i// bdag med nyid la skyabs su song // rgyud kyi
276a2(mdo sde): rgyun rnams chad pa'i phyir// 'jig pa med cing 'byung med pas// lta ba thams cad zad byed pa// bdag med nyid la skyabs su song // zhir gyur zhi bzhir ma byas// zhi bas zhi ba bden nyid du// 
276a3(mdo sde): lta ba thams cad rnam dog phyir// bdag med nyid la skyabs su song // sa rnams sna tshogs byas pa ni// bdag med pa lo bdag med pas// mi rtag tho bas bcom pa dang // rnam par ston pa'i
276a4(mdo sde): mangs kyang ste// bsreg pa tshig me bzhin du// bdag nyid ni dar 'gyur de nyid du// de bzhin lta bas rnam brtags te/ bdag med bsam gtan rab gnas pa// lta ba'i chos lnga
276a5(mdo sde): bder gnas kyi// so so rang rig spyod yul la// thog mni/ de nas nyes dri med// 'phags pa rnams kyis la ga sa// 'phags gnas 'jig rten pas spangs te// 'jig
276a6(mdo sde): rten 'das pa'i 'phags la gnas// sems kyi sa las rab gyur te// stug po'i dkyil na rnam par mdzes// mi bdag mi bdag dbang po rnams// thams cad kyis kyang yang smras pa// rdo/ 
276a7(mdo sde): rje snying po skyabs dang mgon// gang la skabs su mchi bar bgyi// sangs rgyas yod min med pa min// phung po'i skye shing rnams bsregs te// dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom ste// 
276a8(mdo sde): stug po sangs rgyas sa la gnas// shes bya dri med zhi ba la// skyabs su song shig grogs po dag/ rtog dang tshad laso bral bas ste// blo dang rtogs bya'i gnas ma yin// stug po'i dkyi
276b1(mdo sde): bzhugs rnal 'byor can// de'ang grogs po mgon skyabs so// rnal 'byor can rnams kun gyi zhing // zhing mchog bzang ba stug po'o// rnal 'byor 'byor pa mang pos gang // stug po de
276b2(mdo sde): la skyabasu song // spros pa kun dang bral ba ste// lta ba'i nyes pa rnam par spangs// ri mo'i thag thug lta bu dang // rmi lam mo sham bu byung dang // rmi lam bud med bzang mo ltar// thub
276b3(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis 'gro ba mthong // dri za'i grong khyer spyod pa bzhin// skra phung 'gal pa bskor ba ltar// smig rgyu ri dgas sred mtshungs su// yod dang med pa rnam par spangs// sgyu ma'i
276b4(mdo sde): lus gzugs sna tshogs dang // 'phrul pa'i sprul par de/ dag ni// 'jig rten spyod tshe mthong ba ste// sa dang sa// la thub pa rnams// bsngor meng du ma'i gzugs gyur
276b5(mdo sde): pa// sgyu ma'i shing gi 'bras bu ltar// sprin ding dung glog ltar yang // thub paso rnal 'byor rnam par mthong // rdza la sogs pa'i bzod gzung ltar// 'gro ba bdag gi
276b6(mdo sde): rnam rtog byung // yid dang yid kyi rnam shes dang // chos lnga'i ngo bo nyid rnams dang // 'jug pa'i rnam shes spyod pa ni// bdag med mi gnyis brgyan pa ste// bag chags thog ma mad/ 
276b7(mdo sde): pa yi// sems kyi gnas ngan lan byung yog/ 'od pa'i dba' rlabs 'dra bar ni// kun gzhis la gnas pa yino// rlung gis ji ltar 'od pa la// phan tshun dag tu bskyed byas na// dpa'
276b8(mdo sde): rlangs rnams la 'jig pa med// 'od pa'ang med par mi 'gyur te// snga med bag chags gnas can rnams// 'jug pa'i yul la gzhol ba dag/ sems brgyad rnams kyi 'jug pa ni// 
277a1(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa ma yin te// dus gcig du yang de dag 'byung // bar bar du ni rims kyis so// thog ma med nas sems 'jug pa// skar ma'i gza' yi dkyil 'khor
277a2(mdo sde): dang // lo ma me tog 'bras bu dang // ri dang sde dang tshal sogs la// rtag tu dus gcig 'jug pa ste// rims kyis kyang ni shes par byos// yang dag ma yin snga ma'i yul// mal
277a3(mdo sde): la gnas bzhin mthong ba yin// lus kyi 'jug pa'i rims kyis kyang // srog la rten cing 'byung ba yin// rdzas dang grangs dang chos rnams la// tha dad rims kyis 'byung ba ste// mur
277a4(mdo sde): zhing bca' dang bza' rnams la// tha dad rims kyis 'da' ba min// ro dang dri yi rnam pa la// rims kyis tha dad / 'byung ba yin// rims kyis kha dog khyad par gyi// sna
277a5(mdo sde): tshogs la'ang dus gcig du// rgyal po sems ni bsam mi khyab// rtag tu rang bzhin 'od can no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ste// rdo ba rnam
277a6(mdo sde): kyi gser bzhin gnas// yid ni kun gyi gzhi las byung // yid kyi rnam shes de bzhin te// rnam shes drug po rnam pa mang // sa'i khyad par byed pa'o// bag chags sems dang lhan cig du// / 
277a7(mdo sde): sa bon kun pa'i kun gzhi ni// kun nas nyon mongs rnam drag kyang // rtag tu rang bzhin 'od can gyis// de ltar de bzhin gshegs kyi rigs// nges dang ma nges dge ba yin// rtag tu gnas
277a8(mdo sde): ltar 'byung ba ni// rgya mtsho rlabs dag ci bzhin du// tha ma 'bring dang rab gnas su// de bzhin kun gzhis khyad par byed// sangs rgyas sa la rnam dag cing // gzhan du gyur nas rnam par
277b1(mdo sde): mdzes// yang dag ji bzhin don sngon la// rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa// mthong zhing thos te shes pas nA// sa chen bdag po khyod nyid kyis// spobs pa can la bstan par gyis// khyad par du'o
277b2(mdo sde): khyad par bdag/ khams phran rnams kyi khams nang na// sa la 'khor lo 'khor rnams dang // kun gzhi rnam par dag 'gyur na// sa yi rgyal por 'gyur ba yin// 'dzem bu'i gling la
277b3(mdo sde): dbang ba yin// 'khor lo 'khor bar yang 'gyur ro// dga' ldan la sogs gzhal med du// mche ma rab kyi dbang por 'gyur// dbang po'i gnas su dbang por te// dbang sgyur gnas
277b4(mdo sde): su de bzhin no// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po'i bdag/ de gzugs khams bdag po'ang de bzhin te// gzugs dmed 'du shes med sems can// bsam gto na bde
277b5(mdo sde): ba'i 'bras bur kyang // yang dag mngon bye ma chags pa // yang dag mtho la ma rig par// 'jigs med so go'i sgra skrag cing // dga' dang ye shes yang dag ldan
277b6(mdo sde): bsam gtan dbang gi bde bas ngoms// da ni stug por smon pa yin// khams su spyod pa'i nyes pa yas// chags med mnyam par gzhag pa ste// mthar gyis stug por zhugs
277b7(mdo sde): nas su// rnam par sangs rgyas sangs rgyas par// chos kyi dbang po bdag 'gyur te// rten las gzhan du gyur cing bde// rtag pa brtan ba zhi ba'i chos// stug po'i dkyil na
277b8(mdo sde): sras dang bcas// chos kyi bdag po rnam par mdzes// 'jig pa med pa mi yi mchog/ mya ngan 'das pa 'jog pa min// mur 'dug rnams kyis dzir brjed bzhin// mchog dang
278a1(mdo sde): tha ma par ma yin// rgyal po bcu po'i las rnams kyis// theg pa gsum du gyur pa ste// stug po tshol ba'i khyad par yang // rgyal po yang dag skye bar 'gyur// sa dang
278a2(mdo sde): sa la gnas pas so// 'jig na 'dus byas nyes par 'gyur// 'chi ba rnams la de bzhin te// rgyal po 'jig pa mthar ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sku// sems can
278a3(mdo sde): zad cing mad 'gyur ba// de ste mya ngan 'das 'jig na// sngon gyi mtha' 'ang 'jig pa dang // sems can 'byung ba med par 'gyur// sems can khams rnams zad gyur na// rgyal
278a4(mdo sde): ba'i shes bya dngos po med// mya ngan 'da' med shes bya ma/ da// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid kyang med// me/ dmar bsregs pa'i dpe rnams dang // sa bon tshig pa'i/ 
278a5(mdo sde): dpe dag gis// rtog can thar la mkhas pa rnams// lu sa can rnams la thar pa ston// yod dang med par rnam thar gyis// thar pa'i bde las de dag ring // bsam
278a6(mdo sde): gtan gnas pa thams cad de// lugs su 'jug dang bzlog pa dag/ gzugs med 'du shes med pa dang // mngon shes dbang dang stobs rnams dang // ma nyams nyams pa
278a7(mdo sde): med pa yi// chos kyi mtshan lnga mkhas pa rnams// sa yi khams la mkhas pa dag/ mi'i dbang po stug por 'gro/ yod dang med pa 'jig pA ni// de dag 'khor las mi 'byung
278a8(mdo sde): ste// 'phrad pa gsum po 'jig med cing // rgyu dang dmigs pa'i rkyen rnams dang // de ma thag dang mtha' yang ste// sa rnams bdag med phyi rol dag/ mig dang gzugs
278b1(mdo sde): dag rgyud byas te// phrad pas gang rnams 'jug gyur pa// gzugs rnams mngon byed ye shes dang // de dag thams cad zhig par 'gyur// phyi dang nang gis rnams ni// phan tshun stobs kyi
278b2(mdo sde): byung ba ste// yod dang med pa'i lta ba las// de ste grol nas 'jig na ni// sems dang dmigs las bral ba'i phyir// rnam par dmigs pas mi gnas te// mdun du rtog pa med gyur
278b3(mdo sde): cing // de yi rang bzhin mi gnas la// gang tshe dmigs pa spang ba la// rnam par rtog pa mi gnas shing // gang tshe gnyis las rnam grol te// rtog med rtog pa spangs pa na// de tshe
278b4(mdo sde): sems ni mnyam par gzhag/ 'gro ba rnam rtog med pa ma thong // gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa ste// bsam gyis mi khyab shes la gnas// rten pa las ni gyur pa ste// 
278b5(mdo sde): ye shes gnas ngan len pa spangs// yid bzhin rnam pa/ bcu po ni// sna tshogs gzugs kyis brgyan pa ste// sa gsum rgyal po rab byed cing // rgyal po stug
278b6(mdo sde): por rab tu 'gro// gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung // mi ldan pa dang 'dus ma byas// nang dang phyi yis rnams kyang // tha dad rnam par rab mthong zhing // so so rang gi/ 
278b7(mdo sde): ye shes mkhas// lta ba'i chos la rnam par gnas// rgyal po stug por 'dong ba ni// ye shes mkhas pa rnal 'byor can// mtshan ma ming dang de bzhin nyid// rnam par rtog dang
278b8(mdo sde): ye shes dang // yang dag mtha'i gnas pa yi// so so rang rig spyod yul du// rgyal po dag dang rgyal po'i bu// rnal 'byor sems dpa'i rnal 'byor can// rgyal po stug pa/ 
279a1(mdo sde): 'dong ba ni// sangs rgyas bstod pa'i zhing du'o// 'phrad pa gsum dang rkyen spangs te// bdag gi phyogs las 'phags gyur na// phyogs las nyams pas 'jig
279a2(mdo sde): pa ni// rtog pa can dang mnyam par 'gro// ma grub pa dang yang dpe yi// rgyal po 'gal bar shin tu 'gyur// rnam par rtog dang nyes pa'i mchod/ de dag rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro// 'phrad
279a3(mdo sde): pa gsum po sun 'byin pa// chud zos bung ba ci bzhin du// de bzhin 'jig rten sun 'byin pa// yang dag ma yin rtog pas smra// de la nyes pa rnam lnga ste// rtog la bslad pa'i
279a4(mdo sde): mig can la// 'dra chos mi 'dra chos skyon can// nor dang zlog pa med pa dang // bdag gi phyogs las mes pa'i blo// pha rol phyogs la brten pa dang // lta ba
279a5(mdo sde): de dag 'byung ba ni// thog ma'i mtha' ni 'jig byed pa'o// sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'// rgyal ba yod pa ma yin te// kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba dag
279a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba dog par rgyug pa'o// de dang de yi lam rgyud du// thugs rje'i dbang gis rgyal ba gshegs// sprul pa'i 'od zer lha rdzas kyis// zla ba lta bur rgyu zhing 'khor// snga ma'i las/ 
279a7(mdo sde): ngang tshul 'thun par// pha skabs chos rnams ston pa mdzad// rgyud dang rgyud du bying rnams la// chos kyang bstan par mi 'gyur te// de ste mya ngan 'da' 'jig na// rgyal bas yon
279a8(mdo sde): tan ci zhig brnyed// dbang sbyor gsum po rnams dang yang // rnam par thar dang bden pa mthong // rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po dang // dran pa nye ra gzhag stong pa nyid// tha dad yang
279b1(mdo sde): dag shes bzhi dang // 'dri la lung bstan pa rnams dang // dmigs pa dang ni de ma thag/ rgyu dang dbang yang de bzhin te// gzugs med pa dang spyod pa dang // dbang po stabs rnam/ 
279b2(mdo sde): bcas pa dang // mngon par shes dang dad rnams dang // rnam par shes dang de'i rgyu dang // 'dus byas ma byos chos rnams dang // byang chub
279b3(mdo sde): yan lag gang zag dang // rnam par thar dang skyes bu brgyad// sa rnams dag dang shes pa dang // zil gyis mnon pa'i 'du mched dang // ye shes mngon du chud pa bcu// sdug
279b4(mdo sde): bsngal chos nyid shes pa dang // sdug bsngal gyis su so/ sor rtog/ sdug bsngal nyid kyi rjes su shes// 'dus pa rnams kyi chos shes dang // gdus pa la ni
279b5(mdo sde): kun rtog dang // 'dus la rjes su 'gro shes dang // 'gog pa dag la chos shes dang // 'gog pa dag la rtog pa dang // 'gog la rjes su 'gro shas
279b6(mdo sde): dang // lam la chos kyi shes pa dang // lam la so sor rtog pa dang // lam la rjes su 'gro ba shas// shes pa rnams dang slob pa bcu// brgyad pa mang na ldan bdun dang // / 
279b7(mdo sde): rigs lus rigs dang lhan cig 'ong // bar chad cig po'i gang zag dang // bar mar mya ngan 'da' ba dang // gzhan skyes mya ngan 'da' ba dang // mngon par 'du byed ma byas dang // 
279b8(mdo sde): steng ma'i rgyud kyang de bzhin te// rgyal po da thams cad kyang // ye shes spyod yul yin par gosus// rnal 'byor can yul sna tshogs te// ba ma mchog dang bar mgo// byang chub sam/ 
280a1(mdo sde): dpa' 'a bar du// mchog dang bcas par de la sgom// rang sangs rgyas ni dbu mar te// nyan thos pa ni tha ma'o// bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa// lnga gsum
280a2(mdo sde): drug dag tu yang // sems kyi tshogs kyi 'geg pa ni// rnal 'byor can rnams shin tu byed// gang 'das de ni 'gag pa yin// sems ni rang bzhin 'od snang can// zag pa gang yin
280a3(mdo sde): dri sems min// sems dang lhan cig gnas pa med// ma 'ongs pa ni ma byin te// da ltar byung ba gnas pa med// sems ni rkyen dang mi ldan par// 'di dang gzhan du'ang skye ba
280a4(mdo sde): med// bsam gtan bzhin sems med de// 'byung ba'i// rgyu la gnod pa med// 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rnam shes te// / yid dang rnam shes lnga po'o// rang gi rnam rtog ma
280a5(mdo sde): shes pas// dpa' rlabs bzhin du 'byung ba yin// te ga dang rtog las rnam grol ba// thub pa kun gyi kun gan 'o// yod dang med las lha rdzas su// gzhan 'gyur
280a6(mdo sde): 'jig pa ma yin zhing // stug pa dang ni stug dkyil du// zla ba lta bur rab tu mdzes// de ni mi 'jigs bde bar gnas// stug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas// tha dad ma yin
280a7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid mkhyen// ye shi sa ro gcig nyid du gyur// bsam yas rnal 'byor yul can te// rgyal po zla ba lta bur spyod// rgyal po phun sum tshogs pa 'di// rnal 'byor
280a8(mdo sde): khyer ba thub rnams kyi// rtag par rgyal po de yi phyir// khyed kyi yid kyang rnal 'byor shog/ 'dod gnas rnam pa drug po dang // tshangs pa dag gi bcu gnyis dang // gzugs mod
280b1(mdo sde): shes med sems can du// rgyal po khrod ni dbang por gyis// stug por 'dod pa'ang thob par te// bzang po'i stug por smon pa'i phyir// rgyal po ye shes bcu po rnams// bsgoms na/ 
280b2(mdo sde): sdug por 'gro bar 'gyur// chos dang rjes su 'gro shes dang // pha rol se ngas dang kun rdzob dang // sdug bsngal 'dus pa'i shos pa dang // 'gog dang lam las skyes pa dang / 
280b3(mdo sde): bying ba'i shes dang mi skye dang // khyeng bzo bsgom pa de bzhin te// shA kun ta li'i rgyal rigs dang // ig shwa kre dang so mA'i rigs// yang dag don ston rgyal ba'i mchog/ khyod kyi
280b4(mdo sde): rigs ni khyad par 'phags// de'i rigs su khyod skyes shing // zhum pa med par stug por song // lte ba'i tshe// sa la gnas pa yi// rnal 'byor can gnas dri med du/ 
280b5(mdo sde): spyad pa bzhin du dbugs rgyu zhing // 'gro rgyu lug dang 'dra ba ste// rnga 'brug bzhin du lus phyed kyis// 'gro na 'ong ba byed pa ni// thams cad lus la yid yin te// 
280b6(mdo sde): me'i ri dgas bzhin du gnas// sgyu mo'i shing ltar shin tu snang // chu bo'i nang gi me bzhin du// smin ma mig dang yan lag rnams// sbyar bas rgyal po bzhin du rtse// sems dang
280b7(mdo sde): sems las byung dang yid// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag/ ches rnams 'di dag dngos po med// sprin gyis tshul du 'byung ba ste// ku na gzhi thams cad sa bon 'di// bag chags
280b8(mdo sde): rnams kyis yongs su bkris// sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu dang // 'ja' dang glog rnams ji bzhin du// lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul// de lta'i gzugs su snang ba yin// 
281a1(mdo sde): lu ma'i pad+mo lta bur dag/ dri med dang ba'i rgyal po bzhin// gsal ba gdon mi za yi rigs// sangs rgyas sprul pa bzhin du gnas// mtshan ma'i mthu las ming 'byung ste/ 
281a2(mdo sde): mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba yin// mtshan ma ming dang 'brel pa ste// rkyen rnams kyis kyang rnam par brtags// mtshan ma tshul dang dbyibs dag las// rnam
281a3(mdo sde): par rtog pa shin tu 'byung // rnam par rtog pa skyed pa yi// rgyu la rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// phyi rol mtshan ma sems rnams dang // bag chags yid kyang de bzhin te// sems dang / 
281a4(mdo sde): lhan cig ldan pa ni// khang pa la ni gnas pa yin// yid dang dbang por ldan pa ni// rnam shos lnga'i rgyu yin te// / rtag tu yang dag ye shes kyis// 'jig rten rgyu la rnam
281a5(mdo sde): par lta// de ltar byed dang bya ba med// de bzhin nyid 'di rnam pa zhan min// thams cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid// phan tshun stobs kyis 'byung ba ste// rnal 'byor can rnams
281a6(mdo sde): de ltar lta// de bzhin nyid du gsal bar mthong // rang bzhin yongs su grub pa ni// chos rnams chos nyid de yin te// brtags pa'i dngos po rang bzhin du// chos rnams thams cad ma/ 
281a7(mdo sde): skyes pa// stong pa ngo bo nyid med de// yod dang med pa'i phyogs spangs pa// sgyu ma rmi lAm rnams dang 'dra// dri ba'i grong khyer lta bu ste// skra tshogs rnams dang smig rgyu bzhin// du ba sprin stu
281a8(mdo sde): lta bu ni// mtshan ma tshul dang dbyibs rnams kyis// ji ltar ming du 'jug pa yi// tshig dang yi ge mang po dang // ming rnams mang po la yang ste// kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin yin
281b1(mdo sde): gzhan gyi dbang ni de las gzhan// yid don dbang po 'dus pa las// sa bon kun nas ngag chags dang // tha dad ma yin sems dang bcas// rnam par shes pa kun tu 'byung // gzhan gyi
281b2(mdo sde): dbang gi rang bzhin yang // phan tshun stobs kyi rgyu las so// so so rang rig shin tu phra// mthong ba'i chos la gnas pa ste// rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa 'di// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod
281b3(mdo sde): yul lo// 'phags pa'i rang bzhin thugs chud pas// sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras// rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa ni// yang dag mtha' ru gzigs pas na// skye ba
281b4(mdo sde): zad ces rnam par gsungs// tshangs pa'i lam yang non ces s+ho// / byas kyis gzod yang bya ba med// phyin chad 'byu dang ba med de zhes// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// 
281b5(mdo sde): g.yo ba thams cad shin tu 'byung // bag chags ma lus da/ sregs pas na// rnam par rtog pa mi 'byung ni'i/ bdag med shin tu mthong ba ni// chos dang gang zag
281b6(mdo sde): bsgrags pa ste// sa bon rnams dang phral bas na// sems kyi tshogs rnams mi 'jug go/ thog ma med pa'i dus bsags pa'i// yid kyi gnas ngan ldan rtog pa'i// spros pa tham/ 
281b7(mdo sde): cad mngon bsal bas// mya ngan 'das pa lcags bsregs bzhin// ji ltar rab tu bsregs pa'i lcags// bsil bar gyur kyang 'jig pa med// de bzhin grol ba thams cad kyang // 
281b8(mdo sde): ma zad bzhin du bsil ba yis// zag pa med pa'i chos dbyings su// bzhugs pa stug po'i dkyil 'khor na// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras bcas// ting nge 'dzin gyi zas gnas
282a1(mdo sde): pas/ mnyam par bzhag la mnyam gnag cing // mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas// rgyal po rnal 'byor can gyi yul// rnal 'byor 'di yin brtsam par bgyis// 
282a2(mdo sde): de ste rgyal sras dge ba'i gnas// stug por 'gro bar 'dod na ste// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas// zhing gi mchog ni stug po'o// de phyir rgyal po dge bar rtsoms// 
282a3(mdo sde): rgyal po rnams la'ang dge bar gyis// ming ni mtshan ma'i mthu las byung // mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste// mtshan ma las kyang rnam rtog 'byung // grub pa rnams ni ma gtogs par
282a4(mdo sde): rdza la sogs pa dbang po'i yul// phung po yon tan ldan dpa'i rnams// rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'di// sku dpa la ni rgyu yin no// khyad par byed pa rnam rtog ste/ 
282a5(mdo sde): gnas kyang rnam par shes par byed// 'gro dang mi 'gro 'gro ba yi// gti mug rnams kyang shin tu skye// rang po thung ngu kha dog dang // rtsub pa dag dang 'jam pa'i
282a6(mdo sde): rnams// sgra dang dri la sogs pa'i yul// mngar dang kha dang tsha ba dang // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul// ji snyed dag dang mi dge dang // 'dus byas chos dang 'dus ma byas// mya ngan
282a7(mdo sde): 'da' ba ye shes yul// skad cig skad cig rab tu 'byung // byung zhing phyir yang log pa ste// de ni mgyogs par shin tu 'gro/ rnam par shes pa rgyu las byung // yid dang kun gzhi rab
282a8(mdo sde): 'brel bas// khab long lta bur shin tu 'khor// kha gnyis sprul pa ci bzhin pa// yid kyi spyad pa de bzhin te// kun gzhi rnam shes yog par byed// gcig tu 'on kyang rab tu 'bru
282b1(mdo sde): yid kyi rnam par shes dang bcas// rgyu yi dgos pa byas nas ldog/ bdag tu dgos pa'ang shin tu byed// bdag gir bya ba'ang 'phel bar byed// lus la drod kyang skyed pa ste// sna tshogs/ 
282b2(mdo sde): rnam par rab tu spyod// zas dang skom dang longs spyod dang // gos dang spos sogs rnam spyod dang // mchod ba dag dang rgyug par yang // mi'i lus ni 'dzin pa yin// gar dang gad me rtsed// 
282b3(mdo sde): mo dang // yid kyang rtag tu byed pa ste// sgra tshogs mi gal ba bskor pa dang // dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dang // smig rgyu la'ang de bzhin du// rnam par rtog pa kun tu 'jug/ pa bab
282b4(mdo sde): kun tu 'khor ba'i sems// bdag sems khong du mi chu// da pas// lus dang snod kyi rnam par yang // phyang meny+tsa/ dag pa ltar gnas po'o// nyam chung snying po med pa ste// 
282b5(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa rgyu med pa// bdag gis brtags pa'i nga na la spyod// mthong nas gnas pa gzugs brnyan bani na// rgyal po rnam shes sa bon na// lta ba'i yul du
282b6(mdo sde): g.yo ba ste// bus pa'i tshogs rnams myos par byed// 'phags pa ma yin sa yi bdag/ rgyal po rnam shos gsum pa yi// 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa ste// 'di rnams dang ni/ 
282b7(mdo sde): bral grub pa'i// rang bzhin yang dag nyid yin no// bye ba phrag zhing ji snyed rnams// shugs 'dzin gyis ni mthong ba dang // 'phags pa mo'u dgal bu yis kyang // lus dang lus che'i mdze/ 
282b8(mdo sde): pa rnams// de dag las ni 'di dag 'phags// stug po'o zhing na'o sa'i bdag/ thams cad zhing na ci mdzes pa// de dag dpe 'am char mi rung // bde ba yod dang mngon dga' dang // 'og gi zhi
283a1(mdo sde): rnams bye ba dag/ de dang de na gang bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas de dag stug la bstod// sdug ces bya yod sngon mtha' med// rang 'byung 'phrul pa de yin te// zag pa med pa'i
283a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sar// 'byung ba gsum las 'das te gnas// de ni bde ba nyer len med// khyed dang 'dir spyod dang bral// ther zug mchog tu rtag pa ste// bstan pa stug po 'dus ma byas// yang
283a3(mdo sde): dag sangs rgyas byang chub tu// mtshang rgya 'og min gnas mchog tu// sangs rgyas ma gyur 'dod khams su// sangs rgyas mdzad pa mi mdzad de// de dag stug pa'i zhing gshegaso nas// sangs
283a4(mdo sde): rgyas sprul pa bya ba yis// rtag tu rnal 'byor mnyam par/ gzhag/ sprul pa dag dang thabs cig rol// thams cad/ zhing du lta ba ltar// gang la gang gis dbang 'gyur ba// 
283a5(mdo sde): de la de ltar 'byung ba ste// 'phral pa'i sprul pa dag gis kyang // sa bcu pa yi mdo mchog dang // sdong pos brgya na dang du ma yi// gang yang rnam par sprul pa'i mdo/ 
283a6(mdo sde): dpal gyi 'phreng ba las bshad dang // rnam par snang ba'i mdo sde dang // sgyu ma dpa' las 'gro ba sogs// mdo sde rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ stug po rgyan nas rnam par byung // stug
283a7(mdo sde): po rgyan gyi mdo sde 'di// mdo sde kun las 'phags pa yin// rgyal po 'di la rim gror yang // rgyal po rnams dang bcas pas gyis// gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs rnams dang // 'du
283a8(mdo sde): shes med pa de bzhin te// gnas las 'das te sangs rgyas dbang // bzhugs so stug po'i dkyil 'khor na// pad+mo 'dra ba'i gzhal med khang // gzugs mang rnam pa sna tshogs na// lha
283b1(mdo sde): rdzas rmad kyi ye shes te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam dag gis// rnam grol rnal 'byor can rnams dang // de na bcom ldan thabs cig bzhugs// stug po'i dkyil bzhugs bsam
283b2(mdo sde): gtan zhugs// sangs rgyas sa mchog rnam bzhi la// de la bzhugs shing gzugs 'dzin pa// rnal 'byor mkhas pa nyid tshul gyis// de yi mtha' ma mi gzigs pas// gzugs
283b3(mdo sde): rnams dang ni yul rnams kyi// thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnams// gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang // stug po'i dkyil na rnam bzhugs shing // thams cad rnal 'byor can gyi
283b4(mdo sde): bstan// ba bla gser dang zla 'od tsam pa ka dang rma bya'i mgri ngan pa pad+mo 'dra// de'i se la bzhugs pa'i lha'i yang lha gzugs ni rnam par mdzes su// de gzugs lha rgyal/ 
283b5(mdo sde): ge ba ka dag glog dang 'ol ma byu ru 'od bzhin du// la la/ sa bal chung skra dang na bza' lo ma rtsa la sogs pa'i ma la bzhugs par// mthong ngo nyi ma stong ltar shin tu
283b6(mdo sde): rnam par 'bar ba'i sku gzugs mnga' ba la// thub can la las rnal 'byor dbang la stug dbus chu skas re ra bzhugs par mthong // thub pa'i thor tshugs tshogs ni log gis 'gro yi
283b7(mdo sde): mgo bo klod pa bzhin du ste// la lngar gzugs ni rdo rje an 'da' rnyil gyis spras pa'i cod can brgyan par ro// la las la lang thub pa de la 'khor lo ri mo nya dung bcas par mthong // 
283b8(mdo sde): la las ji ltar nam mkha' rgyu ba'i lam la 'ja' zug bzhin du thub pa mthong // lha rdzas phyag sor can gyis sna tshogs yul can ri rab phyag tu rab gzhog cing // khams sum
284a1(mdo sde): / chu srin gnas dang chu gnas de bzhin pa lang rmig par shong bar mdzad// sbyin pa'i shugs kyis mi yi bdag po'i gtsug gicod pan rnams kyis rab mchod cing // la la
284a2(mdo sde): dug na rgyal dang rgyal po'i 'khor na dgos pa rnams la mkhas gyur cing // chad pas gcod par sdang de stug po'i dbus na gzhan du rnam par snang ba ni// thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i
284a3(mdo sde): ye shes rnal 'byor shin tu byed pa rnams la ste// rang gi yul rnams sngon gyi rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag rnal 'byor gyis ston cing // la lis gnas dang lta ba yid dang blo rnams
284a4(mdo sde): shin tu gzhan du gyur pa dang // dbang dang ye shes rnam dpa sna tshogs ting nge 'dzin dang yid bzhin sku mnga' ba dar// la las yul la chags med spyod yul rig
284a5(mdo sde): blo'i bya ba gcod par te// 'di dang gzhan med bsreg me gyur pas tshig bya med phyir mya ngan 'das par ro// snum dang 'od 'phro med pas ji lta ra 'jig rten
284a6(mdo sde): 'di na me bzhin shin tu mya ngan 'das// la las pha rol phyin pa'i mchod smin mchod bcug mchod sbyin byed pa dag tu ste// sprin dang mchod dang thub pa dag kyang rnam pa tshul
284a7(mdo sde): bzhin mdzad shin tu mthong // bde ba yod ces bya ba'i zhing mchog de na skyes bu yod pa de dag ni// mngal nas skyes pa ma yin bde bar 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can
284a8(mdo sde): dag ste// lha rdzas gser ltar 'bar dang zla ba lto bu'i lus 'chang rnal 'a byor can gyi bdag/ lha rdzas 'od bzang de dang gang yang mi nang rnal 'byor can gyi dbang po'i yul// 
284b1(mdo sde): de dag rgya cher mi pod rnal 'byor can gyi dbang po dag gi bde de la// gzhan du bdag cag nyid kyis bshams pa'i longs la spyod pa'i zhing gi me de dag/ mtha' yas 'od kyi bde ba can na rgyal
284b2(mdo sde): ba'i sras rnams lha rdzas 'od 'khor can// rnal 'byor yang dag nyid mos thub dang khyu mchog bsam gtan bdud rtsi myong byed dang // rnam pa tha dad sna tshogs rin po che dag yal ga
284b3(mdo sde): sbyangs pa'i nag tshul shing // lha rdzas gsar phye'i khams la bsngags pa'i zhing mchog de ni shin tu rnam par mdzes// gsor dang rin chen sna tshogs me tog pad+mos de ni mchog tu ra
284b4(mdo sde): tu brgyan// 'di ni sangs rgyas zhing gi gter yin dpa med dad kun ming yang pad+mo smras// thub pa de la dad cing bas/ dam gtan mkhas la sangs rgyas skyid la rab tu mos// 
284b5(mdo sde): bdag gis sten pa la ni bdag bstan yid can pad+mo dag las skyes pa ste// sangs rgyas zhing gi mchog na gan sa pa'i ming ni bzang po'i mtshan gyis kun nas brgyan// 
284b6(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po'i bcas pas rmad du 'bar ba'i lus can dpal gyi ba'u dang bcas// yod dang med pa'i rnam rtog rtog pa med pas dra med rdzub mang dag go/ de ltar 'di dag rnam par
284b7(mdo sde): bstan nas ni// rdo rje khyu mchog mthe bo tsam du gyur// sro ma rdul phran shin tu phra ba'i sku yi brgya che'i gzugs su'ang de bzhin gyur// lo lar bder gshegs rang rgyal nyan rdzo
284b8(mdo sde): gzugs dang de bzhin sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang // gang dang gang la sems kyi spyod pa ci bzhin de 'dra'i gzugs kyi khyad par dag/ rnal 'byor mkhas pa rdo rje zhes byas mtshan
285a1(mdo sde): med gzugs kyi yul dag rnam par spangs// de skad bshad nas yang smras pa// sna tshogs gzugs can rgyal ba'i sras// sa rnams de bzhin dbang rnams dang // ma
285a2(mdo sde): nyams mngon par shes pa dang // sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang // de ltar yid bzhin lus kyang ste// gzugs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang // rnam thar tha dang yang dag rig/ stobs dang 'jigs pa
285a3(mdo sde): med pa dang // phung po khams rnam kyis zag med pa// 'di dag gzhan du gyur nas 'thog// rtag pa'i sangs rgyas so yang ngo // chos rnams lnga'i rang bzhin dang // rnam par shes pa brgyad
285a4(mdo sde): rnams dang // bdag med gnyis po rab rtogs nas// gdan du 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur// yid bzhin lus ni ba dpo dag/ sbrum dpa' bar 'gro bas bskor// mi zad sman lam
285a5(mdo sde): bcu po dag / lam gyi rnams kyis shin tu sprul// rmi lam long gzugs brnyan nam// chu yi zla ba bzhin du mdzo// rnal 'a'abyor lam la thub pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas sa
285a6(mdo sde): la zhugs pa dang // rgyal ba pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun du byas// yod dang med pa'i phyogs bral ba// rdul phran rnam par 'jig rnams kyis// dri za'i grub
285a7(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po dang // lha yi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshigs// ri rab sa la 'dod rgyu zhing // nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'khod spyod kyang // ji ltar snang bar ma gyur pa// de bzhin rgyal sras
285a8(mdo sde): gces pa'i rnams// rnal 'byor med pas mi mthong ngo // rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ldan// sa dang zhing rnams bye ba na// rgyal ba mchog la mngon par mos// smon lam
285b1(mdo sde): dbang la gnas pa'i rnams// pad+ma'i khang par rab tu skye// dbang dang bsam gtan sems pa dag/ zhing dang zhing du mya ngan 'da'// ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa ston// lhun gyi grub par
285b2(mdo sde): thams cad du// chur byung zla ba 'dra bar te// nyi ma lta bur khyad med pa// snang ba sems can spyod yul du// yang dag mtha' la mi reg par// ting nge 'dzin las rab tu ldog/ gru la
285b3(mdo sde): gnas pa'i bung ba dag/ gangs chen mtshol 'gro ba bzhin// gang du gru 'gro der rgyug ste// dpag tshad shin tu mang bar yang // thugs rjes nyon mongs dma' ba'i lus// sdug bsngal
285b4(mdo sde): can gzugs de bzhin du// de dag 'byung ba rab tu ston// phyir ldog bdag med pa yang ste// 'jig pa dag kyang nam mkhyen nas// zad pa'i dus su mi gnas pa// gzung
285b5(mdo sde): dang 'dzin gyis 'phangs pa'i rnams// gzung dang 'dzin la spyod pa'i rnams// gzung dang 'dzin gyis bskyed pas na// mtshan ma'i gzhi med mtshan nyid med// 
285b6(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i rgyun gyis khyer pa'i rnams// yang dang yang zhing skye ba yin// chags med mtsho'i gtar gyur la// gcig la gcig 'ju'i spre'u ltar yang // byed pa grub la gnas
285b7(mdo sde): kyis mthong // 'ju ba'i gnas dang rten med par// de bzhin rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams// sred pas rnam par dkrugs pa yi// rnam rtog sdug bsngal gnas pa'i rnams// sa'i gan
285b8(mdo sde): na nyon mongs phyir// rab tu byung dang phyir ldog dang // sbyin dang mchod pa dag kyang 'byung // 'di 'dra rnal 'byor can gyi chos// rnam pa sna tshogs bsgom par gyis// 
286a1(mdo sde): 'phags pargyan stug po/ bam po gnyis pa// kun tu bzang po me yi bdag/ gzi brjid chen po sna tshogs gzugs// byang chub sems dpa' sems
286a2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po// rdo rje snying po la smras pa// 'thun pa dag la dbang byed dang // lha gnas 'khod pa gzhan dag dang // rin chen khring pa sna tshogs na// gang yang stug po'i dkyil 'a'o/ 
286a3(mdo sde): pa'i// rgyal sras rnal 'byor ldan pa dag/ gang gis sdug ces bya thos te// thos nas nan tan byed pa'i rnams// gzhan du 'gyur la gzhol pa dag/ gzhan du 'gyur ba'i tshul thos
286a4(mdo sde): shing // ting nge 'dzin de'i tshul sing ba// stug por ring da mi thogs 'gro// sangs rgyas yang dag 'gro la mes// 'gro ba 'dzin dang shugs 'dzin dang // 'jam dpal
286a5(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul pa dang // mthu chen 'phags pa 'jigarten dbang // zla ba la sogs gzugs dbang rgyal// blo gros shin tu zhi ba dang // lte ba rdo rje rnal 'byor rig/ 
286a6(mdo sde): du ma nam mkha'i bdag po dang // phyag na rdo rje blo chen dang // rnal 'byor can dang rgyal sras rnams// gang yang bye ba'i zhing dag nas// chos mnyan phyir 'ongs pa'i rnams// sdug
286a7(mdo sde): po'i rkyen la gzhol ba dag/ rgyal ba ma 'ongs mthong nas kyang // khong nas snying rje snying brtse ste// rnal 'byor ldan can dbang po'i gtso// sna tshogs gzugs la rab tu smras/ 
286a8(mdo sde): rnal 'byor can gyi gtsel dris// 'jigs med rdo rje snying po la// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // dbang sgyur khang pa bzang por yang // ji ltar gang gis sna tshogs byis/ 
286b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs gzugs can khyod kyis spros// dngos po kun gyi sna tshogs nyid// 'gro ba dag gi rab 'byung ba// rdza la sogs pa'i dngos po dag/ ji ltar chu 'jim thal zhar las// las su
286b2(mdo sde): bya ba thams cad bskyed// 'gro ba 'di dag de bzhin byas// rnga dang pi wang sgra la sogs// las su bskyod las dbyangs 'byin te// de bzhin 'jig rten 'di la'ang ci// bskyod pa'i
286b3(mdo sde): las las kun 'byung ngam// rang bzhin gsum po ji bzhin du// dngos po gcig la kun tu gnas// sa rnams 'di ltar thams cad du// dngos dang dngos la rab tu gnas// de bzhi
286b4(mdo sde): 'di dag kun kyang ci// dngos po gcig la rab gnas sa// ma// gang phyir 'di ltar rgyan dag snang // khams ga sum g.yo dang mi g.yor bcas// dga' ldan mtsham
286b5(mdo sde): rab gnas dang // dbang sgyur rnams kyis byas sam ci/ mi 'am ci dag du ma dang // gya ne mi snang bas byas sam ci// 'og min thor tsugs can gyis sem// 'on
286b6(mdo sde): tam gzugs med rnams kyis kyang // lha rnams bdag po thams cad kyis// gcig du 'dus te 'di byas sam// 'phrul pa'i sprul pa dag gis sam// rgyal ba khyu mchog gis mdzad
286b7(mdo sde): dam// 'on tam rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams// zhing gzhan rnam par bzhugs pas sam// rnal 'byor la mkhas rnal 'byor can// sangs rgyas zhing du bzhugs rnams kyis// sa
286b8(mdo sde): rnams thams cad byas sam ci// gang la nor pa rab tu gnas// gang 'di nor pa snang ba dag/ smig rgyu rnams la chu bzhin te// rdza ma'i phyogs la yon tan bzhin// 'gro ba gang
287a1(mdo sde): gis phyogs la gnas// yon tan mi 'bral yon tan can// yon tan med dang yon tan gnas// ma yin phan tshun 'brel pas na// yon tan tshogs su rnam par gnas
287a2(mdo sde): nor pa sna tshogs de bzhin du// gang la'ang de bzhin gnas yin nam// 'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// sa rnams la ni gang snang ba// 'on tam tshangs pas phyung ba 'am// 'gro ba mthu bo
287a3(mdo sde): ce'i sa sam// khyu mchog gis sam sman zas sam// ser skya yis sam rang gis sa mi// gces pa'i rkyen gyis byas sam pa// rang bzhin gyis sam dbang pos sam// dus dang phyog
287a4(mdo sde): kyis bskyed pa 'am// 'on tam ma rig sred pas sam// / lha yi drang srong the tsom za// lha'i tshogs kyang de bzhi danA te// grub dang dri za'i rgyal po rnams// sra la gnas
287a5(mdo sde): pa'i rnal 'byor can// 'on tam 'di dag mi 'phrul la ma// 'gro ba dri za 'dra zhig gam// rmi lam yin nam smig rgyu 'am// sngon med rnam par rtog yin nam// 
287a6(mdo sde): gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang // kha gnyis sprul bzhin gnas pa 'am// 'on tam rang bzhin 'di med dam// 'khrul 'khor ro langs bzhin gnas sam// mgal ba bskor
287a7(mdo sde): ba 'dra ba 'am// 'on tam ska yi tshogs lta bu 'am// byed dang las kyis ma byas shing // dbang po ku be ras ma byas// mchod sprin sprin bsreg chod 'bras sam// srang gi gzhung gi lam
287a8(mdo sde): gyis sam// rgyu rnams shin tu phal che ba// nan tan rtag pa ma yin te// 'gro ba'i 'dzin pa med pa'ang min// rgyu rnams kyi 'ong rgyu dag ste// 'gro ba ngo bo nyid kyis grub// las
287b1(mdo sde): kyi bag chags rnams las byung // rnam shes brgyad po'i skyes bu ni// kun gzhi zhes kyang bya ba ste// des ni sna tshogs 'di dag kun// rdza ma'i 'khrul 'khor bzhin du bskor// til bkrum
287b2(mdo sde): til mar dza bzhin du// lan tsa'i tsha bro ji lta bar// gzugs la mi rtag nyid ji bzhin// skyes bu 'di yang de bzhin gnas// ji ltar bsrung la sogs la dri// yon tan rnams la yon/ 
287b3(mdo sde): tAn mtshan// gnyi zla gnyis kyi 'od zer bzhin// de ltar skyes bu gnas pa yin// dgos dang byed pa med pa ste// yod dang med kyi phyogs kyis spangs// gcig dang tha dad med pa
287b4(mdo sde): ste/ rnamur 'dug phyogs kyis rnam par spangs// rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pa med// rnam yang rnam par mi rta/ dag ste// grol ba'i so so rang rig pa// sangs rgyas
287b5(mdo sde): sar skyes thub can gyis// gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa ste// sna med sems dang sems byung gis// rnam shes brgyad dang bral ba ste// nam yang rnam par mi
287b6(mdo sde): brtag ste// de la gnas pa chu rlabs bzhin// phan tshun mtshan nyid tha mi dang// 'byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste// de'i ldan pa rig pa min// ji ltar thub pa'i rnal 'byor dang / 
287b7(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul can gyi rdzu 'phrul bzhin// mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu mthong // rnal 'byor 'gro ba gzhan gyis min// de bzhin 'jug pa'i rnam shes rnam// de dag kun gzhi lhan cig
287b8(mdo sde): gnas// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong // sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras de bzhin// des ni 'di dag thams cad kyang // ji ltar nor bu phug pa'i rnams// skud la brgyus dang
288a1(mdo sde): 'khor lo bzhin// las kyi rlung gis bskor byed pa// ji ltar rdza mkhan 'khor lo dang // lag dang thal nar bskor ba yis// kun tu bskor cing snod byed pa// yon
288a2(mdo sde): tan+da sna tshogs rnam par ldan// de bzhin rnam shes brgyad kyi mi// khams kyi gzugs mnyam lhan cig tu// sa ni rnam par byed pa ste// phyi nang rgyu ba'i 'gro ba rnams// gang la
288a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di dag kun// nam mkha'i skar tshegs ji bzhin du// gnas shing rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// rlung gi rta yi shin tu bskor// ji ltar mkha'i la bya rnams kyi// rjes ni snang / 
288a4(mdo sde): ba ma yin te// bar snang yod pa ma yin na'ang // bya na// mas rgyu ba'i byed pa med// de bzhin rnam par shes pa de'i mi// bdag yod ma yin gzhan yod min// rnam dag
288a5(mdo sde): bar snang 'dra ba dag/ dba' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung // bag tshogs rnam pa'i nyes pa yis// mi chags pad+ma zla ba bzhin// pad+mo la ni chu med min// chu la zla gzugs
288a6(mdo sde): med pa yang // chu song zla ba yod pa ste// pad+mo'i 'dab ma de bzhin du// mig la bud med gzhon nu dag/ mig gis mthong bar dzir mi 'gyur// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shas
288a7(mdo sde): lngas rnams cig car byed pa ste// 'gro ba dag gi lus la ni// khyab gnas sa bon kun can no// stug po'i sprin dang 'dra bar yang // sa rnams yog par shin tu gnas// tshe dang rnam
288a8(mdo sde): shes kun nas yog/ drod kyang de bzhin stobs ces bgyis// sna tshogs gzugs kyi lus can gyi// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs kyang rtsom// rdza mkhan ji ltar sa snod la// snod
288b1(mdo sde): la// spyod pa ji bzhin de lta'o// ba lang sogs pa'i ru mthong zhing // bong bu'i rwa ni med pa ste// ma mthong bar ni med pa med// ba lang rwa'i med pa yang // phyin ci log tu dmigs pas med// 
288b2(mdo sde): phyin ci log gis mnar sems la// shin tu phra ba'i rdul bshig na// yod pa de dag med par 'gro/ med pa yod pa'i rgyu las te// med pa yod ces rtog pa ni// yod pa med las
288b3(mdo sde): bltos pa ste// phan tshun ltos pa'i rgyu las so// blo dang rtogs par bya med ste// khong du chud pa skye ba med// mgal pa'i 'khor lo 'khor lo min// ji ltar skra tshogs mthong ba bzhin// 
288b4(mdo sde): dri za'i grong khyer sgyu ma dag/ ji zhig mthong nas 'byung / ba bzhin// blo yi 'byung ba rgyu med por// yod pa ma/ yin rnam rtog pa// rtog bya rnam par rtog pas bskyed// 
288b5(mdo sde): lus can rnams kyi yid skyes te// ming dang 'du she sa 'brel pa dang // rang bzhin gnyis kyi bag chag sa kyis// mi yi sems ni rab tu 'byung // grub pa'i
288b6(mdo sde): don ni mi skye'o// thog ma me pa'i dus nas bsags// gnas ngan lan gyi yul las byung // rab tu spros pas bsgos yid las// sems kyi tshogs ni 'byung bar 'gyur// 
288b7(mdo sde): gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang // kun tu skye ba'i mi yi sems// rdza la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi dbyibs// snang ba gzhan yang ma yin te// 'di dag thams cad blo
288b8(mdo sde): tsam pas// rtog bya'i dngos po yod pa min// blo dang rtogs bya'i dngos por ni// bdag nyid rab tu 'jug pa ste// byis pa rnams kyis mi rig pa// bag chags rnams kyis
289a1(mdo sde): sems myos rnams// rnam pa brgyad dang rnam bdun dang // dus gcig tu'ang 'byung bar 'gyur// sngon med bag chags ldan pas na// kun ga ni sa bon thams cad
289a2(mdo sde): can/ rna rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs ji bzhin du// rlung gi rkyen gyis bskyod pa ltar// gang byed cing ni rab tu 'byung // rnam par rgyun kyang mi 'chad do// blo yi 'od pa de bzhin rtag/ 
289a3(mdo sde): yul dang reg pas bskul ba'i phyir// sna tshogs bdeg stog rnam shes kyis// bdag la bdag gis 'dzin par byed// ji ltar se la rnam rtog med// 'gyur med rnam pa sna tshogs
289a4(mdo sde): gzugs// dgos pa'i rnam par gyur pa ni// de 'a kun gni rnam shes la'o// ji ltar mi zhig lag pa yis// rang gi lus la gnyed pa dang // phyogs kyi
289a5(mdo sde): glang po bdag lus la// bdag gis sna yis chu 'thor dang // ji ltar shed can la la dag/ bdag gi lus la/ sos 'debs pa// de bzhin blo ni brtag don la// don
289a6(mdo sde): gnyis tshul du 'jug pa'o// blo yi yul du bya ba 'di// khams gsum rnam par khyad par gnas// phyi dang nang gi bya ba yang / rnal 'byor mkhas pas mthong ba yin// sangs
289a7(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyis 'di kun gzigs// sa lo ji snyed snang ba dag/ rnam pa sna tshogs dbyabs kyi gzugs// sA la rnam pa sna tshogs so// chos 'di yang dag bshad pa dang // 
289a8(mdo sde): rdo rje snying po 'jigs med pa// mi smra'i dngos la dgar 'gyur te// bsam gyis mi khyab chos dbyings kyi// lha'i bsam gtin mi g.yo ba// sangs rgyas spyod yul bzhugs
289b1(mdo sde): pa dang // stug po nas ni 'ongs pa'i gzugs// mthong na rnal 'byor lam gnas pa// thub pa de yi lha rdzas lus// rnal 'byor btang ste yang gnas so// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs
289b2(mdo sde): med dang // 'du shes med pa'i gnas rnams kyi// mun pa'i tshigs nas phyir byung ste// stug po de nas 'dir 'ongs so// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bzhugs pa'i gnas// sangs
289b3(mdo sde): rgyas zhing ni mchog rab nas// gzugs kyi rnam pa du ma yi// sangs rgyas sgo'ang rnam byung nas// mi'i khams na rnam par 'phrul// su blo ji 'dod phan par ro// stug po yi ni ming
289b4(mdo sde): phyung nas// rgyal ba'i sras po zad kyang // phan tshun gcig lag/ cig bltas te/ gtsog la gcig ni rab smras pa// stug po dri med bsod nams ste// sdig pa thams cad 'jig
289b5(mdo sde): par byed// rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas zhing gi dam pa phul// yu bus de yi sgra thos te/ thos nas bdag cag dga' bo'i yid// stug po rnal
289b6(mdo sde): 'byor can gnas kyi// brtan lam bdag cag thob par bya// 'og min tshangs pa thor tsugs can// gtsang ma'i gnas kyis rnam spangs pa// zhing gi ngo mtshar ltad mo dang // sangs rgyas
289b7(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras kyi yab/ tshangs pas da tshe gsol nas su// gtsang ma gnas kyi 'jigs med rnams// de dag thams cad sems dpa' ni// tshangs pas stug por 'gro mi 'gro/ tshang
289b8(mdo sde): pa rnal 'byor chen po can// mun pas de dag bslad par gyur// thub pa mi shes thub rig gi/ ji ltar gnas ni thub par 'gyur// tshangs pa de na kun tu sems// blo yis tshangs pa rig
290a1(mdo sde): pa'i mchog/ 'dod dang gzugs kyi bdag po dag/ rgyu ba de na med pa ste// nam mkha'i khang pa gnas rnams dang // 'du shes med pa'ang de bzhin te// mur 'dug
290a2(mdo sde): gzhan la grags pa yin/ rnal 'byor can rnams der mi 'gro/ bdag gis bya ba byas sam ci// bsams te 'dir yang 'ongs par gyur// bdag 'gro 'am brtan zhing brtag pa yi// 
290a3(mdo sde): ther zug 'dus ma byas stug tu// gal te yang na thub pa de// rnal 'byor mang ba lha'i yang lha// mthu yis rnal 'byor mkhyen rnams kyi// pho brang stug po der 'gro 'am// thub pa de
290a4(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo// de skad smras nas thor tsugs can// mthong ba shin tu 'bar ba yi// sangs rgyas lam na/ bzhugs pa rnams// gsungs shig gsungs shig thub
290a5(mdo sde): pa'i rnams// khyed la ci 'tshal ci gyis shig/ sangasargyas dbang po bka' stsal stsol// stug po ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur// gzugs yul 'di las phyir log
290a6(mdo sde): shig/ der 'gror med pa gzugs can rnams// stug po de ni thub can yul// bla na med pa yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing // 'du shes med pas mi 'thob ste// de bzhin 'dod
290a7(mdo sde): pa'i khams dbang gis// mur 'dug gzhan la grag sa pas kyang // rnal 'byor rig lam stug mi 'thob// tshangs pa nyid kyis de gsung thos// mchod sbyin gsol ba'i zhal na te// 
290a8(mdo sde): de ni de nas phyir log ste// tshangs pa'i gnas su yang song ngo // de yi phyir na der 'gro ba// tshangs pa yis kyang mi 'thob pas// gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs can rnams// 
290b1(mdo sde): der 'gre yod pa yod ma yin// ci phyir dad pa 'di 'dra rnyed// stug po'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba yang // rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog/ de phyir ngo mtshar thob par gyur// sgyu ma'i
290b2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi yul// rnal 'byor can gnas stug po de// 'di ni gcig nas gcig tu thos// de nas byung bas rnam par bsnyad// sna tshogs tshig 'di thos pa ni// thub can rdo rje
290b3(mdo sde): snying po yi// rgyal sras khyod kyis smra bar gyis// rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod// dbang sgyur rgyal po de bzhin gyis// gzi brjid chen po ma thogs shig/ mtshe ma rab dang dga'
290b4(mdo sde): ba dang // gtsang gnas 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams// thub dpa'i bka' ni ma lus par// smra bar su zhig nus dpa yod// gzhan du khyod dang sangs rgyas rnams// thub can
290b5(mdo sde): thug pa bsnams pa dag/ sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi khya ga/ mchog gi gtso bo sangs rgyas kyi// rnal 'byor/ rnal 'byor med pa la// su yis ji ltar bstan par nus// 
290b6(mdo sde): mtshe ma rab dang shugs 'dzin dang // dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras po dag/ gcig pa'i dbyangs su yang smras te// gsungs shig gsungs shin rgyal ba'i sras// rnam par 'phrul dang 'jam
290b7(mdo sde): dpal dang // byams pa mi 'am ci yi bdag/ rnal 'byor can gzhan gang de na// de dag smra ba smros shig grog/ nam mkha' las kyang sgra byung ste// lha dang sngags 'chang rnams kyis kyang // / 
290b8(mdo sde): de nas shin tu rnga brdungs pa// gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal ba'i sras// de dag de skad smra ba na// thor tsugs can gyi tshangs pa 'ongs// sa 'khod kun la smras pa ni// stan gyi mchog
