319a2(mdo sde): 'dam nas byung ba ni// rnam dag gzhan du gnas gyur pa// bdag nyid cha rnams 'dod pa yin// ji ltar rin chen rnam pa dag/ ri brags mi yis bcag brdungs kyang // rgyal po'i
319a3(mdo sde): cod pan du'ang zhes// cod pan la yang brtags pa yin// de bzhin kur gzhi rnam par shes// bag chags rnams kyis bcag brdungs pa// rnam dag sangs rgyas rigs yin te// 
319a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nyid du de gzung ngo // ji ltar chu gting rdo ba dag/ nya lcibs dag gis yongs dkris pa// de bzhi na kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // bag chags dri ma can du
319a5(mdo sde): byas/ bzung dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs su yang // dngos po/  gnyis kyis rab tu 'jug/ ji ltar kha gnyis yod/ pa'i sprul// gang du 'dod pa der 'gro ste// de bzhin kun
319a6(mdo sde): gzhi rnam par shes// rims dang cig char rgyu ba yin// rtag tu sna tshogs gzugs lta bu// de la rtog pas rnam par brtog/ rtog ce na rnam par myos 'gyur ba// bdag dang bdag
319a7(mdo sde): gis rnam rtog cing // yod dang med kyi rgyu sdo da pa'i// sa rnams la yang rnam rtog ste// 'gyur ba'i yongs su gyur pa dang // kun gzhi zab pa nyid dag kyang // blo chung rnams kyis mi
319a8(mdo sde): rig pas// sgyu ma'i ri dgas bzhin du 'khor// rang bzhin gcig min shes par dka'// lus can kun la 'dra ba ste// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // rtag tu sgyu ma'i ri dgas
319b1(mdo sde): 'dra// sems can gcig min shes pa dkara'// yod dang med par rnam par brtag/ rdul dang gtso bo skyes bu dang // mi gsal tshangs pa'ang de yin te// rtog pas 'khrul pa'i rtogs// 
319b2(mdo sde): can rnams// kun gzhi la ni rtag tu rtog/ sa rnams lta bur gnas pa la// sna tshogs sar yang de bzhin rtog/ sa la gang gis rtog gyur pa// yid ni kun nas rtog ces bya// 
319b3(mdo sde): ji ltar ri me mthen dman dang // rnam pa sna tshogs sprin gyi gzugs// 'ja' dang ri dgas sred byed dang // sprin sgra 'brug kyang ji bzhin te// rab rib can gyi phreng ba dang // bzang
319b4(mdo sde): me'i gdong yang de bzhin du// rmi lam dag ni rnam sna tsho/ dgas// dri za'i khang pa gnas rten dang // ro langs tshul shing rnams dang // brag cha sprin dang du ba dang // me long
319b5(mdo sde): mig la gzugs brnyan dang // chu la chu yi zla ba dang / rnam rtog 'di dang mang por yang // 'gro ba rnams ni kun gzhi rtog/ gang tshe kun gzhi 'di 'dra ba// rnam pa
319b6(mdo sde): sna tshogs kun mthong ste// 'gro ba rang sems mthong ba dang // de tshe sems ni phyir ldog go/ chos rnams thams cad kun gyi gzhi// bag chags snyems la sogs pa dang // rtog
319b7(mdo sde): pas rnyog pa can du byas// gzhan du gyur nas zag pa med// zag med dang lugs rab thob nas// de dag rtag cing brten par 'gyur// nam mkha' mya ngan 'das dang mnyam// 
319b8(mdo sde): 'gog dang 'dra ba de bzhin te// mnyam bzhag sems dang ldan pa la// mi zad chos rnams skye bar 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul bsam gtan rnam thar dang // ting nge 'dzin dang stobs
320a1(mdo sde): rnams dang // thabs dang stobs dang mngon shes dag/ 'bri med mi zed de bzhin te// nam mkha' zad kyi mthar snyegs shing // dbyings blo rnam shes rtag pa dang // mthar
320a2(mdo sde): phyin bcu yi gnas ldan zhing // yid bzhin shin tu brtan pa'i lus// rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor can// gzhan du gyur nas rab tu 'thob// 'jig pa mya ngan 'da' ma yin// 
320a3(mdo sde): sems can yod mini skye ba med// 'bri med gang bar med par yang // rgyal ba rnams kyis 'gro ba bshad// zhing gzhan rnams dang zhing 'di yi// chos nyid gcig tu zad pa ste// 
320a4(mdo sde): skyes par gyur tam ma skyes kyang // chos rnams chos nyi/ dang de bzhin gnas// rnal 'byor ldan pa grol ba la// / rtag med chad pa med pa ste// sems can khams
320a5(mdo sde): rnams zhig gyur na// thams cad mkhyen pa mi snang ngo // ma byon pa yi rgyal ba dang // 'das dang da ltar byung ba dag/ mnyam pa ma yin 'thun pa min// shes bya
320a6(mdo sde): zad nas de dag 'byung // bdud rnams tshar bcing log pa ste// brjod dang bcas dang brjod med kyang // de ste sems can 'jig ni ni// sdug bsngal sbubs las ma grol lo// lcags
320a7(mdo sde): kyi gar bu bsregs pa las// me las byung ste bsil gyur cing // lcags na rtag par 'dug pa bzhin// de ltar rnal 'byor can dag 'khod// phung po'i khyim dang nges 'byung ba'i// 
320a8(mdo sde): bag chags rnams kyang gyur pa dang // thub pa rnal 'byor brtson pa'i rnams// de dag rtag cing grol ba yin// rnam shes rnams ni dba' rlabs bzhin// kun gzhi mtsho las byung
320b1(mdo sde): ba ste// chos lnga'i rang bzhin rnam shes kyis// rab tu bskyod cing shin tu rgyu// gnas ngan len gyi spros pa yis// bcom pa gnas med don gyi gzugs// lta ba'i yul du rnam par
320b2(mdo sde): g.yo// de ltar shes nas phyir ldog ste// gzhan 'gyur mo zad rtag pa'i rnams// mgon po dag ni stug por 'dong // stug na gnas pa zla ba bzhin// rtag tu gzugs brnyan rnam
320b3(mdo sde): par mdzes// phung po stug pa kun gzhi ste// yid ni de la nye phan no// rnam par shes pa rtogs par byed// gzugs dang las la sogs pa'i rgyu// rnam shes lnga yi tshogs
320b4(mdo sde): rnams ni// dbang por bcas shing yul gzhol bas// / sna tshogs yid la 'dzin par byed// kun gzhi yu dal can ma yin no// tshe ni kun gzhi rnam shes te// yid
320b5(mdo sde): ni drod du rab tu gnas// yid kyi rnam shes de na ste/ lhag ma dbang po lngar yang gnas// sems dang yid dang rnam par shes// phung po'i dbus na rnam par
320b6(mdo sde): gnas// bag chags las dang 'brel pa'i rnams// sngan chad byas pa rnams kyis 'byung // 'dod chags sred las byung ba yi// las kyis byas pa byed pa ste// sngan chad
320b7(mdo sde): de dag las byas pas// rgyun tu las rnams byung ba yin// lus las lus ni gzhan la 'gro// 'pho ba srin bu pad pa bzhin// sems dang sems byung bcas pa'i rnams// 
320b8(mdo sde): rgyun chags par ni shin tu 'dong // yang zhing phung po'i tshogs rnams dang // rnam shes srid pa dog par yang // tshogs shing rab tu 'byung ba ni// las rnams shin tu 'byung
321a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir// tshe dang drod dang rnam shes 'dis// gang tshe lus ni bor gyur pa// de tshe lus ni dor ba ste// shing bzhin tshor ba med pa'o// sems ni kun gzhi rnam par shes/ 
321a2(mdo sde): ngar sems bdag nyid yid yin no// gang zhig yul la 'dzin byed pa// de ni rnam par shes zhes bya// sems ni las rnams sogs pa skye// yid ni khong du chud par byed// rnam
321a3(mdo sde): par shes pas rnam par rig/ lnga pos snang ba rtogs par byed// / bam po bzhi pa// lus ni sems kyis gzung ba yin// yid ni lam rgyud 'dod
321a4(mdo sde): pa ste// rnam par shes pas rnam par rig/ snang ba ga cod pa lnga po'o// rgyu la dmigs shing rnam shesarnams// skyes te gzhan ni de rjes 'brang // yid la
321a5(mdo sde): dmigs shing gzhan dag kyang // mthar chags su ni ra ba tu 'byung // yid rnyed nas kyang gzhan dag ni// dbang gi yon tan rnams kyis byas// dbang ni lnga dang
321a6(mdo sde): lhan cig tu// rnam par shes pa rab tu byed// 'du byed rgyu dang lhan cig tu// ro langs 'gro dang 'dra ba ste// smig rgyu dag ni gzugs dang mnyam// log pa ma yin bden pa
321a7(mdo sde): min// 'di ni bdag med spyod pa ste// sred pas kun tu drangs pa yin// 'byung rnams lhan cig 'byung ba dag/ thams cad dus yid lhan cig ste// sems byung yid ces bya ba
321a8(mdo sde): dang /  lhan cig rnam par shes pa 'byung // rnam shes lnga po de dag dang // yid kyi rnam shes ldan pa ni// gnas ngan len dang sred bsgres pa// rgyun mchid par rab tu 'byung
321b1(mdo sde): lus can kun gyi kun gzhi yang // sems dang sems byung ldan pa 'byung // kun gzhi rnyed nas de dag rgyu// rgyus nas rgyas par byed pa ste// sems rnams lam rgyud thams cad du// rtag par
321b2(mdo sde): gcig las gcig rgyas 'gyur// sa 'di rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rnam par shes pa rnams las 'byung // kun gzhi sna tshogs gzugs can ni// rnam shes rnams kyi gnas yin no// 
321b3(mdo sde): phan tshun rgyu yi stobs ldan pa// rnam shes 'khor lo 'khor ba ste// kun gzhi mtshe la dba' rlabs bzhin// sa bon dag dang myu gu'i rgyud// chu bo'i rgyun kyang mtshams med cing // 
321b4(mdo sde): rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung mod kyi// tha dadang bye brag dag kya dang snang // de bzhin rnam shes spyod pa ste// mtsham sa med pa yi rgyun tu yang // rgyun mi 'chad pa rab tu
321b5(mdo sde): 'byung // gsum dang ldan zhing gsum las yang // sems dang yid dang rnam shes rnams// bag chags sred pas bskyed pa dang // rang sems rnam par 'khrul
321b6(mdo sde): pa yis// dba' rlabs bzhin du rtag tu 'byung // chos rnams kun gyi 'byung ba dag/ phyi dang nang yang rnam bsgoms te// thub pa'i gnas kyang rnam bsgoms nas// mnyam par bzhag pa
321b7(mdo sde): stug por 'gro// rdo rje snying po khyod dang yang // rgyal sras 'dzegs med gzhan dag kyang // stug por 'jug par byed pa'i chos// thams cad chos kyang rab ston pa// rgyal ba
321b8(mdo sde): rnams dang rgyal sras rnams// thabs cig rab tu rnam dgongs te// chos kyi mtshan nyid dpe med pa// rmad du byung ba 'di bstan to// rdo rje snying po 'jigs med pa// rin chen sna
322a1(mdo sde): tshogs zla snying gi/ seng ge'i khri la rab 'dug ste// shes rab chen pos rnam bsgoms kyis// rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun bdar pa// stug po'i rgyal la rnam par
322a2(mdo sde): bsgoms// rnam par bsgoms nas rtag par 'di// rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor ston// zla dbang rgyal ba des bstan la// bag med par ni ma byed cig/ zla ba'i dpal gyi bcom ldan
322a3(mdo sde): 'das// sprul par bya ba mang sprul cing // 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsnyems bral dang // gzugs can rnams kyi gnas su yang // rgyal sras rnams kyis kun nas bskor// lha rnams
322a4(mdo sde): kyis kyang ma dun bdar cing // tshul gyi dam pa ston pa ni// 'jig med stug po'i rgyan yin no// rnal 'a dbyor can gyis spyod pa'i mchog/ tshul bzang rnal 'byor
322a5(mdo sde): spyod pa ste// so so rang rig shes pa yi// ting nge 'dzin dang bde ba rnams// yang dag mtha' la mi reg pa 8// rjes su myong bar byas nas kyang // rnal 'byor bde
322a6(mdo sde): los mngon langs shing // gcig la gcig ni phan tshun lnga// rnal 'byor spyod pa tshul dge 'di// gang gis shin tu mthong bar 'gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs 'os pa yi// stan gyi
322a7(mdo sde): mchog la 'khod pa'i rnams// kun kyang ngo mtshar rmad du rnyed// bsam gtan rnams kyi dgos pa dag/ rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams// kun kyang sems shing rab tu gam
322a8(mdo sde): stug po'i rgyan dang rgyal po la// lte ba mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnams// mgo ma cod pan thogs pa dag/ mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis// yan pa bris pa de dag kun// 
322b1(mdo sde): ba'i zhing nas 'ongs pa ste// g.yo ba rnams dang shin tu bral// thams cad gos bzang cha lugs mdzes// rnal 'byor spyod pa stobs chen te// lha'o rdo rje snying po la'o// rnam par
322b2(mdo sde): rtog dang rnam dpyod dang // chos la mos pa yang dag tu// mthong ste de nas de kun dang // phyogs rnams bzhi por lta byas te// 'dzum pa sngon du rab btang nas// 'jam zhing snyan
322b3(mdo sde): pa'i dbyangs su smras// rgyal sras mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnams// rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul// gang la rtog can mos 'gyur ba// de dag bdag las mnyan par gyis// / 
322b4(mdo sde): gang bsam gang gi ji lta bur// bsam gtan bsam bye// da dgos pa dag/ 'dod dang sdig pa rnams kyis dben// rnam par rtog bcas rnam dpyod bcas// dga'
322b5(mdo sde): bde dben las skyes par yang // bsam gtan dang po skye ba yi// de lta bu yi rims tshul du// bzhi dang / rgyad dang de bzhin bcu// mur 'dug bdag tu smra ba dang // 
322b6(mdo sde): bsam gtan can rnams bsam gtan byed// nyan thos theg pa can rnams dang // rang rgyal theg ldan de bzhin te// kun kyang rtag tu bsam gtan byed// chos rnam dang ni sa dag gI// 
322b7(mdo sde): rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang // phung po skye mched tshogs kyi rnams// 'di dag thams cad bdag med de// byed pa med cing g.yo ba med// gsum po 'dus las rab tu byung // 
322b8(mdo sde): 'khrul 'khor ro langs 'dra ba ste// byed pa rnams kyis rnam par spangs// thub pa phyi rol bsam gtan byed// stong par lta ba'i lta ba can// chos kyi mtshan la mos pa rnams/ 
323a1(mdo sde): chud gzon mtshan nyid ma yin te// phung po bdag med mkhas pa'i rnams// bsam gtan 'di 'drar bsam gtan byed// de bzhin gshegs kyi bsam gtan dag/ lha
323a2(mdo sde): rdzas bsod nams lta spyod pa// rnal 'byor can dang rgyal ba'i sras// mnyam bzhag rtag par bsam gtan byed// 'di dag thams cad sems tsam ste// mtshan can mtshan nyid
323a3(mdo sde): yod pa min// phung po rnams med bsam yod min// thams cad chos la mtshan nyid med// rdul phran rnam par gzhigs pa dang // de dag de ltar mi gnas so// rtog pa skyed pas brtags
323a4(mdo sde): pa ni// dngos po sa dang chu la sogs// dngos po'i rang bzhi na mi shes pas// mtshan nyid du yang rnam par rtog/ kha dog sdug dang mi sdug dang // kha dog slong gzhan de bzhin
323a5(mdo sde): te// 'ja' dang in dra go ba ltar// kha dog snang nga sprin lta bu 'i// sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra ba yis// thams cad 'gro ba kun bkang ste// rgyal ba'i skye mched ches bya bas/ 
323a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba rnams kyang rnams gzhigs te// rnal 'byor shes pa gzugs can gyis// lus la rtag tu gzugs kyang mthong // gang la dmigs te mnyam gzhag po// de la dmigs shing
323a7(mdo sde): rnam par ldang // gang dang gang la rnam rtog pa// de dang de ni dmigs pa yin// rnal 'byor can med rnal 'byor med// de ltar rnam par rtog pa ni// rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor nyid// 
323a8(mdo sde): kun gni se rnams thams cad dang // thub pa'i rnal 'byor bde la gnas// chos dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang // rtag tu rab tu rtogs byas shing // mnyam par bzhag pa'i khyad par
323b1(mdo sde): dag/ mnyam bzhag ldan pa rab tu ston// chos kyi rang bzhin rnam phye bas// rnal 'byor can gyi blo 'khrugs pa// blo gros zhan pas rab tu skye// chos dang bdag la 'dzin par 'gyur// yid ches
323b2(mdo sde): lung dang mi ldan par// chos rnams ston par byed pa ni// mtshan nyid rnam par rtog pa yis// bdag kyang chud zos gzhan chud gzon// mtshan nyid can med mtshan nyid med// 'dres pa'i phyir
323b3(mdo sde): na rnam par snang // dngar ba'i rnams ni 'khris pa sel// bad kan tshe skyar lan tshwas ste// ma zhu tsha ba'i rnam pa dang // lan tshwa la sogs rnam pas sel// 'khris pa bad kan 'khrugs pa la// 
323b4(mdo sde): rims rnams skye bar 'gyur ba dang // lus can rnams kyi wa sa yul du// 'dus pa rlung las byung ba dang // rim da sa dag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// thub pas bsdu ba byas
323b5(mdo sde): pa ni// khar lo sogs yan lag drug/ sha dang skal ma khA bdag/ tha dad mtshan gyis 'jig 'gyur ba// lus na rnams kyi rims kun to// rnam shes rnams ni kun gan
323b6(mdo sde): la ta phan tshun tha dad mi gnas te// gal te chos kyi rang bzhin nam// mtshan nyid gcig ni yod gyur ni// de che ches dang mtshan nyid la// mtshan nyid mi 'dra med par 'gyur// rdzas rnams
323b7(mdo sde): bsdus pas sel mi nus// mi yang sos par mi 'gyur ro// sos dang rnam par bsal ba 'di// mkhas pa rnams kyis mthong ba ste// gzhan du kun gzhi rnam shes pa// rnam pa mang
323b8(mdo sde): por gnas pa ste// sgyu ma'i ri dgas bzhin 'khor ba// rnal 'byor brtson pas brtags pa yin// mtshan med mtshan can med pa ste// phung po rnams las phung po can// gzhan med
324a1(mdo sde): yan lag nyid lag las// yan lag can med yan lag la// 'jig rten rgyu yis ma byas te// 'bras bu rnams la rgyu yang med// 'jig rten rdul phran bsags pa min// 
324a2(mdo sde): phyogs dang gnas su mi 'gro'o// de dag sor gnyis sor gsum du// ci yang rtson par mi byed de// dngos po yod pa phrad pa'i phyir// rdul phran thams cad 'dra bar 'dong // de tshe yon
324a3(mdo sde): tan khyad yod pa// yon tan rnams kyis yon tan du// 'jig rten ma byas rang bzhin gyis// 'jig rten rkyen las ma byung ste// 'dod rgyal dngos kyis de bzhin min// chos gsum
324a4(mdo sde): pas kyang ma byas te// bag chags rnams kyis dkrug das pa'i sems// rnam par rtog pa mang pos gnas// / snying gi phyogs na gnas pa yi// lus can kun gyi kun
324a5(mdo sde): gzhi dang // sems dang yid dang rnam shes rnams/ 'gro ba dag gis sna tshogs brtags// 'gro ba ma lwa/ sa rab mnan te// sgyu ma'i ri dgas bzhin du gnas/ 
324a6(mdo sde): sems can du ni 'jug pa las// gzhan du yongs su gnas 'pho ste// sa la snying zhes brjod par bya// sems ni dngos po'i tshul du gnas// rje la sogs pa'i yul med de/ 
324a7(mdo sde): sems ni rdza ma lta bu'o// sa la gzugs rnams yod pa dang // lha yul gnas pa'i khyim rnams kyang // rnam pa sna tshogs gang snang ba// de dag kun gzhi snang ba yin// kun gni
324a8(mdo sde): kun tu lag pa ste// kun tu kha mig mgo bo yang // cig car ram 'am rims kyis kyang // sa rnams yog par rab tu gnas// bus pa rnam par mos byed de// gang gis snyang
324b1(mdo sde): la gang gnas pa// de ni de la gnyis tshul du// lus kun bkang ste rab tu gnas// skyong min dngos po gang yang med// thos pas ji ltar rdza bzhin du// dngos po gang la gnol
324b2(mdo sde): ba'i// dngos po dngos su yod pa min// de ste stong pa'i dngos yod na// 'jigs med ma yin gzhig par 'gyur// gzhig bya gzhig par byed pa gang // de ni rnam par rtog pas
324b3(mdo sde): brtags// ri rab ri bo tsam gyur pa'i// bdag tu lta ba mi gnod kyi// stong nyid lta gnod pa ni// nga rgyal mi bden brtags pa'o// rnal 'byor spyod pas stong pa nyid// gnas ma
324b4(mdo sde): yin par sbyar mi bya// gnas min gal te sbyar gyur na// // bdud rtsi drug tu 'gyur ba yin// lta ba ji snyed gang yang rung // lus con rnams la yod pa yi// lta ba
324b5(mdo sde): ba rnam par spangs pa'i phyir// stong pa nyid kyi tshul bstan to// stong pa nyid kyi lta thos kyang // la la'i/ bam zhig na// gsor mi rung ba'i lta can te// sman
324b6(mdo sde): bas btang ba'i nad pa bzhin// ji ltar bsreg pa tshig pa'i me// bsreg pa med pas mi gnas so// de bzhin bsreg bya lta tshig na// stong nyid me yang 'gag par 'gyur// lta
324b7(mdo sde): bas 'gog pa'i dus su yang // ye shes yang dag mi 'byung ste// nyon mongs thams cad bsreg par byed// nyon mongs bsregs nas rnam par mdzes// thub pa rnal 'byor
324b8(mdo sde): ldan pa'i rnams// ye shes 'di ldan thub spyod dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas kyi mchog/ srog po der ni rab tu 'ding // ri bong rwa yis ri bong rnams// mngon par
325a1(mdo sde): gzhig pa ma mthong ste// 'di la mo sham bu yis kyang // srog chags gang yang gsad pa med// ri bong rwa'i gnu yis kyang // su yang 'thab mo mi byed de// 
325a2(mdo sde): mo sham bu la su yang rung // khyim gyi las su mi ske'o// stong pa nyid dang mi rtag nyid// rtag tu dngos dang gcig gyur te// yod dang med pa'i rang bzhin yang // de bzhin gcig
325a3(mdo sde): pa nyid du gyur// mngal nA gnas dus tshun chad kyang // gzugs rnams gcig par brtson pa ste// gang na'ang de med gzugs yod min// gzugs med par yang de med de// 
325a4(mdo sde): khyad par med par 'byung ba ni// ma bsgribs zla dang 'od ze ra bzhin// de bzhin dngos rnams stong nyid dang // lhan cig gcig tu 'byung ba ste// phan tshun rnams pa
325a5(mdo sde): tha dad du// de dag dgos pa mi sgrub bo// rgyu dang rkyen rna mas tshogs pa las// rnal 'byor can gyis la sa bsgrub po// lus 'di dag yod ma yin te// ro langs
325a6(mdo sde): 'khrul 'khor 'dra ba ni// sred po'i srad bus bcing byas shing // yul gyi rnams kyis drang ba yin// lha rdzas stong pa nyid bshad pa// lta ba thams cad sbyong ba ste/ 
325a7(mdo sde): mtha' rgal stong pa nyid lta ba// rgyal ba'i rnams kyis lta med bshad// stong nyid lta ba stong pa ni// yod dang med pa gzhig pa'i phyir// blo ldan mnyam par bzhag pa yi// 
325a8(mdo sde): rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsgom// rtsa dang shing dang gyo mo dag/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos rgyur byas te// sngags kyis ci dang cir 'dod par// gzugs kyi dngos su rab tu
325b1(mdo sde): byed/ gzugs dang snang ba yid byed dang // sred dang mig rnams sbyar byas shing // mig gi rnam shes sgyu ma bzhin// smig rgyu bzhin du de g.yo'o// gang gi yul du'ang 'ong ba med// yul
325b2(mdo sde): gzhan dag tu'ang 'gro ba min// 'di lta'i rnam shes 'byung ba la// yod dang med par brtag mi bya// skra'i tshigs dang bong bu'i rwa// mo sham bu dang smig rgyu dang // dri za'i grong khyer rmi
325b3(mdo sde): lam dang // ming du grag gi yod pa min// stag dang gzigs dang dom drag dang // rnga rta bong bu khyi rnams dang // dbyi dang mche dang ru sbal la// rwa ni yod pa ma yin na// thub pa
325b4(mdo sde): rtsod par brtson pa yis// de dag ci phyir mi brtag cing // khong bu'i rwa la brtag par bya// dzaM go de dag sgrub nus sam// shes rab can gyis sar bstan pa// de da
325b5(mdo sde): tshe brtag par bya// rtog pa can rnams 'khor ba ni// blun po 'on pa long ba 'dra// sgrol ba'i ye shes de la med// so so rang rig yul yang med// gzhan gyis byas
325b6(mdo sde): pa'i tshul dag la// rnam par rtog pas ci zhig nus// stug por gnas par rnam par rtogs// de la brtags shing shing dge 'thob// rnal 'byor mnyam bzhag rnal 'byor ci na// 
325b7(mdo sde): de na gnas pa bzhin du snang // lha yul gnas pa'i snyems bral dang // zla ba gza' la sogs pa yang // rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa'i rnams// ri rab brten cing rgyu ba yin// 
325b8(mdo sde): de bzhin rnam par shes pa bdun// bag chags rnams dang ldan pa yi// kun gzhi kun gyis bon can// de la rten cing rab tu rgyu// ji ltar sa las kun brten cing // sa skye kun kyang
326a1(mdo sde): 'byung ba bzhin// sems can kun gyi gnas yin te// 'byung krung kun gyi khyad par du// de bzhin kun gni rnam shes kyang // rnam shes rnams kyi gnas yin te/ 
326a2(mdo sde): sems dang sems las byung bar ldan// dba' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung // ji ltar rma bya'i 'dab sgo rnams// 'od dang kha dog rnam mang ste// gtsug pud can rnams 'dab sgo yis// 
326a3(mdo sde): rma bya mo dang longs rtse ba// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // sa bon mang can mtshe ltar gnas// thams cad chos kyi gzhi yin te// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong // ji ltar
326a4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chu bo yis// nyin gcig bzhin du dgang bya yang // chu bo rnams ni rgyun mi chad// rgya mtsho rtog par yod mi byed// de bzhin kun ga ni rnam shes kyang // zab cing / 
326a5(mdo sde): mtsho ltar gnas pa ste// rnam shes rnams kyis nyin gci/ ga bzhin// bag chags chu bos rab tu gang // ji lta/ ra rin chen ldan pa yis// sna tshogs kun tu phan 'dog
326a6(mdo sde): te/ sems can rnams kyang nye bar 'tshe// yon tan dngos su ston pa yin// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // rnam rtog rnams dang lhan cig 'byung // de ni 'khor ba 'phel byed de/ 
326a7(mdo sde): gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs bcu can// spyod pa lags bshad gtsang ba de// sa bcu pa las mngon 'byung ste// bde bar gshegs pa'i
326a8(mdo sde): sar zhugs nas// yang dag mtha' la rab gnas pa// sna tshogs sems can rnams sprul par// 'jig pa med par 'byung ba ni// rnam par rtog med sa bzhin no// sos ka/ 
326b1(mdo sde): me tog mang po gzugs// mi dang bya yi yid du 'ong // de bzhin sna tshogs len pa'i sems// thub shes yid 'ong myos par byed// ji ltar don mkhas rgyal ba'i sras// 'byung las
326b2(mdo sde): byung ba ma yin pa// med pa'i blo can de bzhin te// log par smra la brtson pa dag/ chos dang mi mthun phra ma can// lce gnyis log par lta ba dag/ rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa'i
326b3(mdo sde): dngos// rnam pa gzhan du ston par byed// ji ltar sgyu ma'i skyes bu zhig/ 'bras bu sna tshogs ston byed pa// 'bras bu me tog de na med// sngags dang khong gzos zo mdog bde// 
326b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten rnam pa gzhan gnas pa// rnam pa go zhan du ston par byed// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i sra das// kun kyang thebs kyi dmigs la mkhas// bstan
326b5(mdo sde): pa gzhan la ji snyed du// bstan pa byas pa de dag kun// bde gshegs rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis// ba snyan pa stug po'i rgyan la bstan// khams rnams
326b6(mdo sde): drug dang bco brgyad dang // skye mche bcu dang gnyis kyi mi// yid kyi srad bus btags pa dag/ sems can kun tu rab tu 'khor// rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi tshogs// 
326b7(mdo sde): khams dang skye mched phung po ste// yid kyi srad bus bcing byas shing // lus dang lus la rab tu rgyu// 'di ni 'gro ba'i skyes bu ste// 'gro ba rnams kyi don tu bstan// lus
326b8(mdo sde): can kun gyi skyes bu ni// 'gro yang 'byung ba ma yin te// khams rnams drug po skyes bu yin// skye mched bcu gnyis de bzhin te// bco brgyad rnams la yid rgyu ba// 
327a1(mdo sde): dbang sgyur zhes ni bya ba ste// dbang sgyur pho brang sna tshogs pa// nor bu rin chen grong rdal dang // dga' ldan la sogs bsnyems bral dang // mtshe ma'i gnas
327a2(mdo sde): su'ang de bzhin bshad// rdo rje snying po dbang can la// rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams// dge'o dag shes dga' 'bod cing // thams cad mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// 
327a3(mdo sde): thub ldan rnal 'byor sprod pa dang // rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras// zhing dang zhing na bzhugs pa dang // lha yul gnas pa'i rgyal sras dang // rnal 'byor bdag po rnal
327a4(mdo sde): 'byor can// yo shes dbang po 'phrul chen dang // dbyang sgyur lha mo'i tshigs rnams kyang // thal mo sbyar te/ dganas par gyur// phan tshun gcig la gcig lta zhing / 
327a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras la smra ba ni// 'gro ba'i lha rdzas skyes bu yang // mur 'dug bdag smra spangs pa ste// thub can kun gyi skas bu ni// thub pa'i khyu mchog khyod
327a6(mdo sde): kyis bstan// 'das dang da ltar byung ba yis// sngon byas ma byas thob pa ni// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis// khams drug skyes bu dge ba'o// ji ltar mkha' la
327a7(mdo sde): bya rjes rnams// rnam par bzhag pa de bzhin du// sems tshogs ldan pa'i khams kyi rnams// gtan tshigs bcas pa rab tu bston// ji ltar shing las ma dag gis// 
327a8(mdo sde): mi lce gnam du gnas par 'gyur// bsreg pa gzhan ni ma rnyed cing // klung gis bab na gtan mi 'bar// bya rjes rnam par bzhag pa ni// mkha' la gnas par mi snang ste/ 
327b1(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'khor ba yi// 'gro ba'i skyes bu snang ba yin// bya rnams rkang pas mi 'dod pa// de dag sgro yi shugs kyi 'dong // bya'i rjes dang 'dra ba ni// skyes bu'i sgo
327b2(mdo sde): nas rab tu bstan// las kyi skyes bu bstan pa ni// 'khor na rtag tu 'khor ba ste// bde dang sdug bsngal myong byed pa// byas pa'i las ni chud mi za// ji ltar zhing ba rnams kyi las// 
327b3(mdo sde): 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur to// don dang ldan pa de dag ni// gzhan yang 'ong zhes rmo ba med// lha rjes 'gro ba'i skyes bu ni// rnal 'byor can la rnal 'byor ston// lus can kun
327b4(mdo sde): kyi nang na zhing // de ni dge ba'i las byed do// 'di dang phyi/ ma'i bde ba dang // lha yul gnas pa'i gnas mthong nga zhing // 'khor las sangs rgyas rgyus 'gyur ba'i/ 
327b5(mdo sde): bsod nams rnams ni rtag tu byed// thar dang pha rol phyi na rnams dang // sangs rgyas bsam gtan spyod yu la kun// 'gro ba'i skyes bu med na ni// kun kyang 'bras
327b6(mdo sde): bu med par 'gyur// lha yi bde ba thams cad dang // dbang sgyur rnams kyi 'bras bu dang // de bzhin nyid mthong thub pa yi// rnal 'byor rnams kyang med par 'gyur// las dang
327b7(mdo sde): las kyi 'bras bu mthong // las rnams don med ma yin te// 'dod 'bod la sogs pa dang // mnar med mtha' dang lha rnams kyi// lam gyi rgyud kyang yod pa yin// 'gro
327b8(mdo sde): ba'i skyes bu de yod na// srid pa'i 'khor los 'khor bar 'gyur// 'khor dang bral na thar pa ste// blo zhan rnams kyis mi shes so// 'jug pa'i skyes bu med na ni// 
328a1(mdo sde): mo sham bu yang 'gro bar 'gyur// bong bu'i rwa yang rnor 'gyur te// bye ma las kyang til mar 'byung // phyi dang nang gi sa rnams ni// phan tshun stebs kyis
328a2(mdo sde): byung ba ste// gang dang gang du 'dra ba dag/ de dang de dag 'grogs pa yin// lha dang lha yi bu mo'i tshogs// dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang // dri za grub pa'i rgyal po dang / 
328a3(mdo sde): sngags 'chang chung ma'i tshogs rnams dang // thub la mchod par 'os pa yis// rdo rje snying po sras bcas la// mchod de gsol ba 'debs byed pa// thams cad dga'o dag
328a4(mdo sde): ba shes smra// nyams pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul// de rgyu dang dpe yis rgyan pa ni// gzhan gyi rgol ba 'jo mas pa ste// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan// 
328a5(mdo sde): 'gab gzungs ltag chod tshar gcod pa// bdag gi phyogs kyi yon tan ston// shes rab can gyis ba stan du gsol// 'gro ba 'di dag nyan par 'gyur// 
328a6(mdo sde): ji snyed rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang // lha yi rgyal po kun kyang nyon// shin tu dka' ba'i bsam yas rgyu// brtag 'das rtog dang bral ba yi// rgyu dang dpe'i me tog ste// 
328a7(mdo sde): rnal 'byor rnams kyi thub dge ba// stug po'i rgyan ni bshad par bya// de ni thub la rnal 'byor ston// stug po'i rgyan de sna tshogs te// stug na smod pa'i thub pa yi// sangs
328a8(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyi gnas kyi mchog/ thub pa kun gyi dam pa'o// sau stengs thub pa'i dru ma la// rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa// rtag par dru ma khyod kyis kyang // chos kyi
328b1(mdo sde): dngos nyid shes par gyis// dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ci// dngos su stong ngam rtag pa zhes// 'di 'dra'i lha dang ldan pa yi// thub pa'i rnal 'byor mi 'khrul lo// chos pa
328b2(mdo sde): gcig pu rtogs pa yis// tshos par mngon du shes pa ste// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin yang // dngos po gcig gis shes par 'gyur// ji ltar ji bzhin bsrabs pa'i
328b3(mdo sde): zho// sor mo'i rtse mos mngon shes pa// de bzhin dngos po thams cad kyi// rang bzhin dngos pos shes par 'gyur// dngos po ji med stong pa nyid// dngos po dngos por
328b4(mdo sde): yod pa'ang med// 'di dag kun gzhi'i rnam pa ste// stong nyid kun gzhi rnam pa'o// rgyal sras dru ma 'ji dgas med pas// rdo rje'i snying po de la smras// lus
328b5(mdo sde): can rnams kyi khams kyi mi// ji lta bur na sems ca ma 'gyur// 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas shing // 'byung las byung ba ji lta bur// g.yo ga sher cha dang
328b6(mdo sde): sra ba yi// khams rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyal sras rdo rje snying po yis// dru mi'i bdag po'i tshig thob nas// mi 'am ci bdag khyod dge ste// khyod ni dge'o yang
328b7(mdo sde): dge'o// rnal 'byor tsan gyi snying po'i mchog/ yid 'ongs byed pa gang dris pa// sems ni skyes bu'i lus can la// khams rnams skye 'gyur ji lta zhes// de phyir dbang sgyur
328b8(mdo sde): rgyal sras la// de ni dge bar bshad par bya// de bas mi 'am ci yi bdag/ pi wang slob dpon bdag la nyon// ji ltar mi 'am ci yi bdag/ khyod dang mi 'am mang bcis
329a1(mdo sde): / pa/ nabasnyems bral mang po sna tshogs kyis// nam mkha' las ni rab 'dong zhing // rgyal ba nyan thos tshogs 'khor du// pi wang sgra dbyangs snyan blangs pas// thub pa
329a2(mdo sde): dru ma ltos shig ces// phan tshun gcig la gcig kyang gsung // bsnyems bral mang po sna tshogs na// mi 'am ci dang 'grogs rtse zhing // pi bang bai DU n+yas smras pa// len cing mkha' las
329a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i tshe// pi wang yid 'ong shin tu snyan// dbyangs kyis yongs su sbyangs pa ste// mi 'am ci'i bdag po yis// rab tu blangs par byas pa'i tshe// nyan thos rnams kyang gar byed
329a4(mdo sde): de/ nyan thos de dag gyur pa de// rgyal sras rnams kyi sa mthong ba dang // 'od srung rnal 'byor bzang can dang / nga // lha'i cod pan gyis smras pa// rnam rtog med pa'i sgra
329a5(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi// pi wang sgra ni bsgrags pa yis// 'dod chags bral ba ci phyir gyur// 'od srungs khyod kyis nged la ston// rgyal sras stobs chen myur rlung bzhin/ 
329a6(mdo sde): ri dgas rnams dang 'dra ba ni// nyan thos g.yo ba'i blo can rnams// bag chags 'dam gyi dri ma can// nyon mongs rnam rtog byung bas mnar // yang dag sangs rgyas sku rnyed nas
329a7(mdo sde): bag chags dri ma yongs bsal te// bdag med gnyis kyis yongs dag cing // shes bya sgrib pa'i dri med na// sems kyi khams las gzhan 'gyur ba'i// de bzhin gshegs
329a8(mdo sde): pa rab tu 'gyur// khyod ni dbang can phra yul ldan// shes rgya che zhing gtsug lag mkhas// dbang po 'jig rten byol ba yi// gtsug lag mtshan la khyod gnas te// mi 'am
329b1(mdo sde): ci yi gtsug lag kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor dag/ sa'i mtshan nyid mkhas bya la// bslabs te zla ba bzhin gnas pa// mi 'am ci'i dbang po khyod// sa dang zhing rnams
329b2(mdo sde): bye bar mdzes// khyod ni de ltar rnam mdzes shing // thub can dbang sgyur tshogs dbus su// khams kyi sems las skyes pa mi// kho bo la ni sras kyis dris// mnyam sems
329b3(mdo sde): mnyam par bzhag pa yis// thams cad lhan cig mnyam par gyis// khams rnams gang du ci tshul gang // sems su grags pa'i skyes bu la// rgyu rnams gang gis 'byung
329b4(mdo sde): ba yi// de tshul bdag gis bstan par bya// chu ni rla na rnams bskrad par byed// drod ni ma'o sra ba sa// ba deg la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams// rlung gi khams kyis
329b5(mdo sde): kun nas rtsom// gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshams ni// nam ka kun nas rtsom par byed// rnam shes sna tshogs yul can ni// bag chags rnams kyis rab tu
329b6(mdo sde): bskyed// srid kyi mtshams dang mig dag gi/ skye ba'i sgo rnams byed pa ni// gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs kun te// rgyal po mtshan ni rnam pa mang // nor bu rin chen sna tshogs
329b7(mdo sde): gnas/ dbang sgyur pho brang bzang po na// rnal 'byor ldan chen shugs 'dzin pa// rgyal sras rnams kyis mdun bdar cing // so so'i stan las kun langs te// yang dang yang
329b8(mdo sde): zhing phyag 'tsha la nas// rim gror rdo rje'i snying po la// mchod pa'i dam pas mchod pa byed// rin chen dra bas steng bkab cing // yang dang yang du gsol ba byed// dge'o// 
330a1(mdo sde): dge'o yang dag ste// dge ba ldan la rab gnas shing // chos kyi sprin gyi tshul rnyed nas// sangs rgyas sa la rab zhugs te// dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras rnams la/ 
330a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yul rnams rab tu bstan// rgyal po lha mo bcas pa yis// de nas yang du mchod byas te// rnal 'byor che can dge'i dge/ rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med pa// lha rdzas
330a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yis// chos de bdag la bstan pas na// nor bu rin chen sna tshogs gnas// bkra shis gtsang bar rab tu byas// thub ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ 
330a4(mdo sde): blo gros chen po byams pa dang // blo gros mi zad mthu che ngan dang // 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lha yi cod pa na rnal 'byor bdag/ shugs 'dzin dru ma
330a5(mdo sde): blo gros dang // gzungs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang // rin chen bcug bud 'phrul can dang // yang dag ji/ bzhin mthong ba dang // mtshe ma'i rab dang 'gro
330a6(mdo sde): 'dzin dang // rnal 'byor slob dpon rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor can la sems ston pa// thub pa thams cad don 'grub pa// thub sras 'jigs pa med pa rnams// 'di
330a7(mdo sde): dag gzhan yang mang po ste// rgyal ba'i sras po 'phral chen rnams// so so'i sten las kun langs nas// de dag gcig la gcig bltas ste// rdo rje snying po de la smras
330a8(mdo sde): pa/ chos kyi tshul ni bstan par gyis// khyod ni rgyal dbang byin gyis brlabs// rgyal sras rnams kyis rab tu mchod// sa yi mtshan la mkhas pa yang // khyod la thams cad
330b1(mdo sde): shin tu gnas// khyod la gsol ba 'debs pa ni// rgyal sras stobs chen thams cad dang // rnal 'byor can dang rnal 'byor bdag/ sngags 'chang bud med thams cad do// rgyal ba
330b2(mdo sde): rnams dang rgyal sras dang // 'jig rten rnams kyi ngo mtshar bzhi// mdo sde kun gyis dri med cing // bstan dang klag pa rnam spangs pa// stug po'i rgyan 'di bstan pa'i phyir// 
330b3(mdo sde): rnal 'byor bdag khyod spobs par gyis// sprul pas bshad pa spangs pa ste// de bzhin gtam dang sprul pas kyang // zag pa med pa chos kyi dbyings// so so rang rig spyod pa'i
330b4(mdo sde): yul tA lha sras mthong ba'i chos la bde// 'o phags pa/ rnams la de ston cig/ phung po lhag ma ma lu sna par// 'grol ba'i chos kyi dbyings ston cig/ ting
330b5(mdo sde): nge 'dzin dang gzugs kyi rnams// rnam par thar dang du khang rnams dang // yid bzhin rnam pa bcu po yi// / lus kyi tshogs kyang bstan par gyis// sangs
330b6(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyi bsam yas dang // mgon po rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras kyi// rdul phran bzhin gyi sku phra dang // skra rtse brgya char phra ba dag/ rgyal
330b7(mdo sde): sras khyod kyis bshad par gyis// bstan dang klag dang rnam bral zhing // brjod pas rnam par spangs pa yi// stug po zhing gi dam pa der// ci nas thub pa 'dod pa'i phyir
330b8(mdo sde): rnal 'byor mkhas pas seng ge ltar// thub pa de dag kun bltas te// 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad la// brtag par mi nus brtag bral ba'i// chos tshul rab tu
331a1(mdo sde): bstan par bya// blo yi mthu yang kun brtags na// rnal 'byor can dag chos kyi tshug/ sngon gyi gzhung lugs nyan nus pas// tshangs pa'i sgra dang dbyangs su ste// 
331a2(mdo sde): ka la bing ka'i sgra skad du// rgyal chen lce yis rab snyan par// rdo rje snying pos shin tu bshad// seng ge ro stod lus 'chang ba// mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // dpe/ 
331a3(mdo sde): byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus// rdo rje'i snying pos shin tu bstan// kim ka'i sgra la mkhas pas na// sgra yi mtshan nyid grags pa yis// mdor na de yi nyis gyur du/ 
331a4(mdo sde): rgyal sras de ni shin tu ston// sang sang dag la dbyangs la sogs// mthong zhing ring ba'i sgra skad dang // ga na de ra dang ran ldan par// rgyal ba'i sras pas
331a5(mdo sde): rab tu bstan// ri sha pa dang de pa ta// shardza ke shau lnga/ po yi// sgra skad mtshan nyid ldan pa yi// dbyangs/ kyi thub pa rnam par gsung // ring dang dal med pa
331a6(mdo sde): yi tshig/ zab cing snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs ste// mtshan nyid mkhas dang dri za la// de bzhin sim par byed pa yi// tshig gi yon tan ldan pa'i tshig/ rdo rje snying pos brjod pa ni// 
331a7(mdo sde): lhun gyis grub par byas pa ste// sprul pa'i bzhin du 'byung ba yin// thub sras rdo rje'i snying po ni// ci'ang brjod par mi byed par// thams cad yan lag mtshan gyi sgra// yan
331a8(mdo sde): lag rnams las mngon par 'byung // smin ma dpral ba'i spyi bo dang // phrag pa sna rtse byin pa las// chos kyi tshul rnams rab ston cing // dge ba'i sgra rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// 
331b1(mdo sde): rdo rje snying po thub pa yi// smon lam legs las byung ba ste// bre mo'i ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin// rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun nas 'dus// dbang sgyur pho brang bzang po na// thams cad
331b2(mdo sde): gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin// dpa' chen rdo rje'i snying po de// rnam par mdzes la kun lta'o// skar ma'i dbang po skar ma yis// gza' yi dbus na mdzes pa bzhin// rdo rje'i snying
331b3(mdo sde): po rnal 'byor can// dam pa'i stan la rnam par mdzes// ji ltar skar ma'i dbang po dang / zla ba'i 'od du bye brag med// de bzhin rdo rje'i snying po dang // rgyal ba'i rnams su khyad par med// yang dag
331b4(mdo sde): ji bzhin don mthong ba'i// rgyal ba'i sras po stobs po che// / rnal 'byor can dang thub pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byo/ dar spyod pa'i lam gnas pa// stan las legs par
331b5(mdo sde): ldang byas shing // rgyal sras rnams la mngon bltas na sa// tshig dge rnam par smras pa ni// kye ma thegache ni theg pa ni// sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam mi
331b6(mdo sde): khyab/ de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang // rgyal ba bsam gyis mi khyab ston// bye ba'i zhing bzhugs rgyal ba dang // rgyal sras de dag thams cad kyang // dri me bsam gyis mi
331b7(mdo sde): khyab chos// dgongs pas phyag bya 'os pa yin// theg pa chen po'i tshul dag ni// mchog tu 'phra zhing dkon pa ste// gzhan du gyur pa'i tshul gyi mchog/ rtog pa can gyi yul
331b8(mdo sde): ma yin// rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi yul// rang bzhin rnams la khyad par byed// bdag med nyid ni lnga po yi// de bzhin khyad par byed pas na// bag chags spros pas
332a1(mdo sde): 'phangs pa de// yun ring gnas ngan len pa dang // sems dang sems las byung ldan zhing // rnam shes rnams las rab tu byung // lha rdzas tshul 'di mthong ba
332a2(mdo sde): dang / rtagaser bzhin rnam par byang bar 'gyur// rnam dag rigs la gnas pa dag/ sangs rgyas rigs su de dag 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas rigs// mur
332a3(mdo sde): 'dug nyan thos rnam spangs pa// thob nas sangs rgyas zhing gi mchog/ stug po de bzhin 'dong bar 'gyur// ting 'dzin 'di yi yul ni gang // ting 'dzin 'di yi ming yang ci// 
332a4(mdo sde): rdo rje snying pos gang thob phyir// tshul dge 'di ni ston dpar gyur// rdo rje'i snying po'i rkang gnyis la// thub dpa'i rnams kyis phyag byas nas// rdo rje snying po 'jig
332a5(mdo sde): med kyi// rdo rje'i blo la bshad par mdzod// ting 'ju na yul ni gang zhig yin// ting 'dzin 'di yi ming yang ci// 
332a6(mdo sde): gang lnga gnas shing tshul 'di yang // rgyal sras khyod ni bshad pa mdzod// rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod// dbang sgyur bdag kyang de bzhin no// rdo rje snying po 'jigs
332a7(mdo sde): med kyis// 'khor du 'dus pa thams cad dang // tshul 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dang // rgyal ba'i sras kyi mthu stobs dang // blo rol 'dzin pa'i mthu kun dang // nus sam mi
332a8(mdo sde): nus zhes bltas nas// blo 'dzin mthu ldan mthong ba dang // rgyal sras thams cad mthu ldan gyis// thams cad ma 'gyur mnyan par gyis// gzhan du gyur pa'i tshul dag
332b1(mdo sde): pa dbang sgyur lha yul gnas pa dang // thub pa rnams las bshad par bya// theg pa chen po 'od can gyi// ting 'dzin yul ni 'di yin te// de la gnas shing rgyal sras rnams// tshul rab
332b2(mdo sde): du ni ston par byed// bye ba'i zhing rnams rab tu mthong // de dga' mgon pa de bzhin no// rdul gyi mtha' mar thug pa'i rnams// de dag rang bzhin las ston to// dge'o dge zhes rab tu
332b3(mdo sde): gsungs// 'di ni rnal 'byor bzang ldan lam// lam 'dis nged rnams thams cad kyang // ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba// thob nas sangs rgyas dri med gyur// gang yang sangs rgyas ting 'dzin
332b4(mdo sde): skyes theg pa chen po snang ba yi// ting nge 'dzin gyi phra sem das pa// de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang // rgyal ba ba das ma yas spyod yul can// sprul pa bye ba mang po yis/ 
332b5(mdo sde): so so rang rig spyod yul gyi// ting 'dzin sangs rgyas mthong / ba ni// shin tu phra ba'i rdul snyed do// so so rang gis rig tshul ni// gang la sangs rgyas gnas pa yin// chos 'di
332b6(mdo sde): mtshan ma med po ste// sgra dang gzugs kyis rnam par spangs// ming ni mtshan mas bskyed pa yin// mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste// rnam par rtog pa gnyis las skyes// chos rnams kyi ni de
332b7(mdo sde): bzhin nyid// de ni yang dge gsungs mthong ba// de yi ye shes yang dag mtshan// rang bzhon brtags pa ming yin te// mtshan ma gzhan gyi dbang las byung // ming dang mtshan ma med pa na// rang
332b8(mdo sde): bzhin don gyi dam pa ni// thams cad lus la kun nas gnas// kun gzhi de phyir 'byung ba ste// bag chags rnams kyi ri khrod gnas// yid kyi gnas ngan len gyis g.yogs// yid kyi rnam
333a1(mdo sde): / shes spyod pa yis// yid ni phyin phyogs rgyas par byas// rnam shes lnga po yul can dag/ 'byung ning phyir yang ldog pa yin// rnam shes lnga yi yul rnams ni// sems can bzhin gnas
333a2(mdo sde): lus can la// kun gzhir grogs pa'i chu klung las// dba' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung // rnam shes kun gzhir mchor gnas pa// bag chags rnams kyis brnyogs pa'i rnams// yul gyi rlung gis
333a3(mdo sde): bskyod pa dag/ rnam par rgyun chad med par 'gyur// chos la bdag med mkhas pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras// bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas 'thob ste// mngon sangs rgyas zhing
333a4(mdo sde): chos ston to// phung po gang zag bdag med par// rab tu rnam phye mthong gyur cing // chos kyi dngos yod ma bshigs pa/ ra// nyan thos de dag mngon rtogs 'gyur// bdag med gnyis
333a5(mdo sde): la mkhas pa nyid// rgyal ba'i sras rnams sgom par byed// rnam par bsgoms shing spong ba ni// tshul bshad bzhi na du yang dag mtha'// yang dag mtha' yi bde myong zhing / 
333a6(mdo sde): snying rje med pa'i sras rnams ni// sems can dgos pa'i rgyun gcad pas// de dag sangs rgyas mi 'thob bo// bsam yas kye bo ye shes 'di// sems can rnams kyi bde ba skyed// mkhyen cing
333a7(mdo sde): rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams// blo chung rnams la tshul ston to// ji ltar 'dam las byung ba yi// dge ba'i mtshan ldan pad+mo dag/ thub pa rnams dang lha dag gi/ nye ba'i longs spyod rgyu yin no// de/ 
333a8(mdo sde): bzhin 'khor ba'i 'dam mtsho las// rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'byung ba ni// sangs rgyas dri med rab rnyed cing // lha la yid du 'ong ba yin// byang chub sems dpa' mi rnams dang // lha yi khrod du/ 
333b1(mdo sde): khyad par du// rgyal po'i khyu mchog 'gyur ba ste// 'khor lo can du'o khyad par du// lha yul gnas pa'i bdag po dang // dri rnams kyi yang de bzhin te// theg chen yon tan ldan pa yi// lus can
333b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis rtag tu 'thob// de phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis// theg pa che la brtson par gyis// mthar gyis bder gshegs gnas rab dang // rgyal po rtag tu'ang 'gyur bar 'ong // kun nas nyon
333b3(mdo sde): mongs chos rnams dang // rnam par byang ba'i yod pa kun// rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi// sa la kun gzhi 'byung ba yin// spyi dang rgyu rnams lhan cig gam// 'on tam spyi dang dbang pos kyi// gca
333b4(mdo sde): po rkyen dang rgyu rnams kyi// 'jig rten rab tu bsgrub pa byas// khyad pa can gyi rgyur brjod pa// ci nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ bu ste// rgyu med par yang med par 'gyur// bya med byed pa'ang
333b5(mdo sde): med par 'gyur// rnam par byang dang tha mi dang // kun gzhi tha da da 'gyur ba min// de ste rnam byang tha dad na// kun gzhi/ rtag pa ma yin 'gyur// sngon med 'jigs med rtag pa ste// 
333b6(mdo sde): mtha' bzhi rnam par spangs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dag/ sprul pa ye shes sgrar yang grags// phan tshun snying po tha mi dad // de ni sor gdub bzhin du gnas// sa rnams sna
333b7(mdo sde): tshogs kun gzhi ste// bde gshegs snying po dge ba'ang de// snying po de la kun gzhi sgras// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa mdzad// snying po kun gzhir bsgrags par yang // blo zhan rnams
333b8(mdo sde): kyis mi shes so// gsar mgar mkhas pas rnam dag gi/ gser las ser gdub byas pa ni// sor mo rnams la rnam par mdzes// phan tshun tha dad mtshan yin te// sor gdub ces kyang
334a1(mdo sde): brjod mod kyi// las kyi mkhan pos yongs su bsgyur bas// gser ni gzugs bzhin rab tu gnas// chos mthong rnal 'byor ldan pa yi// sems dang rnam par shes pa'i/ 
334a2(mdo sde): yul // bdun pa'i sa ni rnyed pa dang // 'byung ba las kyang rnam par ldo ga/ 'phags pa mthong ba'i chos ldan gyi// so so rang rig mthong ba dang // spyi dang bdag gi legs 'phags pa// 
334a3(mdo sde): thams cad brjod par mi nus so// ji skad yul yod ci'ang rung // sems dang rnam shes spyod yul du// sna tshogs snang ba de dag kyang // rnam shes yin te yul med do// sems/ 
334a4(mdo sde): ni rnam pa gnyis dngos su// gzung dang 'dzin par snang ba ste// rdzu 'phrul snam bu sogs pa yi// yul ni gang yang yod pa min// ji ltar ri rab rten byas shing // nyi zla gza'
334a5(mdo sde): yi tshogs kyi rnams// bral ba med par rtag 'brang ngo // de bzhin rnam dag kun gzhi la// rnam dag 'phags/ pa'i spyod yul ni// rtag par gser bzhin rab tu 'bar// 
334a6(mdo sde): kun gzhi snying por bsgrags pa ni// rtog pa'i sems kyi yul ma yin// rang bzhin rnam par brtags pa dang // rtogs par nus pa ma yin dang // yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin
334a7(mdo sde): yang de rnal 'byor thub can rtag tu mthong // yid kyi rnam shes yul can ni// bus pa rnams la 'ching ba'i dngos// smig rgyu sna tshogs byung ba ste// 'phags pa rnam kyis dri med gzugs/ 
334a8(mdo sde): stong phrag bcu gnyis pa'i rgyan stug po las// ji snyed brjod pa'i mdo rdzogs so// // bsgyur ba mi rdzogs par bzhed// 
334b1(mdo sde): rgya gang skad du/ Ar+ya tsa tu ras t+ya sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yi mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag/ 
334b2(mdo sde): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dmar bu can gyi grong khyer dang rgyal po'i khab kyi bar gyi dbus na/ rgyal po'i gnas 'od ma'i dbyug pa can na nub mo nye bar rten cing / dge slong
334b3(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga dang khyed cag kho nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa pani
334b4(mdo sde): po de dag ma shes/ ma mthong / khong du ma chud/ so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor ba dar gyur to// bzhi po de gang zhe na/ nga dang khyed cag kho nas sdug
334b5(mdo sde): bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes/ ma mthong // khong du/ ma chud/ so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyu/ gcing 'khor bar gyur to// nga dang khyed cag kho nas sdug
334b6(mdo sde): bsngal kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes/ ma mthong / khong du ma chud/ so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to// nga dang khyed cag kho nas bsdug bsngal
334b7(mdo sde): 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes/ ma mthong / khong du ma chud/ so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to// nga dang khyed cag kho nas sdug bsngal 'gog par
334b8(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes/ ma mthong / khong du ma chud/ so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to// dge slong dag ngas sdug bsngal 'phags
